Description:
Like a shell, the villa Arapede is literally hanging on the cliff.
Its architect wished to integrate the house into its environment and keep a huge rock in the heart of the living room.
Thus suspended from the hill, you benefit from an extraordinary panorama. The unique sensation of belonging to nature is part of the journey, unforgettable.
In order to let the panoramic view take center stage, the luxurious villa opts for a minimalist yet authentic decoration.
Rocks and comfortable sofas under high mansard ceilings and furniture made mostly of weathered wood give an immediate impression of well-being. Terracotta tiles cover the floors of the living rooms and the terrace, bringing a real charm to the careful and masterful style of the interior designer.

The two sofas arranged back to back allow you to alternate the pleasures of the view sometimes on the sea or sometimes on the immense rock facing you, slightly hollowed out to allow you to settle in.
Large bay windows are installed on all the rooms of the property so that nothing escapes you from inside or outside the villa.
Protected from the sea spray and the wind, you can enjoy your pool and the beauty of the ocean.
Atypical for sure.
The unique experience also extends to the 2 bedrooms.
Located at both ends of the villa, they offer absolute comfort and privacy.

Wood predominates in both bedrooms, each with a lovely library corner.
Both have a splendid view of the ocean and an adjoining bathroom.
The seemingly simple decoration offers an unparalleled charm.
Imagine waking up…

At lunchtime and only a few minutes away by car, treat yourself to a delicious gourmet meal with your feet in the sand at Hotel Christopher’s restaurant.
Extend the relaxation to the fabulous sunset.

Welcome to Villa Arapede

The +: the original architecture and panoramic view

Description:
Nestled in the heights of one of the most beautiful bays in St. Barts, Gouverneur, Villa Gypsea overlooks the ocean in a luxurious and refined setting. There is tropical decor and a breathtaking view. Wait until you see the rest. The infinity pool is set against the turquoise horizon, it's an immediate invitation to swim and relax. You can then choose to lounge in the shade of the gazebo or in one of the sun beds at your disposal.

The property can accommodate 4 couples, but everyone can enjoy their privacy as the villa offers different comfortable spaces to rest in peace. The decor has a boho chic style and natural ambiance, the house breathes calm and serenity everywhere. The organic, wooden furniture contribute to the delicate atmosphere. You can choose to dine at the large table in the living room or the outdoor table in the shade of the terrace. The fully equipped open kitchen allows you to welcome the services of a private chef or why not try your hand at local cuisine. If the heat is bothering you, you can close the windows to enjoy the comfortable air-conditioned lounge with a good movie.

In the evening, the villa is expertly illuminated to create a gentle and tranquil ambiance. As for the rooms, there are 4, all perfectly decorated. Each one has its own unique style and private bathroom, and they overlook either the terrace or the lush garden. One of the bedrooms has its own private living room/garden with a swimming pool as well as an equipped kitchenette. So you can be in total privacy whenever you want. However, do not hesitate to leave your sublime villa to reach the breathtaking Gouverneur beach.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Gypsea.

The +: the charming decoration and the panoramic view.

Description:
Villa Silhouette has a romantic and secluded feel that is perfect for a couple seeking privacy.

The view of the bay of Anse des Cayes and the charm of the place make the house the perfect place for a getaway for two.
The villa consists of a living room with an open kitchen sheltered under the terrace, a beautiful bedroom with en suite bathroom overlooking the ocean, an office space, a large terrace with pool and a dining area overlooking the incredible panorama.

You will immediately fall in love with the tranquil and peaceful surroundings.
You will find it hard to leave this wonderful cocoon, warm, bright and delicately caressed by the trade winds.
The singing of the frogs and the tropical nature give rhythm to your conversations and you enjoy doing nothing but contemplating the panorama (and your other half of course).
However, if you want to get out of your cozy nest, you are only a few minutes away by car from Gustavia with its numerous stores and excellent restaurants.
After a romantic stroll along the harbor admiring the yachts, you choose the terrace of a French restaurant to dine under the stars before returning to the comfort of your large room with a king size bed.

Outside your villa, you will enjoy the sublime fine sand beaches, the lush vegetation that lines the roads and the small colorful roofs that make up the unique charm of Saint-Barthélemy.
Contemplation, love and beauty resonate throughout your stay.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Silhouette.

The + : the exquisite charm of the villa and its incredible view

Description:
A small paradise located in the heights of Vitet,Villa Pastels offers an idyllic setting for an unforgettable vacation with your friends or family.
Each bungalow of the property is a living space open to the outside, sometimes on the turquoise blue of the ocean, sometimes on the luxuriant green of the tropical vegetation. The living spaces all converge on the beautiful pool in which you love to dive at any time of the day. Surrounded by a large teak terrace, you can choose between one of the many deckchairs and the lounge area.

The pergola is the ideal place to relax with a good book or share a drink with friends. Here you are perched on the highest hill in St. Barts and enjoy the privacy of the place, it’s tranquility and the surrounding nature.
The interiors are very bright and the volumes immediately give you a feeling of space and freedom.
The immaculate white walls and roof contribute to the softness of the atmosphere.
The 4 bedrooms are also open to the outside and all have their own private bathroom. One of them has two showers, one inside and one outside for the pleasure of its occupants. Three of the rooms have a king size bed and the last one has two twin beds, ideal for two teenagers or children.
The decoration is elegantly sober, the furniture is of high quality and the equipment offers all the comfort expected from a luxury villa in St. Barts.

In the living area, the cozy living room is next to the fully equipped kitchen and the dining room offering a first dining area. All of this opens onto the covered terrace where a large and beautiful wooden table can accommodate 10 guests.
As evening falls, you will fall under the charm of your villa, delicately lit to allow you to enjoy the house day and night.
Not far from the property, the magnificent lagoon of Grand Cul de Sac invites you to beautiful kite surfing sessions or nicecanoe rides, to meet turtles and other wonders of the aquatic world.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Pastels.

Description:
Ideally located in the heights of St. Jean, the villa enjoys a breathtaking view of the entire bay. Perfectly integrated into the lush nature, you reconnect to the essentials of nature in a unique setting..
The large pool merges with the horizon and provides a view of distant islands and tropical vegetation.
The large living room mixes an ethnic and contemporary style unique to St. Barts. Decorations that are create a unity and a tinge of African inspiration. African art is honored with superb pieces such as antelope horns, fossilized wood and magnificent shells.

The three large suites with private bathrooms give you the opportunity to admire the sea from your bed. Three are located on either side of the living room and the fourth is in a separate bungalow with its own private terrace to guarantee delicious moments of intimacy.
In addition to the exceptional setting, the property is located in the heart of the island, giving you the opportunity to explore the rest of the island very easily. From your villa, you can already see the famous Eden Rock where you can enjoy the crystalclear waters and fine sand of St. Jean’s beach during lunch.
Not far from there, other magnificent beaches line the entire coast and lead you to Lorient on one side and Gustavia on the other.
Gourmet restaurants, luxury French boutiques and grand yachts are worth the detour through the bustling streets of the “capital”.
But you’ll always be happy to return to your villa to continue the journey to your room.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Ixfalia

The + : the location and the originality of the decoration

Description:
In the Petite Saline district, the villa offers a relaxing place to stay. You get to know a new way of living as you enter the interior of this charming 2 bedroom villa. First, a cozy and friendly living space carefully decorated with wooden furniture, comfortable sofas and objects reminiscent of the sublime panorama available to you: the turquoise sea and it’s wild coasts.

The living room opens on 2 sides by large bay windows allowing you to savor the mild climate and the melody of the surrounding nature.
Facing the sea, the office area is also designed so that you can combine business with pleasure.
A few contemporary pieces bring character to this house inspired by colonial architecture.
The very spacious kitchen is fully equipped and opens directly onto the outdoor dining area in the shade of the patio, which can easily accommodate 10 guests.
The tropical decor brightens up your lunches and the song of the frogs enliven your dinners, for a total change of scenery.

Now enjoy a delightful sunbathe or a refreshing swim on the comfortable sun terrace. Deckchairs and sofas will be perfect companions for a few moments of rest.
The outdoor lounge, just as welcoming, invites relaxation and long lively discussions with friends or family.
The first bedroom is on the ground floor.

Like the house, it benefits from all the comforts and has a private bathroom while giving access to the outdoor terrace for a morning swim when you step out of bed.
The spiral staircase leads you to the second bedroom, spacious and also equipped with a private bathroom. Nestled under the roofs, it gives the feeling of a real cocoon.

Have a good stay at Villa Petite Saline.

Description:
Located in Gustavia, a secluded and confidential place just a stone’s throw from the bustling streets of the capital.
The elegant simplicity of the layout offers you a spacious outdoor living space but also all the luxury expected from such a property!
There is a corner lounge to enjoy your aperitif as well as a large table sheltered from the sun. Surrounded by tropical vegetation, the swimming pool offers refreshment.
With deckchairs available to perfect this pure moment of relaxation.

The main building houses the beautiful open kitchen perfectly equipped in the extension of which is the living room in contemporary style and carefully decorated with unique pieces both modern and ethnic.
You will also appreciate the delicate play of light coming from the different openings in the ceilings or the bay windows.
All this gives a very particular and pleasant atmosphere to the place.
The high quality materials contribute to the magic of the place.
The rooms are just as warm.
The decoration is thought to ensure you the best rest in a purified and comfortable atmosphere.
Here again, modernity rubs shoulders with exoticism to remind you that you are on a journey.
Both rooms have a private bathroom overlooking the tropical garden.

At sunset time, without even taking the car, you go up slightly towards the lighthouse of Gustavia to admire the sublime sunset.
Then, quietly, you will go to one of the many gastronomic restaurants or bars in town to continue your evening.
Enjoy an afternoon stroll along the waterfront with its luxury stores.
What a privilege to be able to stroll through Gustavia without the traffic, especially during the festive season.
Back at the villa, you will find your haven of peace and serenity.
Unforgettable memories in perspective.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Yuzu

Description:
The large Chanticleer property will take you back in time!
A very large house that can accommodate up to 10 guests.
The colonial architecture and its huge frame, reminds us of old British houses built in stone and wood.
Beautiful pieces of antique art and furniture of yesteryear plunge you into another era while guaranteeing you the comfort of today.
On the garden side, a large infinity pool is certainly the “gathering place” for your guests. It overlooks the bay of St-Jean.

Like the house, the view is unique.
Although very large, the property is not ostentatious and favors authenticity. Thus, nature remains the master and you can enjoy a beautiful green setting.
Also, magnificent traveler’s trees welcome you and tropical flowers guide you along the paved paths of the property.
Exoticism also invites itself in the 5 rooms of the house, carefully distributed so that each one has privacy.
You will enjoy the fabulous landscape, but between two swims you may want to share a game of tennis on your private court or a fitness session in your gym.

The serenity and friendliness of the place promises you good moments with family or friends. You will have the pleasure to concoct good dishes in the fully equipped kitchen and to enjoy them facing the sea in the shade of the terrace.
The sea and the tropical melody in the background…to be savored day and night.
The softness of the place combined with the style of the house gives you the impression that time has stopped. You could spend your entire stay here, but there are many other attractions that invite you to leave your dream refuge.
The island has many beautiful beaches and Gustavia, the capital, is famous for its restaurants, stores and boutiques.
You will experience the charm of the French Caribbean, a unique and unforgettable experience.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Chanticleer

The +: the immense tropical garden and colonial style

Description:
Villa Ideal for a family wishing to discover St. Barts in all simplicity, the villa offers all the comfort and charm expected for such a trip.
First of all, you will be conquered by the view of the ocean. The terrace offers a splendid viewof the bay of Lorient.
You will certainly see some surfers who have come to take advantage of the “conditions” unless you have already left to join them with your board under your arm.
For the less adventurous, the beach of St-Jean, the most animated of the island, is only a few minutes away by car…

Nicely decorated, the house remains simple and welcoming. You will immediately feel at home.
The kitchen is well equipped, you think about the delicious dishes that you will be able to cook and enjoy on the terrace.
Two of the bedrooms have a breathtaking view, while the last one overlooks the tropical garden.
The villa has a master suite with private bathroom while the other two rooms share a bathroom.
One of them is equipped with twin beds, ideal for teenagers for example.
Bright and fully open to the outside, the house is more than a vacation spot, it is a breath of fresh air and well-being that you share with your loved ones.

Located between Lorient,known for its surfing hut and St-Jean, famous bay of fine sand and its prestigious hotel the Eden Rock, you are in the heart of the island.
In the morning, all you have to do is decide which way you want to explore St. Barts.Grand fond and its wild coastline or Gustavia and its lively streets.
The capital: a place of all pleasures, between gourmet restaurants, luxury boutiques and lively bars.

So you can enjoy the island’s sweetness to your heart’s content. You live the moment.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Idalia.

Description:
The magnificent view of the ocean and hills greets you upon arrival and leaves you feeling as though you are peering over theedge of the earth.
Perched in the heights of Vitet, Villa Feyrouz is built on three levels, and composed of five bedrooms and private ensuitebaths.
Two are located on the lower level overlooking a terrace, two are on the main level overlooking a lovely patio.

The last room, totally independent, is on the upper level, open to the ocean and has a kitchenette.
To better enjoy this breathtaking scenery.
The huge living room directly overlooks this sublime panorama and enjoys a very airy and bright space.
The colorful and modern decoration immediately invites you to relax and enjoy the large wooden table that can accommodate 12 people.
What a pleasure to cook facing the lagoon of Grand Cul Sac.
In the extension of the main room, a spacious sunny terrace surrounds a large pool, 8 meters long.
It is difficult to distinguish between the azure blue of the sky, the turquoise of the lagoon and the cyan of the pool…let yourself relax because, here, everything lends itself to it.

The outdoor lounge is just as cozy with its huge sofas and armchairs. You will certainly not want to leave the comfort of this unique view, except to enjoy the many beaches around or dine in one of the many restaurants on the island.
For the exotic side, a charming tropical garden and several spaces arranged to rest in the shade of palm trees and the soft sounds of nature.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Feyrouz

The + : the location of the villa, at the highest point of the island, combining panoramic view and tropical atmosphere

Description:
Start your descent to Flamands and you have arrived at your resort for an unforgettable stay.
First, you'll be greeted by the mesmerizing Caribbean Sea, then the lush, tropical landscape, and finally, a property with a pure and natural style known as Villa Alpaka, proudly presented by Sun Beach House.
This contemporary construction is built on two levels and designed with raw and organic materials such as stone and wood for a serene atmosphere.
This place is overflowing with positive energy.
The infinity pool, surrounded by a large wooden terrace, invites you to take your first swim.
You can relax on one of the deckchairs or enjoy a fresh fruit cocktail at the bar.

All the living spaces are open to this heavenly setting. You will have the pleasure of cooking good with a natural backdrop of the ocean in your fully equipped kitchen.
The main room is fresh, soft and comfortable with a large living room and has a dining for gatherings with friends and family.
Finally, the decoration is clean, simple, yet artistic.
The villa offers 3 bedrooms that are located on the lower level, accessible on each side of the pool.
They all offer a splendid view of the sea and a terrace to enjoy the sunrise or the sunset.
The fourth room is located on the ground floor next to the living area.
All are designed as suites with independent bathrooms and furnished with style for the comfort of your stay.
When you wake up, you can walk to the bakery La Petite Colombe and enjoy some fresh pastries.
Savor the “French touch” and continue the journey in the lively streets of Gustavia, only 10 minutes away by car. The most beautiful French brands are represented there as well as many other charming boutiques.
You can also enjoy typical French (or local) cuisine in one of the many restaurants in the “capital”.
To finish the day, go down the hill, don’t forget to slow down to appreciate the scenery and reach the beautiful beach of Flamands.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Alpaka.

The + : the natural and comfortable style, its infinity pool

Description:
When contemporary art meets luxury, the result is Edunia, a sublime villa located in the hills of Lurin.
The name originates from the owners’ love for the American Eduardo Kac and his transgenic art, a contraction of Eduardo and Petunia.
You will be pleased to find a number of his original works in the villa.

The entrance is rather aesthetic like the rest of the property, starting with the view that greets you upon arrival.
A sublime turquoise blue panorama overlooking the port of Gustavia.
The infinity pool calls you immediately..
To admire the landscape, the deck terrace offers a lounge and dining area for moments with family or friends.
The garden area at the back has a barbecue.

All the interiors have been tastefully designed, including the four bedrooms (three bedrooms on each side of the pool and thefourth bedroom on the lower level), which are luxurious, comfortable, equipped with king-size beds, a dressing room and all open onto a terrace.
The style is resolutely modern.
In the evening, you will enjoy lounging in one of the huge armchairs of the air-conditioned living room, if you wish, since the space can be totally closed.
Also equipped with American satellite TV and Bose speakers for delightful movie nights.

For more lively, even festive moments, head down to Gustavia, only a few minutes away by car.
From luxury boutiques to French restaurants, you can enjoy “art” the French way this time.

Welcome to Villa Edunia.

The + : the well laid out outdoor space, the artistic style of the villa

Description:
You will enter total immersion as soon as you enter Villa Lama. The architecture is totally inspired by a Creole hut, yet offers all the luxury expected of a prestigious villa.
The charm of a typical St Barts house can be found throughout, with classical wooden beams in all the rooms of the house. .
The furniture is also Caribbean inspired and plunges you immediately into the heart of the trip where each object benefits the Creole atmosphere.

More than a stay, it is a way of life that you will experience.
Between the vegetation and the sublime panorama, join the large deck and its swimming pool. You can lie down on a deck chair or lounge under the charming and comfortable gazebo. This is where you will certainly choose to spend many of your meals. Shaded and friendly, you let yourself be lulled by the sound of nature.

A sweet cocoon that you will have to leave if you want to discover the many other treasures of the island starting with the sublime beach of Flamands, a long bay of white sand to enjoy barefoot from dawn to sunset.
Treat yourself to a delicious lunch at the restaurant of the Hotel ***** Cheval Blanc, a prestigious establishment next to your villa.
Only 10 minutes away by car, Gustavia, its numerous shops and restaurants will surprise your taste buds and delight your wardrobe with the most beautiful French fashion brands.
On your return, if the night has not yet fallen, admire the sunset with a cocktail.

Before dinner, you will return to your room and perhaps choose to extend the tropical experience with an outdoor shower.
All 3 rooms are unique and have a private bathroom, one of which has a bathtub, so you can relax in complete serenity.

Enjoy your stay in the villa Lama

The + : the creole and tropical charm mixed with the comfort of the villa

Description:
Perched in the heights of Lurin, halfway between the two beautiful beaches of Gouverneur and Salines, the view is breathtaking. It’s as if you are suspended above the island of St Barts, free and serene.
In the background, the bay of St-Jean. In the foreground, the infinity pool which cascades into the blue sky.

Both contemporary and authentic, this villa Moh is rich in influences as each object seems to tell you a story, the story of an unforgettable stay perhaps.
The imposing oak ceiling in the living room, the magnificent floor and the rough stone wall give the room warmth and makes it conducive to gatherings with friends or family.

The top-of-the-range equipment ensures maximum comfort in the living rooms with a perfectly equipped kitchen, but also in the bedrooms: king size beds or double bed for the 3 very spacious bedrooms, private bathrooms, one of which has an outdoor shower.
Located only a few minutes away from your villa, 2 of the best restaurants on the island: Esprit de Salines and Tamarin with its charming tropical garden for a most exotic dinner.

Not far from there, Gustavia and its lively streets to end the day window shopping or to finish titillating your taste buds.
Every morning, the magic is repeated. The view is truly breathtaking and is enough to fill you with happiness and joy.
Time stops, you savor every moment.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Moh.

The + : the breathtaking view, the infinity pool and the atypical style of the house.

Description:
Like the Creole huts, the Villa Lagon Jaune is designed to open up to the outside world and take full advantage of its unique setting. Located in the exclusive Domaine du Levant neighborhood, the stay is immediately peaceful and happy.
The view announces the color: crystalline waters, a luxuriant nature and an azure blue sky.
The property consists of 4 bedrooms all equipped with private bathrooms, 3 of which offer a panoramic view of the Caribbean Sea.

The living room has exposed beams and a mezzanine lounge area, an open and well equipped kitchen, a bar and a large sofa. The decoration is simple and neat, favoring wood and organic materials.
The dining table is outside under the shade of the patio so that each meal is a new opportunity to enjoy the scenery. The barbecue, a vacation essential for happy moments with family and friends.

To enjoy the sun at any time of day, you can move from one terrace to another and vary the view.
The pleasure doesn’t stop there. You have access to the private beach of the domain located at only 300 meters. There, deckchairs, kayaks and paddles are waiting for you to become one with the turquoise water of the lagoon.

On the other side, you can go kitesurfing. If the wind does not allow, there is always the tennis court of the domain.
Despite the incomparable tranquility of the place, you won’t have to go far to enjoy the nightlife of Gustavia located at about 20 minutes by car.
Shops, restaurants, bars and yachts for entertainment.

Enjoy your stay in the Villa Lagon Jaune.

The + : the villa Lagon Jaune can be rented with the villas Petit Lagon, Lagon Bleu, Lagon Vert and Lagon Rose which are all nearby for a total of 24 rooms.

Description:
A magnificent property located at the top of the Domaine du Levant for total privacy and unparalleled tranquility, Villa Lagon Rose has 5 rooms to accommodate a large family or group of friends.

Newly renovated, the house is inspired by the Caribbean style in its architecture: all spaces are open to nature and the splendid panorama.
The entrance to the villa is on the main level. The Caribbean Sea in front of you.
A moment to come to your senses and to survey the different rooms of the house.
First of all, the interior living room has an open and fully equipped kitchen, a charming lounge and a bar.

The house, definitely open to the sea and nature, favors outdoor spaces for all your moments of social gatherings.
The dining table located under the patio along the pool allows you to swim without missing any of the goings on.
The pool spans the length of the patio.
The view is simply spectacular.
During the day, you watch the turquoise of the lagoon. At night, you can admire the pink sky.

Isolated, the property can be a perfect place to gather with friends. Laughing and dancing the night away…isn’t that what vacations are all about?
There are 5 bedrooms, all are spacious and elegantly decorated with a bathroom and a private terrace for some privacy.
When you wake up, go down to the beach of Petit Cul Sac, a shaded private beach where deckchairs, kayaks and paddles are at your disposal for the duration of your stay.
On the other side of the lagoon, kite surfers can enjoy themselves while others prefer to play tennis on the estate’s tennis court.

Enjoy your stay in the Villa Lagon Rose.

The plus: the Lagon Rose villa can be rented with the Petit Lagon, Blue Lagoon, Green Lagoon and Jaune Lagoon villas, all of which are located nearby, for a total of 24 rooms.

Description:
Adorable cocoon located in Flamands, the Villa Ti Lama is a small paradise for lovers, near the luxurious hotel ***** Cheval Blanc and is represented by Sun Beach House.
Immediate love at first sight for this charming cottage with colorful furniture and whimsical decoration. Decorated with love, this villa guarantees you a very romantic stay.

You can’t resist of the tropical vegetation.
A little nest perched in the hill that you don’t want to share with anyone but your other half. Warm and cozy, you will enjoy curling up in every corner of the villa.
Take a seat in the hanging armchairs, talk about the future or simply enjoy the present moment.
Hand in hand, you then go for a walk on the long beach of Flamands,fine sand and sunset prolong the romance.

St. Barts is definitely a great choice for couples looking for tranquility and privacy. You don’t have enough time to visit all the beaches on this small island.
Time doesn’t matter, you’re in the right place with the right person.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Ti Lama.

The + : The Ti Lama and Villa Lama villas can be rented together, they are connected by a short path through an outdoor space.

Description:
Rare are the seasonal residences offering so much in the center of Gustavia.
This luxurious 3-bedroom apartment Gustavia Lights overlooks the small turquoise harbor and its colorful creole houses.
The charm is immediate, you are in the heart of the island!
The style of the apartment is particularly neat and favors organic materials such as wood, leather and marble.

The large living room has an open kitchen, perfectly equipped for the pleasure of gourmands.
The two large bay windows open onto the terrace where you will spend most of your time.
The outdoor living room, the dining area and the swimming pool will give you the opportunity to admire the panorama again and again.
At night, as during the day, it is dazzling.
The 3 bedrooms are comfortable and tastefully decorated. Each room has its own private bathroom.

If you choose to stay in Gustavia, it is certainly to take advantage of the proximity of all the restaurants, bars and shops of the city.
During the day, you will enjoy walking to Shell Beach.
Perhaps you’ll enjoy a snorkeling trip to greet the tropical fish before having lunch at Shellona, a charming beach restaurant that also offers sun beds.
In the afternoon, you may decide to stroll through the colorful streets of Gustavia. Luxury stores, one after the next, and the opportunity to discover small designer or artisan boutiques.
In the evening, you will be spoiled for choice: more than 20 restaurants offer tasty cuisine, mostly French or local, gastronomic or simpler, depending on your tastes and desires.

In the morning, in addition to the splendid view, you will have the pleasure of having fresh bread and pastries delivered to you before heading to the Lurin gym for a good morning session!

Enjoy your stay at Gustavia Lights!

The + : undeniably the location and the breathtaking view on the harbor

Description:
Like a star, the villa is nestled high in the hills of Deve.
Like a star, the villa Belle Etoile illuminates your stay.
Welcome to a place of exception where everything is calm, voluptuous and perfect.
True jewels of the island, the property is both luxurious and discreet.
Nothing extravagant, everything seems so naturally perfect…

Starting with the absolutely idyllic setting: you overlook the ocean and the lagoon of Grand Cul de Sac. Undeniably, it is one of the most beautiful views of the island.
To enjoy it as much as possible, you also have one of the longest swimming pools in St-Barthélemy. This way, no matter where you are in the house, you are never far away for a swim.
The rooms are connected to each other to make it easy to get around. The 5 bedrooms are also an opportunity to share this beautiful paradise with friends or family.
Numerous spaces are designed for relaxation such as the large sofas in the indoor living room, the suspended bed facing the pool, the ajoupa with a floating sofa…
Once well rested, you can then exercise in the fitness room, without losing your view.
Isn’t this the description of the perfect place for your stay?

The fully equipped open kitchen welcomes the services of a private chef.
It is difficult to leave the tranquility of the villa except to reach one of the sublime white sand beaches not far from there.
For kite surfers, it’s only a few minutes by car to the island’s most popular spot.
On the lagoon, other water activities such as diving, canoeing, snorkeling … are also on the program.
Take the opportunity to have lunch, with your feet in the sand, at the hotel Le Barthélemy.
The master being slightly isolated from the 4 other rooms, all benefit from an extreme comfort sometimes with the sea, sometimes with the tropical garden.

Enjoy your stay at the villa La Belle Etoile.

The + : the luxury and the intimacy of the property

Description:
Located in the quiet neighborhood of Petit Cul de Sac, this luxurious property Cairn offers you an upscale stay in an idyllic and unforgettable setting.
The immense terrace and its swimming pool display a beautiful tropical panorama of palm trees and turquoise waters.
The villa has an outdoor dining area with large tables for gatherings under the shade of the pergola.

You or your private chef will have prepared the meal in the open and fully equipped kitchen, located not far from there.
Some guests choose the pool to cool off while others prefer the coolness of the air-conditioned living room to relax with a good novel.
For a swim in the sea, the beach is only a few meters away and paddle boarding is a fun way to discover the treasures of thelagoon.
When it’s time for sunset, it’s nice to meet in the outdoor lounge to enjoy a cocktail while admiring the orange and pink glow of the end of the day.

A true haven of peace, you couldn’t expect more from your stay in St-Barthélemy. The villa’s airy and spacious design allows you to share pleasant moments of conviviality while offering you the tranquility you need to recharge your batteries.
Between its many beaches, its restaurants and shops in the lively streets of Gustavia and its water sports activities, St-Barts gives you plenty of time for a great vacation.

In the evening, you will be just as happy to find the intimacy of one of the 4 bedrooms of the property with a sea view or agarden view, a king size bed, air conditioning and all the amenities expected of a prestigious villa.
The contemporary style, uncluttered and open to the outside world, fits perfectly into the lush and exotic decor, all contributing to the serenity of the place and your well-being.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Cairn.

The + : the tranquility of the place and its spacious interiors, the proximity of the beach.

Description:
On the heights of the Colombier hill, the villa Lina is the ideal place for an intimate and unforgettable stay.
Beautiful fauna and a charming pond welcome you into the immense living room.
You will appreciate the softness of the trade winds in this vast living room where you can relax in the lounge area, prepare good meals in the fully equipped kitchen and then enjoy them on the very large wooden table that can accommodate up to 10 guests.
In its extension, the large terrace and its overflowing swimming pool welcome your moments of relaxation.
Between two swims, you can also refresh yourself with the help of the outdoor shower. A moment of absolute well-being.

The house is completely open plan and offers a breathtaking view: turquoise as far as the eye can see and green hills.
High palm trees frame the splendid panorama and you immediately succumb to the softness of the place.
Exoticism is also present in the architecture of the house, inspired by the colonial style, while the decoration favors contemporary furniture.
The design is sufficiently refined not to disturb your serenity and to make your stay a truly enchanted interlude.

Designed by architect Johannes Zingerle, this prestigious villa perfectly meets all your expectations for a getaway in St-Barts.
With its 2 bedrooms, the villa is ideal for two couples.
Very comfortable and with a dressing room and a private bathroom, one overlooks the pool and the other overlooks the tropical garden.
You are very close to the magnificent beach of Flamands.
White sand and crystal clear water are waiting for you, and you can also enjoy a lunch with your feet in the sand at the Hôtel Le Cheval Blanc.

Just 5 minutes from Gustavia, you can also dine in one of the many restaurants or extend the festivities in a trendy bar.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Lina.

The +: the huge living room and its tropical setting

Description:
On the highest peak of St-Barts, the Angel villa.
Very spacious, it welcomes you with friends or family in joy and tranquility.A haven of peace dedicated to relaxation and conviviality that can accommodate up to 12 guests.
Immediately bewitched by the grandeur of the place, you will remain “perched” on your little cloud like an angel.

First, the panorama, untouched by any construction, takes you to Grand Fond before getting lost in the azure blue ocean.
Then the immense terrace, bathed in sunlight because it faces south, invites you to relax and swim, of course.
Here and there, the vegetation or the furniture offers you a shady spot to prolong your relaxation while enjoying the softness of the trade winds.
For your children, a pool is dedicated to them near the terrace so you can keep an eye on them.
On the living room side, still exposed to the incredible panorama, a huge sofa welcomes you to relax in the company of your friends or family.
Perhaps you have chosen the services of a private chef to operate in the open and perfectly equipped kitchen, with a back kitchen.
The villa comes in different shades of gray to make room for a cheerful and colorful decoration with many works of art throughout the house.

Four of the six bedrooms are located right next to the pool. As soon as you wake up, you have only a few steps to take the first dip of the day.
The master bedroom is located on the other side of the terrace, in the extension of the pool. You can manage your business from a small office. Also, in addition to a large private bathroom, you will have the pleasure of enjoying a bath, an absolute delight.
Finally, the last room, ideal for two teenagers or a member of your staff, is located in a bungalow a little out of the way.
If you wish to leave the serenity and tranquility of your luxurious villa, there are many beautiful beaches within a few minutes drive.
Not far away, Petit Cul Sac offers a great kitesurfing spot along with other water activities.
On the other side of the island, join the lively streets of Gustavia for an afternoon of shopping or an evening of festivities!

Enjoy your stay at Villa Angel.

The +: privacy and capacity

Description:
As soon as you enter the luxurious villa Mapou, you feel joy.
The colorful and cheerful spirit of the furnishings immediately puts you on vacation.
Inspired by the local architecture, the house is arranged on two levels with a separate cottage and offers you a sumptuous view of the bay of Saint-Jean.
The tropical vegetation blends with the turquoise sea from which small islets submerge to complete the horizon.

At lunch time, to take full advantage of the warm and sunny climate without suffering from the heat, you have the choice between the very large sheltered terrace on the upper level that can accommodate 8 guests or the gazebo near the pool.
Between relaxation and fitness, another terrace gives you access to a gym and a relaxation area.
The general atmosphere is conducive to contemplation.
Orange, a vector of good humor and positivity, dominates the interior decoration.
Joyful colorful touches brighten up your stay like this fabulous work by David Kracov.

Like everything else, the living space is convivial and the kitchen is open for cooking while chatting with guests.
All the bedrooms enjoy great privacy as one is located on the main level, another on the lower level and the last one is sheltered in an independent cottage.
Each room has a sea view and a unique style, always warm.
Definitely, the Mapou villa is like no other. You will appreciate its elegant integration into its environment and its authentic charm.
A perfect compromise between the traditional vacation home and luxury villa is exactly what you expect from Saint-Barth, a subtle balance between nature and perfection.
Ideally located in the heart of the island, you will only have a few minutes drive to Gustavia and the many beautiful beaches of Saint-Barth.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Mapou.

The + : the very pleasant outdoor spaces and the sublime view.

Description:
Spacious and welcoming, this delightful villa welcomes you on the heights of Vitet, one of the highest viewpoints but also one of the most beautiful.
From the terrace, you can admire the whole bay of Lorient but also the islands of Fregate, Toc Vert, St-Martin and Anguilla.
It is difficult to be higher, after that it would be paradise. But you are not far from it.
You meet Clementine in the large living room.

Warm and luminous, she suggests that you sit in the indoor or outdoor living room, unless you prefer to enjoy your cocktail at the bar of the open kitchen.

Fully equipped and open, you will also enjoy being behind the stove while chatting with your friends or family.
The beautiful wooden table sheltered from the sun on the terrace offers you an exceptional setting to enjoy your meal without losing a crumb of the…panorama.
Morning, noon and evening…the menu is the same. Turquoise waters as a starter, sunshine as a main course, and green hills for dessert. But you never get tired of it.
Why don’t you take the stairs on your right.
Go down a few steps and discover a beautiful and long heated pool. A swim is in order.
One of the deckchairs suggests a moment of relaxation and you succumb.

Back inside, the stairs to the right of the kitchen lead you to the fitness room. Another room, another atmosphere, but well-being is still on the menu.
The three rooms have a sea view, a king size bed and a bathroom with shower.
Comfortable and of equal size, two are located on the main level and the third is located on the lower level at the tropical garden.
Privacy and tranquility are assured for each guest.

The modern architecture plays with volumes and openings while ensuring the greatest discretion. You like the neat and friendly style and the Caribbean charm of the rooms on the first floor, under the high wooden frames.

Enjoy your stay at Clementine.

The + : the view !

Description:
Luxurious property located in the bay of Marigot, Blackstone is one of those enchanting places where you can abandon yourself without restraint. Perfectly integrated into its environment, the villa favors organic materials and offers different living spaces open to nature and the sea.
With room for 12 guests, the house is intelligently designed to promote moments of great conviviality while offering each person his or her own private space.
There are three large dining areas to choose from: inside in the main living area at the level of the open kitchen, on the immense teak terrace in the shade of the large parasol to enjoy the panorama sheltered from the sun, or even right next to the pool.
Undeniably, the pool is an oasis of relaxation at any time of the day. From sunrise to sunset, for a refreshing swim or an aperitif cocktail, you can navigate between the cozy outdoor lounge, the comfort of a deckchair and the heated pool.

From there, your stay is conjugated in the present and you lose all notion of time.
The turquoise waters of Marigot Bay contrast with the tropical setting while a few ilets delicately punctuate this delicious panorama.
The design of the house is equally pleasant, with its vaulted ceilings and wooden beams in the Creole style, while the decoration is contemporary and uncluttered.
Each room is distinguished by its equipment and its elegance, in all simplicity.

The six rooms are equally comfortable and have a sea view and a private bathroom. One of the rooms has an outdoor shower, a true sensory delight.
Finally, two of the adjacent rooms open up to each other and are ideal for a couple with children or teenagers for example.
Perfect for a peaceful interlude, the villa also lends itself to a more festive stay.
The interior and exterior sound system gives you the opportunity to transform the deck into a dance floor.
If you’re looking for entertainment, St. Barts is full of good restaurants and party places within a 30-minute drive.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Blackstone.

The + : its many living spaces

Description:
Welcome to Sun Beach House, presenting the luxurious Villa What Else for rent. This 4 bedrooms, Balinese style villa where you are invited to relax upon arrival.
Accessible via a private, secure parking that can accommodate 2 cars
A well thought-out design with natural materials and simple and beautiful furniture offer unparalleled comfort to this place dedicated to relaxation.
Located in Pointe Milou, not far from the Christopher Hotel and the mythical Ti St Barth, the villa is on a hillside known to be an absolutely magical place to watch the sunset and the infinity pool creates a beautiful cascade into the ocean beyond.

Built on two levels, you will find 2 rooms on the lower level, each with a private terrace to relax in privacy.
On the upper level, you will find the two other bedrooms and the spacious living room opening onto a shaded deck terrace to enjoy the sublime panorama at any time.
All rooms have queen size beds, tasteful decoration and private bathrooms.
Everywhere you look, you can feel the serenity.
You would like time to stop and breathe in the energy of this place.
But it’s already time for dinner.
What an immense pleasure it is to cook in front of such a backdrop as you listen to the peaceful rhythm of the waves.
On the menu, a vacation with family or friends in an idyllic setting.

Enjoy your stay in the Villa What Else.

The + : its modern and elegant Balinese style for a guaranteed comfort and no better place for the sunset.

Description:
Welcome to Villa Aka, located in the most authentic part of St-Barts in the charming Corossol hillsides.
From the top of Corossol, there is a breathtaking view of Gustavia harbor and the perfect spot to watch the sunset.
The villa has a peaceful and simple atmosphere.
There is a beautifully furnished veranda, a solarium flooded with light and an open-air dining room.

An interior designed for easy living with a view that opens up to the sea.
The terrace boasts a charming tropical garden with a small outdoor lounge and a beautiful pool overlooking the harbor.
All 3 of the bedrooms are located on the lower level.The master suite has a spacious independent bathroom and an underwater view of the pool!
The other 2 bedrooms share a bathroom and offer their own cozy sleeping area. Leave the tranquility of the villa to stroll through the lively streets of Gustavia just 5 minutes away.
On your way back, don’t forget to pass by the quaint Corossol beach for a last swim in the sea where you can see the sea turtles swimming about.

Enjoy your stay in the villa AKA.

The + : the Gustavia port can easily accommodate boat lovers or water sports fans.

Description:
Villa African Queen is a magical oasis nestled within a tropical garden.
Upon entering through the wide gate of the property, you are greeted by the warm colors, luxurious vegetation, and exoticdecorations promising you an unforgettable stay.The villa is unlike any other! The swimming pool is one of the largest onthe island (28 meters long).It replicates a natural pool and provides you the option to sit, swim, and relax as you wish.

A tiled terrace surrounds the pool with nooks nestled around to offer different relaxation areas.
Perched above and offering a birds eye view of the property is a solarium where you can swing in a hamac and be lulled by the sounds of nature.
The villa’s exterior splendor mimics the inside decor, comfort, and originality.
The decoration is inspired by visits to Morocco: bright colors, artistic expression, and natural wood that creates a seamless transition from the inside out, perfectly integrated into its environment.
Feel the inspiration and creativity emanating through this property.
You will be taken by the atmosphere and charm of Villa Africa Queen.

With a capacity of up to 8 people, friends can gather throughout for meals, relaxation, fun times, and naps abound.
The rooms are all equipped with an en suite bathroom.
Some offer a charming terrace overlooking the pool.
Rustic but nevertheless perfectly equipped (air-conditioning, wifi, cable, etc…), the rooms are all uniquely curated.

Enjoy your stay at the villa Africa Queen

The + : its giant pool that looks like a natural pool and its perfect integration into the environment.

Description:
It is difficult to find a better spot than the Villa Sous La Falaise where the villa is nestled.
At the foot of the cliff, right on the edge of the sublime bay of St-Jean and in front of the Eden Rock, is the place of your vacation.
A perfectly unique and incredible place, without a doubt one of the most beautiful locations on the island.
The house overlooks the turquoise sea from where you can easily observe the many turtles that walk around.
The private pontoon gives you the opportunity to reach them with the greatest ease.
A few swims and you are already on the white sand beach. Unless you prefer to take the small private path.A dozen steps away, you can reach the Gyp Sea, a new “trendy” establishment on the island, or the emblematic Nikki Beach club, known for its very festive Sunday afternoons.

You are literally in the heart of the island, its decor, vibrant energy, and its animations.
The charm of the villa, formerly a family home, embraces you.
The living room, fully open on the bay, offers you a delicious breeze with a dining area in the shade of the large terrace.
Also, a gazebo equipped with a BBQ allows you to organize large convivial meals, with your feet in the water, or almost.
The fully equipped kitchen, also open, can easily accommodate the services of a private chef while the 4 bedrooms are housed in separate bungalowsto ensure the privacy of each. All have private bathrooms and a splendid view of the sea. Every morning, the dream continues…
To try to wake you up, there is nothing like a swim in the pool.
But here again the dream continues…and this for the duration of your stay. One minute by car, you arrive at the Villa Creole, a small shopping area where you can bring back beautiful souvenirs.
A ten minute drive will take you to Gustavia, the “capital” of St. Barts, where you will have the pleasure of strolling among the most beautiful stores on the island or enjoying a good meal.
The numerous yachts, each one as imposing as the other, are part of the island’s attractions.

Enjoy your stay at the villa Sous la Falaise.

The + : undeniably, the location on the sea.

Description:
The horizon is the only limit to your happiness…this is how a stay in the luxurious villa Vague Bleue could be summarized.
The journey begins with the contemporary and ethnic interior decoration to offer you a warm and refined atmosphere.
At sunset, the orange tones mingle with the softness of the place, the serenity fully at the rendez-vous of your vacations.
270 degrees of beauty as you admire the Caribbean Sea, as far as the eye can see, like the horizon.

During the day, in the center of the large deck bathed in light and facing the sea, the infinity pool is bound to be your favorite space. An idyllic setting for a good sport session thanks to its counter-current swimming system. In the evening, enjoy the intimacy of the jacuzzi, surrounded by tropical plants, to savor the last glimmers of sunlight, at the back of the villa.
You can entertain in the shade of a covered terrace, taking advantage of the high-end facilities: barbecue, equipped kitchen and BOSE sound system for your musical ambiences. Adjacent to the kitchen, a small office area where you can manage your business and a charming living room where you can relax after your work.

The Villa Vague Bleue is unlike any other, harmony is everywhere. The design is combined with the nobility of the materials to make your life soft and pleasant. Located in the heights of Lurin, you are only 5 minutes away from one of the most beautiful beaches of the island, Gouverneur, and 5 minutes away from Gustavia, with its many shops, restaurants, and bars.
The Villa Vague Bleue invites you to discover the island, its white sand beaches and other magical places.
All rooms have similar amenities such as king size beds, closets with a safe, air conditioning, ceiling fan and satellite TV.
Two of the three rooms are accessible from either side of the terrace and have a private terrace with views and direct access to the pool.
The third bedroom, similar in size to the other two, is connected to the villa by a spiral staircase. Located on the lower level, it also has its own bathroom and a small outdoor lounge.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Vague Bleue

The + : the unique atmosphere of the place due to its careful architecture and its breathtaking view.

Description:
Villa Eternity is simply exceptional.
Located in the hills above Flamands, nestled in a green setting, the property is built over two floors.
The first level features the deck and its immense infinity pool. Don't hesitate between a cocktail or a swim.
You can sip your refreshment directly from the pool, where a bar awaits you.

The notion of eternity seems more familiar. Time stands still.
The minimalist design of the living room, located on the same level, contributes to the timelessness of the space.
White predominates. The color of eternity.
Here and there, a few bright red elements bring you back to earth.
The decor is elegant,uncluttered and contemporary. Nothing disturbs the villa's delightful harmony, not even the giant TV set that sinks into the ground when switched off.
The villa can accommodate 10 guests, and lends itself to both conviviality and intimacy.
Several lounge areas, both sunny and shady, invite you to relax.
On the upper floor, you can choose between a second swimming pool or the jacuzzi.
If only you could stay for eternity...

From the second pool, you can see the well-equipped gym.
Now it's time to relax and choose a massage session in the massage room.
Once you've relaxed, it's time for dinner. You choose the dining area by the pool to enjoy the mild climate, the tropical gardenand a magnificent view of the Bay of Flanders.
Frogs singing in the background.
In the immediate vicinity of the dining room, an open kitchen with a central island offers yet another convivial space where you can enjoy a chat with the cook over a glass of wine.
Very modern and perfectly equipped, it's just as suited to you as it is to your private chef.
Each of the 5 comfortable bedrooms has its own private bathroom and sea view.
Three are located on the lower level, directly overlooking the small swimming pool.
The master also has a separate shower and massage area.
The other two are on the upper level and open onto the terrace.
One of them has an outdoor shower in addition to the en-suite bathroom.

A real delight.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Eternity.

The + : Day or night, the villa offers a unique atmosphere.

Description:
Perched on the hill of Morne Vitet, Villa Casajojo has spectacular, 180 degree views from Grand Cul de Sac to Toiny.
The house is authentic, not only because of its decoration, creole and joyful, but also because of its history.
The owners, Jojo and Simone, came from the South-West of France in 1980 for a vacation in St Barts. They fell in love with the island and decided to build their family home there to welcome their children and grandchildren. Thus, the joy of relaxing and being amongst friends and family still transpire from this villa as they have opened their home to other lucky vacationers.

The expansive deck offers a plunging view over the bay where from the pool, you can already imagine yourself with a refreshing drink in hand.
At nightfall, the clear dark sky provides a starry spectacle overhead.
The comfort of the outdoor lounge invites you to enjoy a good novel or a delicious meal concocted by your private chef in the fully equipped kitchen.
The charm continues in the 2 bedrooms that are simply and classically decorated and designed. Each is equipped with an ensuite bathroom and outdoor shower. From the view of the bedroom, you will see Simone’s tropical garden in the foreground and in the background, the turquoise blue of the sea.
When you wake up, enjoy breakfast overlooking the ocean while the sun rises in the frame of the villa’s arches.
A sweet day in perspective…

Villa Casajojo is a small corner of paradise that you may leave for one of the sublime beaches of the island or a stroll through the lively streets of Gustavia. Enjoy a shopping spree or a delicious dinner at one of the many restaurants in St. Barts.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Casajojo.

The + : the authentic charm of the villa and its breathtaking view.

Description:
Welcome to Villa Eclipse…or rather welcome to paradise.
Everything you would expect from a luxury villa is here.
A large entrance gives way to the architectural lines and its chic and contemporary design.

In the living room there is a friendly feel and it is carefully decorated, every detail chosen for beauty and functionality.
A breathtaking view of the bay of Marigot, Tortue Island and the surrounding hills can be admired from all parts of the house with the spectacular panoramic view.
The swimming pool is framed by majestic white arches and surrounded by artistic sculptures.
Relax on the sunny deck or in the shade of the covered terrace.
Water sports lovers will be delighted to be only a few minutes away by car from the ideal kite surfing spot on the island. Or stay home and enjoy the well-equipped fitness room with a sea view, of course.
Not far from your villa, there are many beaches and shops!

Upon your return from shopping, enjoy the delights of a home cooked meal. This professional kitchen equipped with a Lacanche Côte d’Or cooking piano, a grill, a plancha and a wok burner will make gourmands very happy.
There are 6 rooms in the villa. You can choose between the charm of a Caribbean-style bungalow with a four-poster bed, a master bedroom overlooking the pool, two other rooms side by side on the same level, or two others located on the lower level, one of which has a small kitchen, a private terrace and a small tropical garden.

All unique and incredibly well decorated, not to mention equipped with the latest amenities.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Eclipse

The +: its exceptional design and the quality of its equipment.

Description:
Fully open to the ocean and nature, this 5-bedroom villa is composed of several bungalows, each offering a private space to enjoy an absolutely breathtaking view of the bay of Petit Cul de Sac.
From the living room to the dining room, the entire layout is designed to direct your gaze to what is most unique about
Saint-Barthélemy. Wherever you are, you will be enchanted by the decor: the azure blue of the pool giving way to the turquoise of the Atlantic in a setting of lush vegetation.

For lunch or relaxation, you can enjoy a private garden and a gazebo overlookingthe beach of Petit Cul Sac.
At the end of the day, some may choose to play a game of tennis on the court located just steps from the villa.
Others will certainly prefer a final soak in the jacuzzi to savor the last light of the day.
And for the undecided, a fitness room overlooking the sea to combine exercise with the wonders of the sunset.

It’s hard to leave this corner of paradise nestled in the very private “Domaine du Levant”, but perhaps you’ll feel like a little entertainment in one of Gustavia’s many restaurants or elsewhere on the island.
For those who prefer peace and quiet, they will be delighted to take a seat in the movie theater for a private screening.
The bedrooms are all spacious with private bathrooms, and one bedroom has a kitchenette and a small private lounge.
Ideal for family vacations, this exclusive place offers an unforgettable and unique experience to all those who have stayed there.

Enjoy your stay in Villa Indian Song.

The + : ocean views and tranquil setting

Description:
Perched on a hillside in the Devet neighborhood,Villa Manonjul is a little corner of paradise suspended above the ocean and Tortue Island.
From the terrace and the pool, you are greeted by a panoramic view with its incredible shades of blue and breathtaking landscape.

Ideal for 3 couples who can each have an independent space, the layout of the villa is nevertheless designed for social gatherings at the huge wooden table and a shaded gazebo.
Grilled or elaborate dishes, the semi-open and well-equipped kitchen inspires you to get into the kitchen… Good food is always accompanied by good wine, a beautiful cellar allows you to keep your best wines in optimal conditions.

Make room for relaxation and enjoyment.

Everything is gathered to spend an unforgettable stay, well-being as far as the eye can see!
On a large deck terrace with many tropical plants, enjoy sunbathing and a light tropical breeze is always welcome once you are lying on your deckchair.
In the evening, this elegant property with a contemporary and neat style has three bedrooms with high quality bedding and state of the art electronic equipment.
The three bedrooms all have access to a private terrace for more romantic moments. Two of the large bedrooms have beautiful bathrooms with ocean views. The third room is located at the other end of the residence.
The more the merrier…
For a couple of last minute guests,Villa Manonjul can be rented with an additional independent bungalow to make it a 4 bedroom villa!

Enjoy your stay at Villa Manonjul

The + : The conviviality of the place and the ocean as far as the eye can see.

Description:
When you arrive in the heights of Gouverneur, you have arrived at the summit of prestige.
An exceptional place that combines everything you would expect from a luxury residence and a wide turquoise panoramic view that is unique and mesmerizing.
The Villa Caro has Caribbean style architecture and inspiration that opens up to a very spacious terrace with an infinity pool and a huge palm tree.

The delight continues in the layout: comfortable, sunny or shaded according to your wishes, where you can already imagine yourself devouring a good novel or sipping a delicious cold beverage.
The well equipped kitchen welcomes gatherings around the central island.
The interior is decorated with charm and simplicity. The large windows can be opened and closed at will if you wish to relax in the air conditioning or enjoy the island breeze.
Stretch out on the comfortable sofa and enjoy the high-end TV/Audio equipment with Sonos technology as well as all your favorite apps with Apple Play.
The overall atmosphere truly invites relaxation and rest but if your business requires it, an office space is available, open or closed to work in peace.
The residence, composed of 3 single-story buildings, allows you to move from one space to another very easily and the 5 rooms offer equivalent amenities. Two of them open onto the terrace, two other bungalows onto a lovely tropical garden. Finally, the master bedroom is directly accessible from the terrace. The spacious dressing room and Italian shower with massage jets is an oasis within itself.

The most beautiful and emblematic beach in St. Barts is just down the road, Gouverneur Beach.
To make sure you don’t miss any of the breathtaking scenery, take a leisurely stroll down there and be delighted by the breathtaking views!
Not far from your residence, Shell Beach also promises beautiful snorkeling trips, swimming, and lunch at Shellona.
Your vacation can be both relaxing, productive, and healthy thanks to the gym with several fitness machines and body-building equipment at your disposal.

Enjoy your stay in Villa Caro.

The +: its level of equipment and comfort associated with the charm of the wooden construction.

Description:
The sublime Villa Floating Garden is perched in the heights of Lurin.
It offers a dazzling view of the ocean from the entrance. To frame this exceptional panorama, large palm trees line the large deck terrace.
The terrace is partially protected from the sun, allowing the light to filter into the immense living room.
The exotic wood flirts with the white walls for a contemporary style while contrasting with the Caribbean inspiration. The decoration favors natural furniture and organic materials. The elegance of simplicity.
Conviviality invites itself everywhere, outside as well as inside or in the open kitchen.

Perfectly equipped, you or your Chef will enjoy cooking your meals while chatting with your guests and friends.
The three bedrooms are arranged in such a way that everyone can enjoy their privacy and a view of the sea.
As soon as you wake up, you can enjoy this unforgettable setting. Breakfast is followed by a refreshing swim and sunbathing on the deckchairs. You may never leave this little paradise during your stay...but you are only a few minutes away from two of the most beautiful beaches of St-Barths: Gouverneur and Shell Beach.

You are close to the many restaurants, bars, and stores of Gustavia, the island's "capital".
Whether it's a gourmet dinner or a wild night out, you'll have plenty of opportunities to savor the charm of France in the heart of the Caribbean.
At the end of the evening, don't hesitate to walk along the docks and admire the huge yachts moored right there.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Floating Garden.

The +: the sublime view on the Ocean and the exotic style of the decoration.

Description:
An exceptional villa upon entering! The door of paradise, beautifully framed in stone, gives you access to a magnificent property. Ideal for large families or groups of friends in search of sharing and intimacy, the very spacious Villa Lagon Bleu is located in the private Domaine du Levant.
Modern and elegantly decorated, the house lives up to its name. Facing the bay of Petit Cul de Sac, where the turquoise waters mingle with the blue of the large infinity pool, the delightfulness invites itself in every corner of the villa.

Numerous spaces designed for your well-being or for friendly gatherings. The spaces are large, airy and bright...inside you are outside...and outside you are inside...sometimes in the pool and sometimes in the shade of the patio.
The living room has a bar to have breakfast or an aperitif, your choice! Then the large wooden table for dinner and to renew the world with all the guests. Unless you prefer the outdoor dining area and enjoy delicious grilled foods.
Just down the road, the beach of Petit Cul de Sac where deckchairs are at your disposal and are waiting for you.

For sportsmen, a tennis court is just a few steps away and just a little further, the kite surfing spot, on the other side of the lagoon.
The setting is idyllic for relaxing and rejuvenating.
Admire the view for a moment, you can see Turtle Island and the coast of St. Martin.
The property's openness to such a panorama gives you a deep sense of freedom from the moment you wake up, as all the rooms open to a spectacular view.
The 6 bedrooms of the villa, with private bathrooms, are also spacious, bright and perfectly equipped for the comfort of its guests.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa lagoon Bleu

The + : the immense volumes and the clear view on the lagoon

Description:
A magnificent luxury apartment in Gustavia, you don't have to compromise between the luxury of a spacious villa and a location right in the heart of the bustle.
The apartment overlooks the capital's harbor and offers all the comforts you'd expect from a large villa in St. Barts. The living spaces are perfectly arranged to accommodate 3 couples in search of privacy and happy convivial moments. You'll appreciate the refinement of the decor, the selection of furnishings and the unique character given to each of the bedrooms.

The open, fully-equipped kitchen adjoins the dining area on the large terrace. A place for gathering and sharing, the outdoor area features a large swimming pool overlooking Gustavia Bay. You'll have plenty of time to admire the comings and goings of large yachts and small sailboats rubbing shoulders with simplicity and courtesy.
At night, the setting is just as enchanting. The lights of the little red-roofed houses magically punctuate the extraordinary panorama.
Like a veritable oasis, the swimming pool is surrounded by tropical vegetation. Enjoy a dip after a morning stroll through the streets of Gustavia, or a "midnight swim" after a night on the town.

There's parking and an elevator to get you to the apartment, but it's great to know you can do it all on foot.
The splendid shellfish beach of Shell Beach is just 5 minutes away, not to mention the dozens of bars, restaurants and boutiques lining the 3 main streets along the waterfront.
You're immersed in the St. Barts way of life, so authentic and so special at the same time.
A cup of coffee at the famous Bar de l'Oubli, a few splurges at Cartier or Hermès, then a Ti-Punch at Select...you'll fall under the spell of the island's many faces, between Caribbean laid-back and French elegance.
Back "at home", you'll find top-of-the-range facilities and every comfort in the three bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms.
Two of them open onto the terrace for a dip as soon as you wake up!

Enjoy your stay at Gustavia Harbor.

The plus: the beautiful view of the harbor and the location in the heart of Gustavia.

Description:
A splendid luxury villa suspended high above the bay of Anse des Cayes, the property is built on two levels and offers incredible panoramic views of the sea and the green hills of St. Barts. In fact, the house seems to revolve around the view. Starting with the large infinity pool, lined on either side with sun loungers.
This is followed by a comfortable and stylish lounge area, then a large dining table and finally the open kitchen, with its scullery, ideal for entertaining a private chef.
So you don't miss a second of the precious panorama.
However, if you'd like to enjoy a good movie, the lounge area welcomes you comfortably and is equipped with the best amenities.

A little further back, a small tropical garden is the perfect place to relax.
The architecture of the house is modern and contemporary, but the large volumes and openings to the outside add to the colonial charm.
The decor is as refined as it is uncluttered, to please everyone and allow you to make the place your own immediately.
The villa's name is inscribed on a huge mosaic fresco, a nod to the provocative, avant-garde art of Marcel Duchamp.
A painting inspired by his famous urinal adorns the villa's lounge area.

The six bedrooms are just like the house: spacious, comfortable and warm.
Two of them are connected and share a bathroom, ideal for a family with young children.
The other rooms all have private bathrooms.
Just 5 minutes from Gustavia, a wide wooden staircase takes you to the parking lot (which can accommodate 4 cars), for a shopping spree or a fine dinner in one of the many restaurants in the capital of St. Barts. Ideally located, the villa is close to the airport, St-Jean beach and the famous Eden Rock.
When conditions are right, you won't have to go far to surf, as the beach at Anse des Cayes is one of the island's best spots, unless you prefer a tasty lunch at the Hôtel Manapany restaurant, whose decor will leave no one indifferent.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Marcel.

The + : the breathtaking view and large infinity pool.

Description:
From Bali to St. Barts, Villa Samsara is located in the heights of Pointe Milou and is your retreat, your resort, and your temple of tranquility. The villa offers a breathtaking view of the ocean, a gentle breeze, and a sunset that you won’t want to miss.
The house has a contemporary and natural style with beautiful woodwork throughout. The pool is situated within the main living space, and allows for swimming, relaxing, and conversing with the other guests all while taking a dip. Under the shelter of the pergola, you can enjoy delicious moments of conviviality. To prolong the relaxation, several deckchairs are offered to you at the time of a nap, a good novel or a cocktail.

The open kitchen gives you the opportunity to concoct good dishes without losing a piece of the panorama and is directly adjacent to the dining area located under the pergola. The living room is simply furnished with Balinese elegance to complete the clean and Zen style of this lovely haven of peace. The villa is perfectly sized for one or two couples, and offers tranquil living spaces. The two bedrooms each have an en-suite bathroom, a four-poster bed and sea view.

You can take a short walk to the Hotel Christopher to enjoy lunch or dinner at the restaurant, feet in the sand, you taste a French or local cuisine created by a great Chef. Or take a drive into Gustavia for a stroll, some shopping, and a time to enjoy the many amazing restaurants of St. Barts.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Samsara

The + : the Balinese style, the breathtaking view and incredible sunset

Description:
A true architectural jewel in its tropical setting, Le Manoir de Lorient is a sublime and exceptional villa in St. Barts.
Just a few steps from Lorient beach, you will enter an oasis of paradise.
Between coconut trees and other native species, the property is organized into different bungalows to house the living areas.
The spaces are fully open to the lush vegetation and the large pool, located in the heart of the house.

The design and the choice of materials are perfectly integrated into the environment. You will appreciate the subtle alliance of contemporary and Caribbean style.
The volumes are grandiose, the rooms warm, nothing is missing for your well-being.
The decoration, neat and pure, still translates the luxury and the precision of the designer.
Like a haven of peace, the villa promises you an enchanted journey or a dreamlike retreat... undeniably, unforgettable memories.

With its 7 rooms, the property lends itself well to a stay with family or friends where everyone can enjoy their privacy while sharing moments of great conviviality.
Several lounges, dining areas and relaxation areas allow you to vary the pleasures.
A game room is also at your disposal.

Two of the rooms, have a “Jack and Jill” (or shared) bathroom, while all the others have a private bathroom.
All are very comfortable and offer the same level of service.
Another strong point of the villa is its location. Right in the center of the island, you are only a few minutes by car from all the beaches, restaurants or shops.
The beach of Lorient, turquoise and lined with coconut trees, is accessible to you by foot.
A surf spot very popular with the locals. Moreover, the famous "cabane" is home to the school for budding surfers.
Not far away, some food shops (including a bakery) exempt you from taking the car if you do not want to.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa Le Manoir De Lorient.

The + : its luxuriant garden and its sublime architecture

Description:
Located in the charming neighborhood of Pointe Milou, Villa Ocean has a beautiful panorama that is shared between the Caribbean Sea, the lush vegetation, the hills and the sublime sunsets.
You can admire it all from the deck terrace, which has intertwined nature into the landscape, with three magnificent palm trees in the middle.

The house, bright and completely open to the outside, welcomes gatherings of friends and families.
Lounge chairs, sofas, and hammocks are sure to promise relaxation and idleness.
The swimming pool is right near the living room, in which you can easily dive at any time of the day or night.
Caribbean style, the interior decoration is both rustic and modern. Sophistication gives way to authenticity without losing any of the Creole charm.
The dining area, sheltered from the sun, is the meeting place for sharing moments around grilled meats prepared on the BBQ or other small dishes concocted in the adjoining and fully equipped kitchen.

If you prefer the calm of your villa for the rest of the evening, the living room has a large screen to enjoy a good movie before going to sleep.
Two of the rooms offer a sea view. All are equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom, one of which has an outdoor shower. A delightful experience you can't get enough of.
In the morning, take advantage of the island's calm and the ambient melody to treat yourself to a yoga session, for example.
The rest of the itinerary is up to you with the numerous beaches that are only a few minutes away by car while Gustavia awaits you for a shopping session, a gastronomic dinner or a stroll along the port.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa Ocean

The + : the house opens onto nature and the sea.

Description:
A perfect location overlooking the magnificent bay of St-Jean and the mythical Eden Rock.
The fine sandy beach and turquoise waters are the backdrop with turtles swimming about and welcoming you to your villa!
This is only the beginning because the villa has more than enough to prolong the charm. With a contemporary design, the architecture is naturally designed to direct your gaze towards the outside.
The deck terrace will soon become your favorite place to relax between a refreshing dip in the infinity pool and sunbathing, you will be embraced by the panoramic view.

You also have a front row seat to admire the parade of what used to be called "bêtes à zèles", the small planes so typical of your arrival on St-Barts.
The house can accommodate 3 couples and also offers comfortable spaces for social gatherings.
There is a magnificent wooden table extending off of the well equipped kitchen.The living room area invites you to relax with its huge sofa, while the outdoor pool plays a relaxing melody.

The bedrooms are just as unique. All of them have a private bathroom and a sea view.
It's hard to leave this heavenly place, but wherever you go, you're only a few minutes away by car, starting with the small shops of Villa Creole, in St-Jean.
You can then enjoy a gourmet dinner in Gustavia or a boat trip without ever breaking the magic of your stay.
In the evening, the panorama is tinted with incredible colors, breathtaking.
Paradise, there is no other word to describe the extraordinary setting of your vacations.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Reef Point

The + : Undeniably, the view.
