Description:
Kir Royal is a delightful property situated just 5 minutes from the Bay of St-Jean. Recently renovated, this home combines modern comforts with traditional Caribbean style and authenticity. Nestled between lush greenery and the crystal blue waters of St-Jean Bay, the famous Eden Rock is visible nearby.
Just a short walk from the villa, you will find the restored “Etang de St. Jean,” a bird reserve where migrating birds often pause on their journeys. A walking path around the pond offers close-up views of these avian visitors.

For relaxation, the outdoor area provides tranquil moments on the sunny terrace or in the cool shade of the patio. For swimming, choose between the refreshing pool or the bubbling jacuzzi. The interior of the villa is equally inviting and bright, with crisp white walls and tall vaulted ceilings. This is beautifully contrasted with wooden Caribbean-style furniture and unique pieces collected from around the globe.
The living area features two large sofas perfect for unwinding under the warmth, a large television with US channels, and access to Wifi throughout all rooms and terraces. The Bose sound system enhances your experience. Adjacent to this, the open, simple, and functional kitchen is fully equipped and accessible from both sides of the villa.

Enjoy socializing in the small outdoor living room with an aperitif and perhaps savor a “kir royal,” the iconic French cocktail. Dine under the covered terrace overlooking the lush tropical garden, surrounded by frangipani trees, coconut palms, and bougainvilleas, and make the most of the barbecue.
With family or friends, privacy is assured when needed. Each of the four bedrooms is identically sized and meticulously decorated, echoing the Caribbean charm and the comfort of a prestigious villa.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Kir Royal, where the prime location and idyllic setting promise an unforgettable experience.

Description:
The beautiful Villa Kermao is located in Vitet, the highest neighborhood in Saint-Barthélemy, offering you a unique panoramic view over the Caribbean Sea.
This spacious villa, featuring 4 bedrooms, invites you to enjoy an authentic stay in a typical, simple, and comfortable setting. The air-conditioned mezzanine, located above the living room, can also serve as a fifth bedroom while remaining a cozy space for watching movies or relaxing in peace.

Here, luxury lies in the natural beauty that surrounds you: the turquoise blue of the lagoon, the tropical vegetation, and a climate gently caressed by the trade winds.
The villa is the perfect place to gather with family or friends. The living spaces are open to the outdoors, and a comfortable lounge facing the sea invites you to read a good book, remake the world, or simply do nothing... Relaxation and the art of living blend effortlessly with the laid-back charm of the place.

On the terrace, enjoy delicious local dishes around the dining table, freshly prepared in the fully equipped open kitchen. While the meal is being cooked, your friends can sip on a planteur cocktail at the bar.
Here, you embrace the Caribbean lifestyle and fall under the spell of its authentic charm.

The bedrooms reflect the local style, featuring wooden details, canopy beds, colorful tiles, and wooden shutters filtering the sunlight. Each room has its own private bathroom. One of the bedrooms is located in an independent bungalow with its own terrace and private kitchenette—perfect for total privacy.

Just a few minutes’ drive away, head to the Petit Cul-de-Sac lagoon for a kite surfing session, a canoe ride, some snorkeling, or a beachside lunch.

Everything around you is simply beautiful.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Kermao.

The +: the charm of the villa and the incredible panorama.

Description:
The Silver Rainbow villa, presented by Sun Beach House is not only a luxurious villa, it is a true haven of peace nestled in the private area of the Domaine du Levant.
You will enjoy a contemporary interior with an artistic flair yet conducive to social gatherings with 3 huge sofas, a bar and a large dining room.
The exterior is graced by a huge infinity pool, one of the largest on the island! It overlooks the crystal clear turquoise waters of Petit Cul de Sac Bay and is surrounded by a vast and impeccable lawn.

After sunbathing, why not enjoy a cocktail on the outdoor patio facing the sea to watch the sunset? Then enjoy the grandeur of the place and its subtly lit garden.
Extend the charm and opt for a dinner in the privacy of your villa or choose to taste the island's gastronomy in one of the 60 restaurants of Saint-Barthélemy.
Spacious and carefully decorated rooms guarantee you a peaceful sleep to the gentle rhythm of the waves.
The villa is composed of 3 master bedrooms and 3 teenage rooms (outside the main pavilion).

This unique villa is perfectly suited for family vacations where everyone can enjoy the absolute calm and magic of the place.
When you wake up, open your eyes to what looks like paradise, a breathtaking light and the immensity of the ocean.
Before reaching the beach from your garden, take advantage of the morning coolness to play tennis, 2 steps away from your villa or some time in the fitness room.

Enjoy your stay in the Silver Rainbow villa.

The + : the immensity of the garden and the feeling of being at the end of the world

Description:
Located at the top of St Jean bay is a little paradise you will and enjoy discovering, represented by Sun Beach House.
The panoramic view is breathtaking and visible throughout the villa.
The heated pool offers a front row seat to the Caribbean Sea.
After a swim, you can relax on a deck chair or in the shade of the terrace in the lounge area.
The villa Suite Acajous is decorated with a contemporary style and is comfortable yet sleek and uncluttered.
The open kitchen has many amenities such as a wine cooler, an espresso machine, an ice machine and a gas barbecue for your romantic dinners in the open air.

The main room is fully air-conditioned, equipped with screens, and can be fully opened or closed as you wish.
The bedroom is equipped with a very large shower overlooking the sea.
Carefully decorated, you continue writing your story in a magical setting. Waking up is just as magical because the view never leaves you.

The island's many discoveries await you.
There are incredible beaches, excellent restaurants and numerous stores only a few minutes away by car.

Enjoy your stay in the villa Suite Acajous.

The + : the panoramic view on the sea

Description:
The villa Paille en Queue is an adorable property located above the lake of St-Jean and its splendid bay. Just like the bird of the same name, it is elegant and seems to glide through the azure sky.
Built on one level, you glide from one room to another with ease and pleasure.

The design is contemporary and sober. The raw wood predominates with while some decorative pieces remind you that you are in the Caribbean.
Ideal for a couple of friends who would like to live or relive the magic of St. Barts, the villa offers all the luxury you would expect from the island.

A sublime view from all four corners of the house, lush vegetation, top of the line amenities and a superb outdoor space. Between sunbathing and swimming in the pool, you relax on one of the large sofas in the outdoor living room.
At night, the atmosphere is just as warm.
The singing of the frogs doesn't disturb your long discussions to remake the world.

The time has finally come to reach one of the 2 rooms with a private bathroom. Both very comfortable and with a lot of charm, you wake up with a softness like a bird out of its nest to go to the discovery of the most beautiful beaches of the Caribbean.
Ideally located, the villa gives you the freedom to explore the east or west coast of the island.
You are only 1 minute away from the famous Eden Rock, the famous Nikki Beach restaurant and shopping at Villa Creole.

The city of Gustavia is only 5 minutes away by car. Temptations are numerous: between luxury French brands and gourmet restaurants, you will give in to the French Touch immediately.
The end of the evening lends itself to a nice walk along the docks to admire the yachts, each one as incredible as the next.

Enjoy your stay at the villa Au Paille en Queue

The + : the location of the villa and the incredible setting

Description:
At this spacious villa located in Marigot, you are immediately seduced by the vastness of space on such a small island. The large lawn, perfectly maintained, is adjacent to the property and there are breathtaking views of the ocean anywhere you stand. The colonial style house can accommodate 12 people, ideal for a family or a group of friends who would like to enjoy the intimacy of a villa while taking advantage of more secluded moments in the tranquility of private spaces. Very colorful, the property is an invitation to tranquility and a change of scenery as soon as you enter. The decoration is classically Caribbean with a nod to vintage decor. It tells the story of the island through its objects, furniture, and photos carefully arranged in the villa.

The white of the frameworks as well as beautiful contemporary pieces come to sublimate the originality of the place and break with the style of yesteryear. A delightful atmosphere that also extends to the 6 rooms, each as cheerful and comfortable as the other. All equipped with air conditioning and king size beds, three of them also overlook the ocean. An azure blue that you can admire from all the common rooms. The green marble kitchen is very well equipped and adjoins the large living room with its gazebo and large heated pool, to be enjoyed all season long. The huge terrace gives you the opportunity to enjoy the outside during the day, sheltered from the sun, as well as at night, lulled by the trade winds and the soft melody of the tropical nature. A small paradise very protected but not far from the most beautiful beaches of the island and about twenty minutes from the capital, Gustavia, where you can go shopping, have a drink or dine in one of the many delicious restaurants of the island. On your way back, you can always continue the festivities in the famous cabaret of the island, the Ti-St Barth, temple of the party and excess.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Mustique.

The + : its large spaces overlooking the ocean and its retro style.

Description:
Luxurious and contemporary, the Axel Rocks villa is a true architectural jewel located in Gustavia with a sublime panoramic view of the Caribbean Sea.
Arranged on two floors and as if suspended from the cliff, you can easily take in the breathtaking scenery. From the swimmingpool, with its submerged bar, you can gaze at the horizon tirelessly.
The very large terrace offers numerous spaces for relaxation, alone or with others.

The interior design cultivates luxury in every detail. Like a modern work of art, a billiard table awaits you in the large living room. After your game, you can choose a nice bottle of wine from the cellar and sip it at the bar next to the dining area for 8 guests. In the kitchen, you can choose to make it invisible by tinting the windows. Your chef will be able to operate in complete tranquility and not reveal any of his secrets.

The orientation of the villa brings an extraordinary luminosity to all the rooms. The glass spiral staircase allows access to three of the four bedrooms. Very spacious, the three suites offer a breathtaking sea view from their private terraces.The fourth bedroom is located on the lower floor with immediate access to the terrace and pool.
Contemporary design, uncluttered and very neat, all the rooms have a small TV lounge allowing each guest to relax in privacy.

The luxury of the facilities combined with the unique beauty of St-Barthélemy will make your stay absolutely unforgettable.
To make it even more enjoyable, you are just a few minutes walk from the sublime Shell Beach and downtown Gustavia.
The crystal clear waters invite you to go snorkeling and explore the underwater world.

In the evening, you will enjoy strolling along the harbor and visiting the many luxury boutiques before heading to one of the capital's excellent restaurants.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Axel Rocks

The +: luxurious architecture and breathtaking views

Description:
Avenstar is a sumptuous villa located on the hill of Camaruche.
Here, there is everything you would expect from a trip to St. Barts and much more.
First of all, the 180° panoramic view overlooks Lorient Bay, St-Martin and Tortuga Island in a tropical and hilly setting.
Surely one of the most beautiful views of the island.
Spacious and contemporary, the property is arranged on 3 levels and is composed of 5 bedrooms, the villa can accommodate up to 10 guests.
A small zen pool greets you as you enter, transporting you into complete relaxation. The minimalist design is both sleek and elegant.
The outdoor spaces are spread over several levels and the large infinity pool becomes a waterfall in the lower basin. Ideal for toddlers.
In the heart of this cool oasis, a mini putting green is waiting for you.
Inside, the main level welcomes gatherings. The common spaces are shared between the living room, the dining room and the open kitchen.
Two dining areas are at your disposal, the terrace and its view of the ocean or the shaded bar near the barbecue area.
The sleek yet organic style maintains the authenticity of the nature around. The decor is of mixed design, exhibiting both the natural surroundings coupled with more contemporary photographs and paintings.
The 5 suites of the property are equally refined and offer equivalent comfort and services.

With its private terrace, the suite on the upper level offers perhaps the most privacy while the suite on the main level offers a breathtaking view of the sea.
Everywhere the quality of the equipment is undeniable and the prestige of the villa unquestionable.
Designed for your well-being from dawn to night, it is impossible not to appreciate every moment spent in this exquisite and privileged place.
For trips into town for shopping and eating or to the nearby beaches, they are only a 15 minute drive away.

Enjoy your stay at the villa Avenstar.

The + : the sublime pool and its waterfall and the splendid 180° view

Description:
The villa Star deserves its name. A prestigious house nestled on the hill of Camaruche, the view on the bay of Lorient is breathtaking.
Presented by Sun Beach House, in order not to lose any of the panoramic view, glass railings secure the terrace while large openings allow you to enjoy the outside wherever you are.
The ethnic and contemporary style of the decoration gives a real identity to the villa. Numerous objects catch your eye and you browse the place with curiosity and enchantment.
The services are very high end. Luxury is everywhere but nothing is ostentatious. By day and by night, the house is dazzling, like a star of the greatest movies. The open lacquered white kitchen is next to the living room.
Three high chairs invite you to enjoy a glass of wine from the wine cabinet just to the right while one of the guests or your private chef is cooking. As if clinging to the hill, you can still see the rock.

The minimalist design of the kitchen matches perfectly with the living/dining room where each piece seems to tell you a story.
From the sofa, you enjoy a splendid 180° view, nothing disturbs the landscape.
This is not a movie set, but a real setting for your stay in St. Barts.
The outdoor space is composed of a large terrace and a superb infinity pool but also a small garden where deckchairs and umbrellas are installed to enjoy delicious moments of relaxation.
The rooms, with their modern and well cared for style, also offer a new experience of luxury.
The master bedroom overlooks the pool, the sea and the garden. It is incredible, you have to live it to believe it.
The open bathroom is in the extension of the bed.
The second room, slightly smaller, also overlooks the sea.
And the third room overlooks the hill and its tropical landscape.
Now it's up to you to write the script for your vacation in paradise.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa Star.

The + : the terrace and its splendid sight, the very neat decoration

Description:
High up in the heights of Grand Cul de Sac, the beautiful villa Iris is the ideal setting for an intimate, comfortable and relaxing stay. The view extends 180° over the hills, the lagoon of Petit-Cul de Sac and Tortue Island. The house is pristinely decorated in white from head to toe. From the roof to the furniture, everything is pure and serene. Art invites itself in black and white with beautiful pictures of the island displayed on the walls.

The large living room is oriented to enjoy the spectacular view. The comfortable sofa invites contemplation from this space completely open to the outside.
The kitchen, perfectly equipped, also benefits from the unique decor.
The indoor dining area is in close proximity while a beautiful outdoor table is located on the terrace to enjoy the mild weather and the singing of the frogs in the evening.
To relax before or after your meal, an outdoor lounge area is the perfect place to sip a nightcap before heading to one of the villa's three bedrooms.
Two of them, of equal size, are located on either side of the living room.
With a sea view, private bathroom and access to the terrace, your nights are as sweet as they are comfortable. On the lower level, the third bedroom, perhaps reserved for a teenager or companion, offers an original view of the pool.
On this floor, there is also a TV lounge and a fitness room.

Moreover, kite surfing enthusiasts will not be able to resist the urge to practice on the lagoon while the other guests will be able to taste a fine and tasty cuisine at the restaurant of the Barthélemy hotel.
Also a must, since you are right next door, is a transparent canoe ride and lunch at Ti Corail, a food truck revisited and run by a great chef to eat simple and authentic cuisine with your feet in the sand.
Not far from your villa, there are other sublime beaches and Gustavia is only 20 minutes away by car, an opportunity to enjoy the unique landscapes all along the way.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Iris.

The + : the refined design and the sublime view.

Description:
Built on the heights of Gustavia, Villa Les Grenadines offers you the luxury of large spaces and high-end equipment in an authentic and unique setting.
The villa is exceptional because of its location in Gustavia. In fact, it offers an unobstructed view of the entire harbor and a privileged access to the lively streets of the "capital", its many shops and restaurants.

The property is organized on two levels: in addition to the gym, the first level hosts a large studio with kitchen, living room, bedroom with en-suite shower room and a private terrace.
The second floor houses the other three bedrooms, the dining room, the living room and the open kitchen. Another dining area is located in the shade of the covered terrace next to the full-length pool.

All living spaces are open to the huge bay window to enjoy the incredible panorama at any time of the day.
Day or night, Gustavia offers a different atmosphere and light, a fascinating spectacle that you will never tire off.
The architecture with exposed roofs is inspired by local houses, but the furniture, equipment and materials are worthy of a luxury villa.
Very modern and contemporary, you will appreciate all the more the authenticity of the exterior decor, made of small colored houses.

You don't feel any contradiction but rather a perfect balance between luxury and charm, just like the island itself.
Take advantage of the location to stroll as often as possible through the cobblestone streets of Gustavia, the small harbor with its yachts and the delightful Shell Beach.
Let yourself be tempted by the rest of the island of St. Barts...its beautiful white sand beaches and lush vegetation.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Les Grenadines

The + : the location and the luxury of the facilities

Description:
Villa Ti-Rock is St. Barts newest luxurious jewel.
The decor is of typical Caribbean style and Inspired by local architecture, reason enough to come to the island. The property is divided into several bungalows and offers different spaces for both socializing and privacy. Sleeping up to three couples, two of the bedrooms are adjacent to the living room and the third room occupies a separate bungalow with an outdoor bathroom.

The living room opens up to both the front and back of the villa, giving a real feeling of freedom, on one side the lagoon and on the other the pool surrounded by vegetation. All the rooms are open to the outside, like the kitchen and its bar which promise you happy moments. It is a slice of paradise. A peaceful area of the outdoors offers a shaded gazebo and houses a comfortable outdoor lounge where you can lie down with a good novel or catch up with friends. There is a jacuzzi to admire the stars at night and listen to the rhythm of the tropical melodies...opposite, the terrace overlooks the magnificent lagoon of Grand Cul de Sac. The decoration, very classic, natural, and carefully thought out in the smallest details, invites you to an immediate connection to your environment and more generally to nature.

The stone, wood, and weaved fabrics contribute to the special atmosphere of this unique place. When evening comes, the villa Ti Rock reveals yet another facet, it subtly lights up and offers you a warm and bewitching atmosphere in the moonlight. Lovers of sailing sports will be happy to know that they are only a few minutes away from the best spot on the island when the capital is only twenty minutes away for your shopping afternoons or your festive evenings.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa Ti-Rock.

The + : its exotic charm and its layout with all its relaxation areas

Description:
Cette charmante villa Teddy , tout confort, est nichée sur les hauteurs de Vitet et bénéficie d'une vue extraordinaire sur l'océan, le lagon de Grand Cul-de-Sac et l'île de la Tortue.
Comme suspendue au-dessus du toit du monde, vous serez essoufflé par le panorama incroyable , incontestablement l'un des plus beaux de l'île.
Vous surplombez également la végétation tropicale, vous vous sentirez libre, léger…

Idéalement conçue pour deux couples , la maison est décorée avec goût et simplicité. Rien ne vient perturber la perfection des lieux.
Les espaces sont intelligemment conçus pour s'ouvrir sur le monde extérieur et ne rien manquer du paysage.
Les matériaux utilisés sont nobles et de qualité. Quant au mobilier, principalement en bois, il contribue à la sérénité de la villa.
Tout est beau, simple et fonctionnel.
Place à la détente, aux plaisirs et aux souvenirs…
Regardez, vous voyez des tortues dans le lagon… alors allez les saluer lors d'une sortie snorkeling.

Autre activité incontournable du lagon : une balade en pirogue transparente.
Vous poursuivrez par un déjeuner simple et savoureux au food truck de Ti-Corail, avant de terminer par un cocktail au bar de l'hôtel Barthélemy, le tout à 5 minutes de votre villa.
Le soir, pourquoi ne pas cuisiner des langoustes au barbecue et redécouvrir le monde… un dernier bain de minuit avant d'aller vous coucher.

Profitez de votre séjour à la Villa Teddy.

Le + : un panorama à couper le souffle

Description:
Spacious colonial style villa, the property is ideal to welcome a large family during a vacation in Saint-Barthélemy.
The house is organized on 2 floors. The rooms located on the upper level, such as the living room, open onto the fully equipped kitchen with a bar for your breakfasts or snacks.
Overlooking the perfectly shaded terrace, you can enjoy the mild climate at any time of the day from one of the sofas in the indoor or outdoor living room. Your choice.

Also, you'll enjoy dining on the terrace table while admiring the breathtaking view from morning to night with incredible sunsets.
The style of the house reflects the authenticity of the Corossol neighborhood. You will enjoy a contemporary and modern interior for the living rooms and a more typical decoration for the rooms, the furniture reminds you of the old colonial houses for a total change of scenery.

The two rooms on the top floor have a private terrace and the two on the bottom floor have direct access to the pool.
Two large staircases lead you to your favorite place to relax, a large pool lined with a wooden deck and beautiful tropical vegetation.
And if the property is still not big enough for your happy family, it is possible to rent the neighboring villa, Petit Saint Louis, for an extra room.

Indeed, the property is located in one of the most preserved areas of St. Barts, a small old fishing port located on a beautiful sandy beach.


Enjoy your stay at the Villa Saint-Louis

The + : the charm of a large colonial style villa and the possibility to twin the small villa next door.

Description:
Villa La Carette is ideal for vacations with family or friends and can accommodate 4 guests or 2 couples. The house boasts traditional architecture and overlooks the sublime bay of Lorient, offering a breathtaking panoramic view that you will never tire of, no matter how long you stay. The luxurious vegetation surrounding the villa adds to the charm and authenticity of the place.

This spacious home will entice you with its typical Caribbean style. You will appreciate the period furniture such as the four-poster bed, the charming secretary, or the large wooden armchairs in the bedrooms. The last two rooms feature a private terrace to enjoy the panorama in complete privacy, equipped with very comfortable lounge chairs.

The living areas are just as welcoming, and the large openings allow you to enjoy the panorama on all occasions. Relaxation continues in the lounge area, sheltered by the gazebo, where you can share delicious moments of conviviality day and night, to the rhythm of the gentle tropical melody.

To refresh yourself, the swimming pool is only a few steps away and also gives you the opportunity to admire the magnificent bay of Lorient a little closer. Located in the heart of the island, you are only a few minutes' drive to Gustavia, the capital, or to explore the many beaches of Saint-Barthélemy.

Enjoy your stay at Villa La Carette.

The + : The complex is divided into two villas with authentic charm.

Description:
From the villa Eden View, you have a front row seat to an incredible view of the sublime bay of St-Jean, the famous Eden Rock hotel and the green hills sheltering the small landing strip.
In the extension of the wooden terrace, a long infinity pool gives you the leisure to observe the joyful ballet of the small motor planes, the different shades of turquoise and azure blue but also the numerous turtles that have come to feed in the seagrass beds of the bay.

On the side of the cliff, the house is completely open to the breathtaking panorama. Comfortable armchairs invite you to contemplate and relax and you will appreciate the serenity.
A soft atmosphere due to the careful choice of furniture and decoration: simple, contemporary with a few colored and handcrafted touches to complete the warm atmosphere of the large living room.

The kitchen, slightly isolated, allows you to welcome the services of a chef or to cook in all tranquility while having high-end equipment.
The two bedrooms are located on either side of the main room to offer each couple the privacy they are looking for. Comfortable, modern and fully equipped, they offer immediate access to the terrace and pool.
If you manage to leave your little paradise, you should know that the villa is ideally located in the heart of Saint-Barthélemy. You are only ten minutes away from the lively streets of the "capital" Gustavia and never far from a sublime beach.

You can't miss the opportunity to have lunch with your feet in the sand at the "Sand Bar", the restaurant of the mythical Eden Rock.

Enjoy your stay at the villa Eden View

The + : one of the most beautiful panoramas of the island of St-Barts

Description:
A charming villa located in the heights of the Anse des Cayes, the Nagabaaja villa is a home where you feel immediately at ease.
The Caribbean architecture invites you to tranquility while gazing at the splendid panorama.
The ocean spans as far as the eye can see, while the colored roofs of the Creole houses and the rich vegetation are seen on land.
The large, semi-covered terrace allows you to enjoy the scenery at any time of the day: sheltered from the sun while comfortably seated in one of the sofas of the outdoor living room or stretched out on one of the deckchairs to enjoy some sun bathing and a luxurious heated pool to welcome a refreshing swim.

The living room, cozy and colorful, welcomes you for a moment of relaxation with family or friends, unless you prefer to settle in the outdoor living room and enjoy a gentle breeze to savor your aperitif.
A small desk and a printer are at your disposal for any of your business needs.
Wifi is available throughout the house.
Almost like a living gallery, the works of Kool Koor adorn the walls of the villa.
The kitchen area is open to the living room so as not to lose any of the conviviality of the place. Very well equipped, you will enjoy cooking with friends or family and tasting local specialties.
Why not take advantage of the BBQ to grill a lobster or some fresh local fish?

The four rooms located on two levels offer equivalent comfort.
Three rooms have an adjoining bathroom, a terrace and a sea view.
The fourth room also has an adjoining bathroom, without a terrace with a view of the zion, the uninhabited lands of St. Barts.
All equipped with air conditioning, they offer you the Caribbean charm with all the expected equipment.
A few minutes from your villa, the town of Gustavia welcomes you for a romantic or festive dinner. During the day, you will enjoy strolling through the streets and discovering the many luxury and non-luxury stores.
The harbor is a must-see as the excessiveness of the yachts rubs shoulders with the simplicity of the surroundings.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Nagabaaja.

The + : the large terrace facing the sea

During the festive period, minimum rental of 10 nights if the booking includes Christmas or New Year's Eve and 14 nights if both dates are included.

Description:
Villa Kaz has all the charm and exoticism you expect from your vacation in St. Barts.
Nestled on the hill of Grand Cul de Sac, the property is on two levels facing the sublime lagoon.
The lower level is home to a very large, light and airy living room that gives you the feeling of living outside while being protected from the heat. The kitschen is adjacent to the living area, making for a comfortable and social living space.

Behind the living room, a large dining table invites you, feet in the grass, to enjoy a good meal sheltered from the sun by a stretched canvas.
In the continuity of this large space, the deck extends to the swimming pool lined with tropical vegetation and deck chairs to relax and admire the incredible panorama.

Access to the rooms is via a staircase. Each room has privacy and a sea view. One of the rooms is located on a higher level and has a private terrace while the other two share a large balcony and are accessible from another level.
The shower rooms of these last two rooms overlook a charming green wall.
You will appreciate the style and care taken in the decoration and fittings.
A refined luxury that fits perfectly with the exotic and paradisiacal environment that faces you.
Lovers of sailing sports will be happy to stay near the best spot on the island which also offers beautiful snorkeling options.

A few minutes by car separates you from the other beaches of the island and the lively neighborhoods of St-Jean and Gustavia.

Enjoy your stay at Villa KAZ

The + : the refinement and serenity of the place facing the sublime lagoon

Description:
Luxurious property located in Colombier, the recent villa Les Palmes is made to welcome a large family or a large group of friends and offers 5 bedrooms.
Thus, all the spaces are spacious and designed for conviviality.
First of all, the large open-plan living room with a comfortable outdoor living room on one side and the huge terrace with its infinity pool on the other.
Between the two, the room is divided into 3 subtly delineated spaces, the living room, the dining room and the kitchen, offering everyone the possibility to isolate themselves while being with the group.

The swimming pool, with its turquoise and crystal clear water, is an oasis of coolness waiting for you.
The property benefits from a generous tropical vegetation and does not deprive itself of making its guests benefit from it in the layout of the place.
The general architecture of the villa, the chosen materials, the equipment and the decoration are at the service of your comfort and your well-being. Luxury coexists with charm without exaggeration or superficiality.
Nature is everywhere to remind you that you are in the Caribbean and the high quality services that you are in St-Barts.

The rooms are spread over two levels: three of them are located on the main level and all have a private terrace and a sublime view of Flamand Bay.
The third one even offers the luxury of a shower and an outdoor bathtub for unforgettable moments of relaxation for one or two.
The last two are located on the lower level and also have a private terrace overlooking the lush vegetation.

Sports enthusiasts will be happy to take advantage of a well-equipped fitness room!
And if the villa is still not big enough for you, you can couple it with the neighboring villa Les Roches.
Identical to the villa les Palmes, you double the capacity of reception and the moments of pleasure!

Enjoy your stay at the Villa les Palmes.

The + : the possibility of renting the 2 villas together and the level of service

Description:
Luxurious property located in Colombier, the recent villa Les Roches is made to welcome a large family or a large group of friends and offers 5 bedrooms.
Thus, all the spaces are spacious and designed for conviviality.
First of all with the large open and crossing living room: on one side, a comfortable outdoor living room and on the other, the huge terrace and its infinity pool.
Between the two, the room is divided into 3 subtly delineated spaces, the living room, the dining room and the kitchen, offering everyone the possibility to isolate themselves while being with the group.

The swimming pool, with its turquoise and crystal clear water, is an oasis of coolness waiting for you.
The property benefits from a generous tropical vegetation and does not deprive itself of making its guests benefit from it in the layout of the place.
The general architecture of the villa, the chosen materials, the equipment and the decoration are at the service of your comfort and your well-being.
Luxury coexists with charm without exaggeration or superficiality.
Nature is everywhere to remind you that you are in the Caribbean and the high quality services that you are in St-Barts.

The rooms are spread over two levels:three of them are located on the main level and all have a private terrace and a sublime view of Flamand Bay.
One of the 3 rooms, the master, even offers the luxury of a shower and an outdoor bathtub for unforgettable moments of relaxation for one or two.
The last two are located on the lower level and also benefit from a private terrace open to the lush vegetation.

Sports enthusiasts will be happy to take advantage of a well-equipped fitness room and a massage room.
And if the villa is still not big enough for you, you can couple it with the neighboring villa Les Palmes.
Identical to the villa Les Palmes, you double the capacity of reception and the moments of pleasure!

Enjoy your stay at the Villa les Roches.

The + : the possibility of renting the 2 villas together and the level of service

Description:
Perched in the heights of Vitet is the sublime Villa Mamiami.
The view will immediately grab your attention, overlooking the green hill and the blue sea Azur.
Between this magnificent panorama and you there is only the immense swimming pool of crystal clear water.
Take a dip and then lounge on one of the deck chairs.The entire property is welcoming and comfortable.

Everywhere is a place to curl up or to gather with others. The kitchen is L-shaped and allows the cook to enjoy preparing a meal yet still able to chat with others sitting nearby. At dinner time, you will undoubtedly prefer the outdoor dining area, the table a massive and thick wood imposed by its size and its authenticity.
A place that is very conducive to cheerful and sincere discussions.
The evening continues on one of the 3 sofas of the living room from where you can still feel the soft breeze of the sea air.
There is nothing more delicious than to end the day like this if not to reach your room.
Again, the decor is simple and elegant, the style casual and comfortable. It's exactly what you've been dreaming of to escape your daily routine.

The 3 rooms overlook the sea and are equipped with a private bathroom. The master, located in a separate bungalow, has a glass alcove with a sofa. From there, you can imagine yourself relaxing, reading or daydreaming.To reach the bungalows of the two other rooms, of equal size, follow the small stone path. In the bathroom of one of them, a glass window overlooks a lush tropical garden, a real work of art.
The sweetness of life is everywhere in the villa.
Escape for a few hours to discover the surrounding beaches or have dinner in Gustavia, the return home will be all the more pleasant.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Mamiami.

Description:
The luxurious villa Sasha is organized on two levels and borrows its architectural style from the charm of the Creole huts with all the modernity that one can expect from a contemporary construction.
You enter the villa from a large parking lot to reach the main level distributed between the living room and the dining area, two buildings connected by the roof housing a comfortable lounge area. From there, you face a sublime view of Corossol Bay, its turquoise waters, its numerous sailboats and its sea turtles. The decor is dazzling.

The large heated infinity pool is lined with 6 lounge chairs for delicious moments of relaxation with family or friends.
The blue of the pool merges with the blue of the ocean and you are gently rocked by the trade winds.
In the evening, you will enjoy strolling between the bar, the comfortable lounge area or rediscovering the world around a dinner "under the stars" barefoot in the lawn.
The decoration is delicate, elegant and made of natural materials to fit perfectly with the surrounding nature, tropical and lush.

Like the rest of the villa, the bedrooms are equally warm. Two are on the first floor and have access to a long terrace, while the last one is on the main level.
All have private bathrooms and ocean views, so you'll enjoy the privacy of being here without leaving the incredible view.
Only a few minutes from the airport, Gustavia and the St-Jean district, it won’t take long by car to explore a new beach or enjoy a good meal in one of the capital's gourmet restaurants.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Sasha.

The + : the location and the refined style of the decoration.

Description:
Villa Bianca is a property whose architecture perfectly complements its environment. Nestled on the heights of Corossol, the house enjoys a panoramic view of the ocean and the many sailboats at anchor. The layout of the house includes 2 living spaces with a covered outdoor area in between them to allow for outdoor dining and relaxing.

The gazebo also has a barbecue and water to aid in the preparation of your grilled evenings! The house can accommodate 8 guests, so everyone can have some privacy and convene when they want. The kitchen, with its long bar is ideal for breakfast or to receive the services of a chef. All the rooms are oriented towards the splendid panorama which offers an around the clock spectacular view. You will have all the leisure to admire it from the large terrace and its infinity pool.

The minimalist and uncluttered decoration, with natural tones and organic materials, gives the place a very relaxing atmosphere. The furniture is as comfortable as it is functional. As for the amenities, they are of the highest quality and will only enhance the daily life of your vacation. As for the rooms, there are four of them, two on the first floor and two on the lower level. Carefully decorated and also very well equipped, they have private bathrooms all overlooking the vegetation. What happiness to wake up in front of such a decor.

And finally, a fitness room with everything you would need!

Located in the authentic Corossol district, you are still only a few minutes away from Gustavia, its many stores and delicious restaurants. Bianca can be rented together with its neighboring villa June, which can accommodate 20 guests.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Bianca.

The + : the level of service of the house and the location.

Description:
Villa June is a promise of serenity, comfort and luxury that you will rarely experience.
Built on a hillside, the property enjoys an exceptional setting overlooking the ocean and Corossol Bay.

Built on several levels, you can access it from a large parking lot and an elevator, rare enough in St-Barts to be highlighted.
The house can accommodate 12 guests comfortably.
The living areas are spacious, airy and all facing the splendid panorama.
The contemporary style, the high-end equipment and the comfort of the facilities all contribute to enhancing your vacation.

There is ample space for family and friends to gather. Even the bar can accommodate 10 people for breakfast or an aperitif.
For fun, a foosball table and backgammon are prominently featured in the living area.
You will enjoy having your meals in the shade of the terrace on the huge wooden table.

The view will take your breath away...but not your appetite...because the open and fully equipped kitchen can easily accommodate the services of a private chef.
After lunch, relax on one of the deck chairs.
The infinity pool merges with the turquoise horizon, just as dreams merge with reality.
On the night side, the 6 bedrooms are of equal standing and are divided between the main and lower levels.
They are all equipped with a private bathroom and all have a breathtaking view of the ocean. Some have a small office space.
The villa has even more surprises in store for you on the lower level with a fitness room equipped with a treadmill, elliptical, bike, workout bench, weights, exercise balls, yoga mat, refrigerator and Sonos sound system as well as a movie room with a big screen and huge armchairs and sofa beds.

If you feel like leaving the villa, you are only a few minutes drive from Gustavia with all its stores, restaurants and bars!
June can be rented together with its neighboring villa Bianca, thus accommodating 20 people.

Enjoy your stay at villa June.

The + : the level of equipment and the cinema room

Description:
This large, “Arrow Marine” villa welcomes you and your family or friends for an unforgettable stay in St. Barts.
Located in the private neighborhood of Mont-Jean, the large property offers you a confidential, intimate but above all heavenly vacation setting.
Bordered by lush tropical vegetation, the house offers breathtaking views of Marigot on one side and a large swimming pool on the other.
The immensity of the turquoise panorama and the large garden give you the impression of being alone in the world.

The architecture of the house is inspired by West Indian houses with exposed timbers.
The generous volumes, immaculate white walls and transverse opening give the main living space a special comfort and aesthetic.
Authenticity blends with contemporary, refined design to perfect the beauty of the space.
The luxury of this villa lies in the right balance between its charm, modernity and unique environment.

It's in this exceptional setting that you can share delicious moments around the open kitchen bar, in the shade of the terrace, comfortably seated in the outdoor lounge area or on one of the deckchairs lining the large swimming pool.
Outdoor showers, barbecues and coolers are at your disposal to prolong these moments of pleasure.
At night, the 4 bedrooms offer equivalent comfort, two overlooking the lagoon while the other two open onto the terrace and pool. All have king-size beds and spacious en-suite bathrooms.

Here again, the decor blends Caribbean charm with the comfort of the facilities.
As the island's beauty also extends to the rest of the island, all you need to do is take the car for a few minutes to explore one of the fifteen incredible beaches or treat yourself to a lively evening in one of Gustavia's restaurants.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Arrow Marine.

The plus: the immense garden and the beautiful panorama of Marigot bay.

Description:
Sublime property located in the Anse des Lézards neighborhood, the villa Les Lataniers enjoys a breathtaking view of the Caribbean Sea. Inspired by colonial style, the house offers a rather traditional architecture mixing the charm of yesteryear and the comfort of modern amenities. The decoration is particularly well done and you will enjoy lingering in each room of the house to discover the many decorative objects that seem to come from a distant expedition. The journey already begins... Wait until you see the very large teak terrace and its infinity pool. Heated, you can enjoy it all year long and at any time of the day.

The living rooms follow one another, offering both a beautiful space to receive the 14 guests while allowing everyone to find themselves in the privacy of a cozy and intimate space. Completely open to the outside, you can enjoy the gentle trade winds and the melody of the ocean throughout the day. As for charm, the professional kitchen is no exception, it is as beautifully decorated as it is well equipped. A pleasure to cook or to receive the services of a private chef. The journey continues in the rooms. Each of the 6 main rooms offers a different atmosphere always combining a colonial style and a more contemporary design.

The decoration is really incredible and gives this villa a unique cachet! Sometimes the old portrait of a supposed grandfather, sometimes a transparent suitcase filled with globes...it's like being in a museum. They have private bathrooms and access to a terrace. The seventh room is smaller and is suitable for two children or your accompanying staff. To top it all off, the master bedroom has a private terrace with a Jacuzzi! Sports enthusiasts can enjoy a well-equipped fitness room. Ideally located, you are only 10 minutes from Gustavia or St-Jean to enjoy the beautiful beaches or the lively streets of the "capital": shopping, restaurants, strolling along the yachts.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa les Lataniers.

The + : the incredible decoration and the possibility to rent the villa with the neighboring villa Lo Scogliofor a total capacity of 11 rooms.

Include continental breakfast every morning

Description:
Charming villa Lo Scoglio overlooks the Caribbean Sea, and you breathe the charm of the Caribbean as soon as you enter the house.
The living areas are spacious and airy, opening onto a large shaded terrace where you can enjoy your meals without losing a minute of the beauty of the panorama.
The pool is heated, and welcomes you to enjoy it all day long.
The decoration is crisp. The walls are white, the furniture in neutral tones.
The simplicity of the decor is a welcome invitation to enjoy your beautiful, colorful and natural surroundings.

The house has 4 bedrooms, the first one has a private Jacuzzi and an adjacent bathroom, another one is located in an independent bungalow and shares the bathroom with the second bedroom.
The 4th bedroom is located in a separate studio with bathroom and kitchenette, ideal for a couple who would like more privacy or for accompanying staff.
Very well located, the villa is only 10 minutes away from Gustavia, where you can enjoy festive and/or gastronomic evenings after having strolled through the lively shopping streets of this area of the island.

A tasty mix between the charm of the West Indies and the French elegance, a unique experience.
Also, you will have plenty of time to discover the magnificent beaches of Saint-Barthélemy, most of which are still very wild.
Between luxury and change of scenery, you will spend unforgettable moments with your friends or family.
Moreover, the villa Lo Scoglio can be rented with the superb neighboring villa Les Lataniers which have 6 adult rooms and one child's room for a total capacity of 11 rooms.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Lo Scoglio.

The + : the wild setting and the possibility to rent the neighboring villa

Description:
Lovers of wide open spaces will be immediately seduced by the wild, unspoilt environment on this side of the island. A long promenade recently laid out along the coast offers joggers or walkers precious moments of letting go.
The view of the ocean from the villa Cacao is just as breathtaking. In the distance, you can see the islands of St. Kitts, Nevis and St. Eustatius. The whole house is open and directed towards this splendid panorama.

The two sofas in the living room face the sea, as does the kitchen, whose central island allows you to cook while enjoying the view.
The dining area, with room for 10 guests, is located in the shade of the outdoor terrace and promises even more convivial moments, again facing the sea. The gas barbecue is ideal for grilling.
As an extension of the horizon, the infinity pool completes your stay in St. Barts.
Between swims, take advantage of the fitness room to recharge your batteries.

As the rest of the island still has plenty to offer, you can choose to go either way to explore a magnificent beach or to reconnect with a bit of civilization in St-Jean, Lorient or Gustavia, the "capital".
So many opportunities to savor lush, tropical nature, a breathtaking view around a bend in the road or a family of goats clinging to a hill...

Back at the villa, 4 beautiful, comfortable and spacious bedrooms promise a good night's rest.
Three of them are on the main level, opening onto the terrace and featuring en suite bathrooms, dressing rooms and all the expected amenities: HD-TV with Dish Network, Canal Satellite, Apple TV, WIFI, air conditioning, ceiling fan, sitting area, safe.
The last one is on the lower level and enjoys more privacy with a real kitchen area and a private terrace, in addition to the adjacent bathroom. A small studio with a sea view, ideal for a couple seeking peace and quiet, or for accompanying staff.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Cacao

The plus: the unspoilt, wild environment

Description:
The Privilège apartment lives up to its name. Staying here is a truly unique experience.
The building housing this vast apartment has just been erected and boasts an exceptional view of the port.
Day or night, you can't get enough of the boats coming and going, the glittering reflections of the harbor, let alone the incredible sunsets.
You'll have a front-row seat, as if...privileged.
Sheltered from the sun, all the convivial spaces are outside: the small lounge and the large dining table invite you to renew acquaintances in this exceptional setting.
The infinity pool is the perfect vantage point.
From here, you can admire the hustle and bustle of local life by day and the starry night sky by night.
Inside, you'll find a fully-equipped kitchen, where you can enjoy your morning coffee while realizing that this setting is real. In the evening, you'll enjoy the comfort of the large sofa for a nightcap before retiring to one of the three beautiful bedrooms.

All are en-suite and equally comfortable, and you'll appreciate the care taken in the choice of furnishings and materials.
The level of furnishings and decoration is in keeping with the high standards expected: contemporary and warm, with a desire for sobriety and a touch of originality.
The atmosphere is soft and elegant, setting the tone for your stay: luxury and voluptuousness.
The privilege also lies in the location, right in the heart of Gustavia.
Just a stone's throw from restaurants, bars and boutiques, you can end the day with a stroll along the marina and past the many yachts while you decide where to dine, without even taking the car.
A true luxury during the festive season or the many local events.
The city is yours, and soon you'll have your own habits and greetings from the local shopkeepers.

Enjoy your stay at Apartment Privilège.

The plus: the location and the breathtaking view of the port.

Description:
Nestled in the tranquil setting of Anse des Cayes in St. Barts, Villa Firefly is an architectural marvel offered by Sun Beach House. With seven luxurious bedrooms and a design that harmoniously blends with the natural environment, this property represents the pinnacle of island elegance and modern comfort, promising its guests an extraordinary living experience.

Villa Firefly impresses at first glance with its bold architecture and vast open spaces that capture natural light and offer stunning ocean views. The interior design, which combines modernity with traditional touches, creates a warm and welcoming ambiance, inviting relaxation and socializing.

Each room is an ode to understated luxury, offering magnificent views of the sea or the lush gardens surrounding the villa. The en-suite bathrooms, equipped with high-end finishes, add a touch of refinement and ensure absolute privacy and comfort for all guests.
At the heart of Villa Firefly, the infinity pool is a true masterpiece, surrounded by a generous terrace and elegant lounge areas, perfect for enjoying the Caribbean sun or an alfresco dinner under the stars. The fully equipped kitchen is a dream for chefs, providing the perfect space to prepare gourmet meals or light snacks to enjoy throughout the day.

Anse des Cayes is renowned for its tranquil beach and relaxing atmosphere, making Villa Firefly a haven for those seeking to escape the hustle and bustle of daily life. At the same time, its proximity to Gustavia and St. Jean ensures easy access to the luxury boutiques, gourmet restaurants, and water activities that St. Barts has to offer.
Opting for Villa Firefly means choosing a retreat where exceptional design meets ultimate comfort in one of the world's most coveted destinations. Sun Beach House is committed to providing an unmatched experience, where every detail has been carefully considered to enrich your stay and create memories that will last a lifetime.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Firefly

Description:
The luxurious Villa La Plage enjoys the blessings of a perfect location.
Guests relaxing on the magnificent terrace have the choice of taking a refreshing dip in the swimming pool or plunging into the clear ocean water just steps away across a white sand beach.
Situated near the east end of Plage de Lorient,Villa La Plage one of beachfront properties available on the island, an extraordinary home in an ideal spot straight out of a postcard.

The architectural design of Villa La Plage's indoor and outdoor spaces merges perfectly the living and dining areas with the terrace and the spectacular view over the blue waters of the bay.
The gorgeous swimming pool and inviting Jacuzzi provide a focal point for afternoons of relaxing in the sun.

In the evening, plentiful sheltered seating, pleasant lighting and a bar on the patio make the space suitable for socializing or just quietly enjoying the night breeze.Two fully equipped kitchens offer the option of making meal preparation a social experience or of having a chef prepare a sumptuous dinner apart from guests in a more traditional style.

Villa La Plage's five bedrooms are similar in size and luxury, all with king beds, private terraces and luxurious ensuite baths with double vanities and rain-head showers.
HDTV's, dark wood furnishings, and linens and bathrobes of the highest quality complete the vision of comfort these rooms provide. In addition to the five bedrooms in the main house, guests now have the option of renting the villa's second beautifulbuilding, a two-bedroom beach house that also contains an extra kitchen/living room and patio.
This new configuration preserves the villa’s sense of intimacy, and offers increased privacy for larger groups.

Enjoy your stay at Villa La Plage

Description:
Villa Utopic: Large and elegant, Villa Utopic is a 5 bedroom villa that can accommodate both your need for relaxation and the possibility of endless entertainment! Here, everything exudes joie de vivre, starting with the views of the expansive Caribbean Sea, the port of Gustavia and the village of Corossol. The uncluttered, modern and colorful decor immediately invites you into an atmosphere in the huge enclosed air-conditioned lounge, or in the covered, outdoor lounge adjoining the terrace. The incredible panorama is visible from every room and bathroom.

One of the bedrooms is on the main level, and the other 4 are on the upper level of the villa, accessible by stairs or elevator. The intimacy of the spacious, well-equipped bedrooms, each with its own sitting area, makes for a delightful moment of relaxation. The living spaces are conducive to large gatherings, laughter and joy in a most exceptional setting. The swimming pool, which measures 19 meters in length is simply breathtaking. The pool is heated, offering a comfortable temperature for all times of the day. There are also huge lounge sofas to sit on and relax.

The kitchen is fully equipped for a private chef or for meals of your own creation. Imagine your vacation menu. Pleasure, well-being and wonderful memories. The space is ideal for a reception to mark a special event or joyous celebration. To perfect its unique style, the villa's lighting and artwork are by the renowned photographer Désirée Dolron. "Utopian" but real and beautiful, this luxurious villa could be your future vacation destination...

Just a few minutes from Gustavia town center, with its shops, restaurants and bars, don't miss a stroll through the narrow streets of Corossol, a former fishing village and the island's most authentic district.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Utopic.

The + : spectacular views and huge pool.

Description:
Like a palace in the Orient, you discover the irresistible charm of the Mauresque villa.
From here, you'll be able to recount the legend of a thousand and one nights, even if there are only seven.
Set on the heights of Corossol, the view over Gustavia Bay is as bewitching by day as it is by night, with the glitter of boats on the sea.
The house has been designed on 4 levels, allowing guests to enjoy both convivial moments and sweet moments of intimacy.
Surrounded by lush vegetation, the infinity pool appears like an oasis, surrounded by two terraces.

You'll dream of taking a refreshing dip while savoring the splendid panorama from the charming recess.
The style and decoration are inspired by the finest Middle Eastern Ryads.
Mosaics, colorful fabrics, embroidery, carpets, lanterns, draperies, earthenware and other typical objects capture all the charm of the Orient.
Delicately subdued lighting adds to the serenity of the setting.
You'll feel like you're in another world, and the charm will take effect immediately.

In fact, you're not taking one trip, but two in one.
From one alcove to the next, you experience the refinement of the villa with great ease.
Naturally, there's plenty of space for socializing, and you'll enjoy getting together to sip a mint tea or even a cocktail.

With room for 8 guests, the Mauresque villa also features several dining areas, including one facing the ocean on the magnificent wrought-iron and mosaic table.
The oriental magic continues in the 4 bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms.
The master bedroom is on the main level, with its own private terrace. Two others are housed in independent bungalows, and the last, a little further away, overlooks the pool.
Each room overlooks the ocean. Between fairytale and reality, your nights are sure to be sweet and pleasant.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Mauresque.

The plus: the refined oriental charm of the house overlooking Gustavia harbour.

Description:
Discover Villa Only You, a true gem nestled in the exclusive Petit Cul de Sac district of Saint-Barthélemy. This sumptuous luxury property welcomes you with its 5 spacious bedrooms, each offering a unique atmosphere and 5 private bathrooms, all elegantly decorated for your absolute comfort.

The villa is equipped with a heated swimming pool where you can relax and enjoy the idyllic climate of Saint-Barthélemy all year round. For fitness enthusiasts, a private gym is at your disposal, equipped with the most modern equipment to maintain your exercise routine even on vacation.
The design of Villa Only You combines contemporary elegance with Caribbean charm, creating a harmonious and welcoming space. Living spaces are large and bright, with stunning views of the sea and the lush gardens that surround the property. Spacious terraces offer perfect places to bask in the sun or enjoy an alfresco meal while admiring the scenery.

Every detail of Villa Only You has been carefully thought out to provide an exceptional stay experience. Whether you're looking to escape for a peaceful retreat or to enjoy dynamic activities, this villa is the ideal place for a dream vacation under the radiant Caribbean sun.
Come and discover this private paradise and let yourself be seduced by the luxurious serenity of Villa Only You, your next destination for an unforgettable getaway.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Only you

Description:
Probably one of the most luxurious villas in St. Barths, the Blanc Bleu property offers a vacation setting worthy of the world's greatest palaces. Located in the heights of Gouverneur, the estate overlooks the ocean and offers sublime sunsets every evening. The large infinity pool is central to the villa and is lined with palm trees and even and outdoor bar. There are a host of welcoming, convivial lounging spaces. Everything has been thoughtfully designed for your comfort.

From the immense kitchen opening onto the living room to the countless facilities available and the 6 spectacularly appointed suites, the villa is simply unique. You can take full advantage of nature and the incredible panoramic views from every corner of the property.Every room is a breath of fresh air and well-being, and it's hard to describe the magic of this place. The architectural style is inspired by the mansions of yesteryear, while offering a very modern version of Caribbean charm. The choice of materials, all organic, reflects a deliberate desire to blend in as perfectly as possible with its surroundings, without compromising on the comfort of the facilities.

There's a well-equipped fitness room and a paddle court for some fun games. As its name suggests, the villa is decorated in white and blue, with exceptional furnishings such as the huge dining table on the terrace, beautiful paintings and photographs, some by local artists, and objects with more distant influences. When evening comes, the villa lights up and the magic continues! Why not relax in the Jacuzzi and watch the stars come out? You can also observe the sublime panorama from the immense terrace of the master suite, offering guests perfect privacy and an unforgettable moment.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Blanc Bleu.

The +: Palace-style amenities and huge infinity pool.

Description:
Aura: An incredible property located in the Gouverneur district, Villa Aura offers an unforgettable setting for your St. Barts vacation. The beauty of the setting is immediately apparent. In a Balinese style, wood dominates the architecture of the house, perfectly blending with its lush, tropical surroundings. Across the deck, palm and coconut trees coexist with the luxury of the full-length swimming pool and Jacuzzi area, accommodating up to 12 people in both the pool and the sunken adjoining lounge. Perfection is evident throughout.

Under the shade of the terrace, a huge wooden table awaits you for your meals. The kitchen, open to the living room and featuring a large window overlooking the greenery, also serves as a convivial spot where you can enjoy breakfast on the magnificent marble island. Fully equipped, it is ready to accommodate the services of a private chef. Adjacent, the lounge invites relaxation, open on either side, to enjoy the gentle trade winds in an atmosphere filled with charm and refinement, or the coolness of air conditioning.

As a centerpiece, a vibrant, colorful canvas adorns one of the walls, but can be transformed into a large screen for watching movies. All bedrooms are located on the main level and come with en-suite bathrooms. Five of these bedrooms have direct access to the large terrace, while the last one, slightly smaller, is equally comfortable and welcoming. The clean, wooden style immediately immerses you in a relaxing ambiance, conducive to quality rest. The marble shower rooms offer all the refreshment you could desire, and the outdoor shower in one of the bedrooms is a true luxury. For the more active guests, a fitness room is available, while others might prefer the sun loungers on the villa’s roof, boasting breathtaking ocean views—an ideal spot for sunbathing or evening aperitif to watch the sunset!

Enjoy your stay at Villa Aura.

The plus: the all-wooden architecture creates a very relaxing atmosphere, complemented by the rooftop sun deck!

Description:
With its breathtaking views and 2 infinity pools, the Maison de la Luz in the Corossol heights offers you the very best of St. Barts.
Built on 3 levels, the property is distinguished by its layout, giving each living space volume, comfort and great privacy.
All living areas are equally suited to conviviality and relaxation, according to the mood and desires of each individual.
The highly contemporary architecture is in perfect harmony with its surroundings. In fact, all spaces are open to the outdoors, with breathtaking views over Corossol Bay and Gustavia.
Day or night, the view is breathtaking.

The property is also surrounded by tropical vegetation and tall, beautiful palm trees, a true haven of peace just 5 minutes from Gustavia's lively streets.
Sheltered from the sun, the dining area adjoins a large, comfortable lounge area where you can enjoy an aperitif or digestif...as you wish. The very large kitchen is perfectly equipped to accommodate your private chef and boasts a beautiful wine cellar.
The 3 bedrooms offer sea views and are spread over 3 levels. They guarantee each guest the utmost privacy.
All very spacious, perfectly equipped and with private bathrooms, they will contribute to the quality of your stay, for restful nights and unique awakenings...
The two bedrooms on the lower level are equipped with their own private pool

Maison de la Luz is ideal for a large family in search of conviviality and tranquility.The decor is contemporary and uncluttered...except for the colorful seating!
As you head down to the village of Corossol, an old fishing village and authentic part of St. Barts, you'll discover a lovely little beach and a seabed filled with exotic fish and turtles.
Alternatively, it's just a short drive to dozens of the island's other splendid beaches.

Enjoy your stay in Maison de la Luz

The plus: 2 swimming pools and a breathtaking view of Gustavia Bay.

Description:
The immense Lagon Vert estate welcomes you for a dream holiday!
An idyllic reunion spot, the villa is located in the highly sought-after and confidential Domaine du Levant, in Petit Cul de Sac.
The immensity of the house means it can accommodate 7 couples in the utmost comfort and tranquility.
There's a bungalow for every room, and relaxation areas all over the property.
You won't have enough time in a day to experience all the lounges, gazebos, terraces, sunbathing areas...and other nooks and crannies dedicated to farniente and conviviality.

Two swimming pools add to the villa's luxury and comfort. One is on the front terrace, the other on the back.
It's a magical place, too, because it's so secluded from the neighborhood. So you have an extraordinary panorama all to yourself! It's truly unique.
There are few places where nothing can disturb your serenity.
So you can share many moments with your family, while still allowing yourself the rest and relaxation you desire.
The house is of recent construction and designed to benefit from the trade winds throughout the day. The living spaces are very pleasant and always well ventilated.

All 7 rooms have a different charm but the same level of equipment. All have air-conditioning, en-suite bathrooms, king-size beds and safes.
Three of them have direct access to the terrace and swimming pool.
Sports enthusiasts will be delighted to have access to a private tennis court right at the entrance to the estate. Kayaks are also available for exploring the beauty of the lagoon.
Likewise, you can't leave St. Barts without visiting one of the island's secret treasures: the natural pools, right next to the property. Take someone who knows the area with you, for safety and to make sure you find them!

Enjoy your stay at Villa du Lagon Vert.

The +: the location in the Le Levant estate, its two pools and its incredible view.

Description:
In the heart of Salines, one of the most coveted areas of St. Barts, stands Villa Dunes, an exclusive offering from Sun Beach House that defines the pinnacle of island luxury. With its six spacious and elegantly appointed bedrooms, this majestic residence offers a haven of peace and sophistication for the most discerning travelers.

Villa Dunes captivates with its impressive architecture, harmoniously blending modernity with traditional island touches. Its refined and minimalist interior design highlights open spaces, promoting total immersion in the natural beauty of St. Barts. Each bedroom, a true personal sanctuary, comes with its own luxurious bathroom, ensuring privacy and comfort for all guests.

The exterior of the villa is equally spectacular, with two infinity pools that seem to stretch towards the horizon, offering breathtaking views of the lush hills and crystal-clear waters of Salines. The spacious terrace, equipped with sun loungers and relaxation areas, is the perfect spot to enjoy the St. Barts sun, cool off in one of the pools, or simply watch the sunset with a cocktail in hand.

For culinary enthusiasts, Villa Dunes features a fully equipped kitchen where chefs, professional or amateur, can express their culinary creativity. An outdoor barbecue area also invites unforgettable evenings of grilling under the stars.

Located just steps from the famous Salines beach, Villa Dunes offers privileged access to one of the island's natural treasures, while remaining close to Gustavia and St. Jean, where luxury boutiques, gourmet restaurants, and lively nightlife await.

Opting for Villa Dunes for your stay in St. Barts means choosing an unparalleled vacation experience, where luxury, beauty, and tranquility come together to create a terrestrial paradise. Sun Beach House is committed to making your visit unforgettable, in a setting where every detail has been thought of for your pleasure and comfort. Villa Dunes is not just a vacation rental, it's a destination in itself, promising magical moments and memories that will last a lifetime.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Dunes.

Description:
The tone is set immediately, "My way" is a tribute to the greatest American artists as suggested by the "walk of fame", from the entrance of the villa.
The very spacious property, located in the heights of Colombier, offers a splendid view of the bay of Flamands.
You overlook the ocean from the large teak terrace.
It takes you a few minutes to realize that this is not a movie, but the idyllic setting for your stay in St. Barts.
Here, artists and especially musicians are honored.
Each room is named after an American celebrity, Frank Sinatra is mentioned above the bar and a magnificent black lacquered grand piano is waiting for you in the living room.
With its 5 rooms, the villa can accommodate up to 10 people and lends itself perfectly to large tables.

Like a song, the large living room would be the first verse.
Equipped with the latest technology, it is the place for your "big screen" evenings or private concerts.
Opposite, the second verse is the immense bar and its open kitchen: you or your private chef also play the "piano" to prepare a tasty local cuisine.
The tempo speeds up a bit with the fitness room open to the azure blue panorama. But the highlight is undeniably the huge outdoor space with two pools and a Jacuzzi.
Admiring the ocean, you like to play it over and over again, alternating swimming and relaxing on one of the deckchairs.
The melody continues in the rooms, with sea views, all equipped with a private bathroom, some with private terraces, another overlooking a charming tropical garden, but all with a king size bed, high end linens, digital safes and retractable TVs on the floors, not to mention the basic equipment: air conditioning, wifi, fan, etc...The design is ultra-contemporary and uncluttered and the furniture chosen from the best designers such as Le Corbusier or Starck.
Everything is there to inspire you. Now it's up to you to write the score.
If you want to play "solo", you have many spaces where you can meet in privacy.

Enjoy your stay in the villa "My Way".

The + : outside, the 2 swimming pools and the jacuzzi and inside, the sublime grand piano.

Description:
The Villa La Maison Rouge in St Jean, St Barthélemy, nestled on a hillside offering panoramic views of St Jean Bay and its crystal-clear waters. This villa combines the elegance of traditional Caribbean architecture with modern elements, creating a space that is both comfortable and sophisticated.

Inside, the living areas are spacious and bright, thanks to large bay windows that let in natural light while offering spectacular views. The fully equipped kitchen, featuring a breakfast bar, is ideal for preparing gourmet meals. The tastefully decorated formal living and dining rooms combine quality materials and local artistic touches.

La Maison Rouge has several bedrooms (3), each equipped with queen-size beds and en-suite bathrooms with double sinks and showers. The bedrooms, offering views of the ocean or lush gardens, are designed to maximize comfort and privacy, with air conditioning, ceiling fans, blackout curtains, and safes.

Outside, the villa stands out with its large wooden deck and heated infinity pool, perfect for relaxing while admiring the scenery. The outdoor spaces also include shaded areas for resting and a gas barbecue for alfresco dining under the stars.

Enjoy your stay at Villa La Maison Rouge.

Description:
Discover Villa Avalon, a gem nestled on the hills of Gouverneur, for a splendid getaway in the heart of St. Barts. This exceptional residence, equipped with four bedrooms, embodies the Caribbean dream, promising privacy and luxury to its guests.
Upon entering Villa Avalon, you will be immediately struck by the elegance of its architecture and the quality of its facilities. The living spaces, bathed in light, open up to breathtaking views where the azure sea blends with the sky. The four bedrooms, true sanctuaries of tranquility, each come with a private bathroom, offering unparalleled comfort and stunning views of the ocean or the lush garden.

The infinity pool, the centerpiece of the property, invites moments of absolute relaxation, in a setting where the beauty of nature is omnipresent. Whether for a refreshing swim or savoring a cocktail at sunset, the pool is the ultimate gathering point of your vacation.
The kitchen, modern and fully equipped, is the perfect playground for those who wish to indulge in local cuisine or simply enjoy a meal with family or friends. The villa also features a barbecue area, perfect for grill evenings under the stars.

Located just minutes from Gouverneur beach, one of the island's most beautiful, Villa Avalon offers a unique opportunity to immerse in the exclusivity of St. Barts. Beach lovers will be delighted by the proximity to this jewel, while those in search of tranquility will appreciate the calm and serenity of the property.
We know that luxury is in the details. That's why we are committed to offering you an unforgettable experience at Villa Avalon, where every moment is an invitation to relax, escape, and enjoy. Avalon is not just a villa, it's an open door to paradise, a place where every stay becomes a legend.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Avalon.
