Description:
Driven by imagination and innovation, Embrace celebrates the art of detail in both its service and style. Its enviable setting offers an uninterrupted view encompassing the green mountains, Caribbean sea, surrounding islands and Gustavia’s yacht-filled harbor.
Within its expansive spaces, nature’s beauty is invited in with airy architecture and sleek design and complemented by works from some of the art world’s most unconventional thinkers.

Embrace is a marriage of architectural and design influences with subtle nods to island living. A Swedish-style roof, local stone exterior and floor-to-ceiling windows create the framework for a striking interior with exotic woods and materials, custom lighting and furniture and commissioned artwork. The property also features the island’s only four-story glass elevator, which overlooks a waterfall, as well as a topiary garden and living wall.
The villa features an array of shared spaces for guests to gather, dine or relax.

The Great Room and Family Room feature handmade silk rugs and custom Italian sofas ideal for an afternoon of reading, movie night or late-night conversation.
In the Games Room, Vladimir Kagan armchairs are perfect for passing hours exploring the custom leather T.T.Trunks games table featuring chess, poker, Scrabble®, dominos, Monopoly® and more.

Set on the top floor, the study commands attention with custom furnishings including an impressive black nut-wood and leather desk.

Spanning four levels, Embrace pushes the boundaries of modern luxury with two infinity edge pools, an outdoor massage suite, an extensive wine cellar, a 15-car underground garage and a private drive-up entrance for the master suite.
Each of the villa’s five suites uses floor-to-ceiling glass and modern, muted decor to showcase the island’s most impressive attraction: nature.
Windows disappear into walls to bring you one step closer to the sparkling Caribbean Sea, a view that can be savored from bed or your private terrace. While the view is stunning, so, too, are the finishes within including hand-stitched French leather cabinets from T.T.Trunks and handmade silk carpets from India.

The suite “Gustavia” is located above the others and features a private, drive-up entrance, separate dressing room, walk-in closet and custom furnishings including an onyx and mother-of-pearl headboard and chaise and armchairs inspired by Vladimir Kagan.

This suite “St Jean” offers ample indoor and outdoor space to enjoy the sea view and custom furnishings from India Mahdavi and Minotti.
Inspired by the marina and sea view, the suite “Colombier” features blue Cassina Utrecht chairs, white leather and chrome accents from Minotti and Bernhardt and a custom onyx and mother-of-pearl headboard.
This large suite “Gouverneur” features an outdoor Japanese soaking tub and custom furnishings from Reda Amalou, B&B Italia and Minotti.
A mirror to Suite Gouverneur the suite “Saline", this spacious accommodation features an outdoor Japanese soaking tub and custom furnishings from Reda Amalou, B&B Italia and Minotti.

Enjoy your stay at villa Embrace

Description:
Nestled on the picturesque hill of Pointe Milou, Villa Summertime offers a unique experience on the island of St. Barthélemy. This charming property, comprising four bedrooms and four bathrooms, is a true haven of peace where comfort and conviviality meet. The master suite, equipped with a queen-size bed, offers stunning ocean views and features an en-suite bathroom with a spacious shower. The other three bedrooms, also equipped with queen-size beds and private bathrooms, are carefully decorated and furnished to ensure optimal comfort.

The tastefully decorated main living room opens onto a sunny terrace with panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. The modern, fully-equipped kitchen makes it easy to prepare meals, whether they are quick snacks or gourmet feasts.

The highlight of the villa is its magnificent pool, surrounded by a teak terrace. This outdoor space is perfect for relaxing, sunbathing, or hosting outdoor dinners while admiring the sunsets over the ocean. A carefully maintained tropical garden surrounds the villa, adding a touch of greenery and serenity. Shaded relaxation areas, lounge chairs, and a barbecue complete the outdoor experience.

Located in Pointe Milou, Villa Summertime offers easy access to the island's idyllic beaches, as well as its restaurants, shops, and leisure activities. This prime location ensures a peaceful retreat while being close to everything the island has to offer. Villa Summertime promises a memorable stay for all who are fortunate enough to discover it.

Enjoy your stay at villa Summertime

Description:
Welcome to Villa Douceur de Vivre, in the enchanting setting of Marigot, St. Barts. This charming residence, with its three elegantly appointed bedrooms, invites you to experience the ultimate in comfort and tranquility on this paradise island.
Villa Douceur de Vivre stands out for its open and airy architecture, which embraces natural light and offers a breathtaking view of the crystal-clear waters of Marigot Bay. The spacious living room, the beating heart of the house, extends onto an outdoor terrace where the pool beckons for moments of absolute relaxation, lulled by the whisper of the waves.

Each bedroom is a haven of peace, tastefully decorated and equipped with a private bathroom, ensuring privacy for every guest. The master suite, in particular, benefits from direct access to the terrace, allowing one to fall asleep and wake up to the soothing sound of the ocean.
The modern, fully equipped kitchen is designed for those who delight in cooking, providing everything needed to prepare memorable meals. Whether for a sunny breakfast or dinner under the stars, Villa Douceur de Vivre offers the ideal setting to share gastronomic moments with loved ones.

Located in Marigot, known for its tranquil beach and protected waters ideal for snorkeling, the villa offers easy access to pristine nature and peaceful water activities. Yet, just a few minutes drive away, you can reach the vibrant Gustavia or the famous St. Jean beach, offering the best of both worlds: tranquility and accessibility.
By choosing Villa Douceur de Vivre for your vacation in St. Barts, you opt for an experience that combines elegance, comfort, and a touch of island magic. Making your stay unforgettable, in a place where each day is a promise of relaxation, adventure, and discovery. Douceur de Vivre is not just a villa, it's your next favorite in the Caribbean.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Douceur de Vivre.

Description:
Secluded in the heights of Petit Cul-de-Sac for maximum tranquility, the villa Coco Rock offers you more than just a stay in St. Barts.
The promise of this magnificent property is a unique experience of well-being and comfort for family and friends alike.
Starting with the architecture, designed by the talented Olivier Dain, who challenges materials such as stone, waxed concrete and wood with harmony and authenticity.
Modernity meets Creole charm for your utmost comfort.

The 6 bedrooms are arranged on different levels to preserve your privacy, and converge towards the living areas.
The large terrace, set amid lush vegetation, overlooks the infinity pool and the Caribbean Sea.
Between 2 swims, you'll have the pleasure of chatting under the gazebo, enjoying the gentle spray and the surrounding melodies of doves and parrots.
A veritable tropical paradise just for you. You're not overlooked, with only the palm trees separating you from the sea view.
Back inside, you'll enjoy a kitchen/dining room that's totally open to this haven of peace, where you can prolong the magic over a good meal with friends or family. As you pass, you notice this sublime table, or rather work of art, carved from a single piece of solid Santo Domingo wood.
The design and choice of furnishings reflect the architect's sensitivity and desire to offer a truly unforgettable stay.
The 6 bedrooms are equally well appointed. All face the sea and have private bathrooms. Three share the covered terrace on the first floor.
The master bedroom has its own private terrace.
Just a stone's throw from the Petit Cul-de-Sac nature reserve and kite surfing spot, you'll have plenty of time to enjoy St. Barts magnificent beaches.
And if you're in the mood for entertainment, it's only a 20-minute drive to the stores, bars and restaurants of the capital Gustavia.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Coco Rock.

The + : the architecture, sublime.

Description:
Villa Casa del Mar is one of the most exclusive properties in St. Barts.
Firstly, because of its location: in the private domain of Le Levant, you benefit from an exceptional, intimate and highly confidential setting. Secondly, because the recently renovated property now comprises two villas, creating a vast, luxurious and unique residence.
The cliff-top setting, facing the sea, gives you an immediate feeling of freedom and infinite well-being, as if nothing could disturb your serenity.
The wide-open spaces also contribute to this unique atmosphere.

Spread over three hectares, the villa is so large that it can accommodate 12 guests in total privacy.
Indeed, the property boasts two comfortable indoor lounges, a home cinema area, 2 kitchens, two outdoor lounge areas, several outdoor dining areas facing the pool or the sea (including a gazebo) and two swimming pools!
Surrounded by palm trees and sun loungers, you'll enjoy sweet moments of relaxation with family and friends.
Every day, you'll be able to vary the pleasures and ambiances of this extraordinary and incomparable setting, a promise of unforgettable vacations.
But you're still not out of surprises...as you descend a little further towards the cliff, you'll discover a jacuzzi perfectly integrated into the natural setting facing the sea. Illuminated in the evening, it's the perfect place to end the day with a cocktail or glass of wine.
Another place for contemplation is the private lounge just below. Time to enjoy the moment.
Just before, you'll have dined in one of the delicious dining areas to the rhythm of the waves and the song of the frogs, but above all the services of the private chef included in the villa's services.

The sumptuous property boasts 6 bedrooms, all superbly equipped and with en-suite bathrooms, private terraces and sea views.
Like all the rooms in the villa, the bright bedrooms feature large, pleasant volumes and subtle, contemporary, cheerful decor.
The materials selected for the furnishings and fittings are of the highest quality, giving each room a unique and personal touch.
Sports enthusiasts will be able to train "at home" thanks to a fitness room.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Casa Del Mar.

The + : a unique location in St. Barts!

Description:
Discover Villa Grace, a rental gem nestled in the heart of Anse des Cayes, Saint-Barthélemy. This exceptional residence embodies the perfect escape for travelers seeking luxury, tranquility, and refinement, evoking the timeless elegance of Grace Kelly.

With its six elegantly appointed bedrooms, Villa Grace comfortably welcomes families and groups of friends, offering ample space and privacy to each guest. Every bedroom is equipped with its own en-suite bathroom, blending aesthetics with functionality for an uncompromising comfort experience.
The spacious, light-filled living area opens onto an outdoor terrace where the azure blue of the heated pool merges with the ocean horizon. This outdoor living space is the perfect setting to enjoy your morning coffee or celebrate the sunset, cocktail in hand, with breathtaking ocean views.

In terms of amenities, everything has been carefully curated to ensure a dream stay: a fully equipped kitchen, a private gym to maintain your wellness routine, a high-quality sound system, fast Wi-Fi, and much more. Villa Grace serves as your luxurious home base to explore the charms of Saint-Barthélemy, from the sandy beach of Anse des Cayes to the gourmet restaurants of Gustavia.

Embrace the Caribbean art of living, where luxury blends with nature, and let yourself be transported into a memorable stay inspired by elegance and splendor. Villa Grace awaits you to start writing the first lines of an unforgettable getaway in Saint-Barthélemy.

Description:
Nestled in the prestigious Lurin neighborhood on the paradisiacal island of Saint-Barthélemy, Villa Kyr offers a true haven of peace with a Balinese spirit. This charming villa, with its four bedrooms and four bathrooms, invites relaxation and serenity, away from ostentatious luxury.

Villa Kyr features four spacious bedrooms, each decorated with simplicity and elegance inspired by Balinese style. The rooms are equipped with comfortable beds, natural wooden furniture, and soft textiles in soothing colors. Large windows allow natural light to flood in and offer views of the surrounding tropical gardens, creating a zen and relaxing ambiance.

The four bathrooms at Villa Kyr are designed in a rustic and authentic style. They feature Italian showers and decorative wooden touches. The villa offers open and airy living spaces where Balinese design harmoniously blends with natural elements. The living room, with its comfortable sofas and plush cushions, is the perfect place to unwind after a day of exploring the island. The functional and well-equipped kitchen allows guests to prepare simple meals to enjoy in the indoor dining area or on the terrace, soaking in the peaceful atmosphere.

The exterior of Villa Kyr is a true tropical paradise. The wooden terrace is adorned with lounge chairs perfect for relaxing to the sound of birds and the gentle breeze. The pool, surrounded by lush vegetation, provides a refreshing setting for swimming and relaxation. The view is breathtaking.

Villa Kyr in Lurin is the ideal place for those seeking a simple and authentic stay in Saint-Barthélemy. With its four comfortable bedrooms and rustic bathrooms, it offers everything necessary for a restful vacation. Whether for a couple's retreat, a family vacation, or a getaway with friends, Villa Kyr is the perfect choice for a rejuvenating stay on this beautiful island.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Kyr!

Description:
Ideally located in St Jean and in the heart of the island and in a sea of privacy, the sublime villa Aliza will seduce you with its elegant simplicity.
Subtly integrated in a beautiful tropical garden and offering a beautiful sea view, the property consists of 3 bedrooms, one of which is perfectly independent with a kitchenette.
Spacious and airy, the villa offers the perfect setting for your St. Barts getaway.
Distractions are limited to the beauty of the surrounding nature, the clean and stylish interiors and the overall peacefulness of the place.
You enjoy relaxing moments in the pool.

The sound of the palm trees gently blowing in the breeze remind you that you are on vacation in the Caribbean.
Open to the outside, the house offers various spaces for relaxation and conviviality.
The large covered terrace for your meals faces the sea or the living room, spacious and with direct access to the kitchen.
The authentic Creole architecture offers beautiful volumes with exposed roofs.
You can breathe.
The furniture, mostly made of wood and other natural materials, is comfortable and contributes to the peacefulness of the place.
The technology is discreet so as not to disturb your stay.
Everything is designed to nourish the tranquility of your days, to the rhythm of the waves and the surrounding melody. A truly enchanting setting.
Nevertheless, the villa has a very central location and you are only a few minutes away from shopping and Gustavia, known for its many stores and restaurants.

After a lively evening, you will be happy to return to the calm of your room, which is also airy and uncluttered and has large windows overlooking the sea or the tropical garden.
Here again, the present moment prevails over the artifice of new technologies.
You will rarely have felt so "disconnected".

Enjoy your stay at Villa Aliza

The + : the peacefulness and the authentic charm of the place

Description:
Come and discover Villa Amalie, a jewel nestled in the heart of Marigot, St. Barts. This elegant 2-bedroom residence offers the ideal setting for couples or small families looking for a luxurious getaway. Imagine waking up each morning to the soothing view of the ocean, with the gentle murmur of the waves in the background.

Villa Amalie is designed to maximize your comfort and pleasure. Each bedroom, a true haven of peace, has its own bathroom, offering privacy and tranquility. The open-plan living room and fully-equipped kitchen are perfect for convivial moments, while the terrace and private pool invite sunny afternoons with a breathtaking view over Marigot Bay.

Villa Amalie has thought of everything to ensure a carefree experience: high-speed Wi-Fi, a state-of-the-art entertainment system, and air conditioning in every room. What's more, the villa is just steps away from the crystal-clear waters of Marigot, famous for its calm and unspoiled beauty.

For those looking to explore, Marigot is just a short drive from the upscale restaurants and luxury boutiques of St. Barts. Not to mention the many activities available: sailing, scuba diving, or simply lazing on the sandy beaches.

At Villa Amalie, we understand the importance of details in creating a memorable vacation. Villa Amalie is more than just a place to stay, it's a promise of unforgettable moments, in one of the world's most exclusive locations. Discover St. Barts differently, with elegance and serenity, thanks to Villa Amalie.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Amalie.

Description:
Nestled in the prestigious Colombier neighborhood of Saint-Barthélemy, the sumptuous villa The Source is a true gem of luxury and comfort.
This six-bedroom, six-bathroom residence offers an unparalleled experience of tranquility and refinement, perfect for a dream vacation.
The Source villa stands out with its vast living spaces, designed to provide both comfort and elegance.
The spacious living room, tastefully decorated, invites relaxation with its plush sofas and breathtaking ocean views. Large bay windows allow an abundance of natural light and offer direct access to the terrace and infinity pool.

Each of the six bedrooms in the villa is a haven of peace, equipped with king-size beds, high-quality linens, and carefully curated decor that creates a soothing ambiance. Every bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom, ensuring total privacy for all guests.
The bathrooms feature modern amenities, rain showers, and luxurious bathtubs.
The Source villa impresses with its top-of-the-line facilities. The outdoor jacuzzi provides the ultimate relaxation space with panoramic views of the turquoise Caribbean waters.

The fully equipped kitchen is a gourmet’s dream, with modern appliances and a sleek design. Located in Colombier, one of the most sought-after areas of Saint-Barthélemy, The Source villa offers easy access to pristine beaches, gourmet restaurants, and luxury boutiques. The peaceful surroundings of Colombier guarantee a tranquil stay, while being just a few minutes' drive from the lively areas of Gustavia and Saint-Jean.

The Source villa is more than just a place to stay, it is an unforgettable experience. Whether you want to relax by the pool, enjoy an al fresco dinner with stunning views, or explore the natural beauty of Saint-Barthélemy, this villa is the perfect setting for a memorable vacation. Book your stay at The Source villa and discover the pinnacle of luxury in Saint-Barthélemy.

Enjoy your stay at Villa The Source

Description:
The Villa Maison de la Mer, located on the stunning Flamands Beach in Saint-Barthélemy, is a true haven of peace offering luxury and comfort. Nestled in the heart of tropical nature, this sumptuous residence extends over a vast terrain overlooking the ocean, providing breathtaking views of the crystal-clear waters and white sandy beach.

With its six spacious bedrooms and six elegantly appointed bathrooms, the villa promises an unforgettable stay for large families or groups of friends. Each bedroom, tastefully decorated in a style combining modernity and Caribbean touches, features a king-size bed, large closets, and direct access to a private terrace or balcony. The en-suite bathrooms are true sanctuaries of relaxation, equipped with walk-in showers, deep bathtubs, and double sinks, all in noble materials such as marble and exotic wood.

The heart of the house is found in its open living spaces, where the living room, dining room, and kitchen blend harmoniously, creating a convivial and warm atmosphere. Large bay windows flood the interior with natural light and offer panoramic views of the ocean, while the sea breeze continuously refreshes the space. The kitchen, fully equipped with the latest generation appliances, invites the preparation of gourmet meals, which can be enjoyed indoors or on the covered terrace.

Outside, the Villa Maison de la Mer stands out with its immense wooden terrace, featuring comfortable loungers and an outdoor dining area. The swimming pool, surrounded by palm trees and lush vegetation, offers a perfect setting for moments of absolute relaxation. A private path provides direct access to Flamands Beach, where calm waters and soft sand invite swimming and relaxation.

With its refined design, high-end amenities, and idyllic location, Villa Maison de la Mer is the dream destination for a luxury getaway in Saint-Barthélemy, where every detail is designed to offer absolute comfort and a memorable experience.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Maison de la Mer

Description:
Overlooking the infinite azure of the ocean, with twilight draping the hills of St Jean in golden hues, Villa Veronika is a haven of luxury and serenity. Its architecture, evoking the charms of Bali, elegantly blends with contemporary decorative elements, offering a peaceful retreat just steps away from the shimmering shore of Lorient Beach.

At the heart of the villa, the living space revolves around a kitchen equipped with cutting-edge modernity, merging into a cozy dining area and a spacious living room bathed in light, where fans weave a cool breeze, opening majestically onto the terrace. The master bedroom, a true haven of relaxation, is located immediately adjacent to the living room, while the second bedroom, nestled in a detached bungalow, benefits from a private terrace. A third bedroom, situated one floor below, also enjoys a private terrace. Each bedroom is an invitation to rest, with its own bathroom ensuring privacy and ease.

Moments of relaxation reach their peak in the spacious living room or by the poolside, facing the lively spectacle of the ocean. Offering luxurious amenities and a sublime setting, Villa Veronika embodies the perfect escape for friends looking to experience memorable holidays under the aegis of Sun Beach House, where luxury and harmony meet.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Veronika.

Description:
Villa Ginger, nestled in the idyllic setting of Petite Saline in St Barthélemy, is an oasis of luxury and tranquility, designed to offer an unforgettable vacation experience. This sumptuous property spans a vast private estate, surrounded by lush vegetation, providing an intimate and exclusive setting.

The villa features 5 elegantly decorated bedrooms, each with large windows that flood the rooms with natural light and offer breathtaking views of the surroundings. Each bedroom has its own en-suite bathroom, equipped with modern and luxurious amenities, ensuring optimal comfort and complete privacy for every guest.
The living spaces are designed for relaxation and conviviality, with a large open-plan living room that opens onto a spacious terrace. The fully equipped kitchen, with state-of-the-art appliances, is perfect for preparing delicious meals to enjoy in the indoor dining area or on the outdoor terrace, while taking in the spectacular views.

For those who wish to stay active, the villa offers a fully equipped gym, allowing you to maintain your fitness routine in a beautiful setting. After a workout, you can relax in the heated infinity pool, surrounded by an elegant outdoor area with loungers and comfortable seating areas.
The standout feature of Villa Ginger is undoubtedly its breathtaking panoramic view. From the terrace, you can admire the island's lush landscapes and the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea, creating a dreamlike setting for moments of relaxation and contemplation.

Every detail of Villa Ginger has been meticulously designed to offer an exceptional luxury experience. Whether you want to relax by the pool, enjoy the modern facilities, or simply take in the natural beauty of St Barthélemy, Villa Ginger is the perfect place for a memorable vacation.

Enjoy your stay at villa Ginger

Description:
Villa Pointe Milou is naturally located in the neighborhood of the same name. It's a very residential, peaceful and privilegedenvironment. A little paradise in paradise, that's the feeling you get when you enter the property, entirely dedicated to your comfort and well-being.
The contemporary architecture blends in so well with the surroundings that you become one with the extraordinary panorama in front of you.

On one side, the main room features a well-equipped open kitchen with a bar where you can enjoy breakfast or a glass of wine with the cook.
On the other, a large, comfortable corner sofa can easily accommodate up to 8 guests.
Immediately adjacent is the shaded terrace with its dining area, followed by the infinity pool that blends into the turquoise ocean.
White dominates the decor, creating a pure, peaceful and serene atmosphere. Add to this the continuous breeze of the trade winds...plenitude guaranteed.

Behind it, a small terrace with its plant life provides another space for relaxing or socializing.
On the night side, all bedrooms enjoy the same atmosphere, with en-suite bathrooms.
Three of them are on the main level (two of which are connected), while the last is on the lower level, with its own private terrace for total privacy.
All offer ocean views.
Sports enthusiasts will be delighted to be able to exercise in the fitness room, also located on the lower floor.
Villa Pointe Milou is the ideal place for contemplation and tranquility in Saint-Barthélemy, the promise of an unforgettable stay in one of the jewels of the Caribbean.
Nearby is the sublime Hotel Christopher, a must for sipping a sunset cocktail or enjoying a delicious lunch with your feet in the sand.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Pointe Milou.

The +: breathtaking panorama

Description:
Clinging to the hills of Petite Saline, the superb Villa Jable offers you a very upscale and unforgettable stay.
8 parking spaces and an indoor garage set the tone for the size of the property.
Ideally designed to accommodate a large family, up to 12 people, the newly renovated house is organized on two levels, overlooking the bay of Lorient and the green tropical valley.
The view is breathtaking and you can already breathe in the scent of relaxation and well-being.

There is a choice of a beautiful pool for the children, a main pool for the adults, and the outdoor relaxation areas.
For those who still have some business to manage between two sunbathing sessions, an office with a sea view offers to make this moment as studious as pleasant.
In terms of equipment, the villa has a double Internet network, French and American satellites, a Sonos sound system and an Apple Play to stay "connected" as much as you want.
This villa does provide access for disabled people who can circulate in all the villa, of which one of the bedrooms and bathroom is specially equipped.

It is now time to disconnect completely and you continue your visit through the living room.
The sober and contemporary design of the layout, the choice of natural furniture and the large volumes lend themselves to escape.
Immediate departure for a dream vacation.
The semi-professional kitchen will delight gourmets, apprentice cooks or private chefs. The preparation of good dishes is of course accompanied by a great French wine (or not) stored in the wine cellar at your disposal.

Three of the rooms are located on the main level while the other three are on the lower level, by the pool. Two of them are connected to each other.
It will be difficult for you to leave this haven of peace, but you should know that the neighborhoods of St-Jeanor Gustavia also have a lot to offer: gourmet restaurants, luxury brand boutiques and incredible yachts.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Jable.

The + : the 2 swimming pools and the access for disabled people

Description:
Villa Néo, located in St. Jean, St. Barthélemy, is a true modern luxury gem nestled in one of the most sought-after destinations in the Caribbean. This ultra-luxurious residence offers an unparalleled living experience, combining contemporary elegance with exceptional comfort.

The villa unfolds majestically with its six sumptuous bedrooms, each featuring its own private en-suite bathroom. The rooms are spacious and bathed in natural light, tastefully decorated with high-end materials and a refined, minimalist design. The bathrooms, equally luxurious, are equipped with modern fixtures and elegant finishes, creating the perfect space for relaxation.

At the heart of Villa Néo lies a vast, open-concept living area that flows seamlessly to the outdoors through large glass doors. The living room, furnished with designer pieces, invites you to unwind while taking in breathtaking ocean views. The state-of-the-art kitchen is equipped with the latest appliances, ideal for preparing gourmet meals or hosting a private chef.

For those seeking wellness and relaxation, Villa Néo delivers beyond expectations. It features a fully equipped gym to maintain your fitness routine, as well as a hammam for ultimate relaxation sessions. The jacuzzi, set on a panoramic terrace, offers an idyllic spot to unwind while admiring the spectacular turquoise waters of St. Barthélemy.

For unforgettable evenings, the villa includes a private movie theater where you can enjoy films in the comfort of your own home. Every detail has been carefully considered to offer an exceptional entertainment experience, featuring plush seating and cutting-edge audiovisual technology.

Villa Néo in St. Jean is more than just a residence—it’s a modern masterpiece where every element of design and comfort has been thoughtfully crafted to deliver an unparalleled luxury experience. Whether you’re seeking relaxation, rejuvenation, or cherished moments with family and friends, this villa is the perfect place to fulfill your dream of a luxury Caribbean getaway.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Néo.

The + : high quality and original services

Description:
The villa Wine note is one of the "grands crus" of St-Barts.
Located at the height of St. Jean Bay, the vast property is a modern and subtle addition to a tropical paradise setting. Somewhat set back, you nevertheless dominate the bay of St-Jean and see the famous Eden Rock.
On the other side, is the beach of Saline.
Spread over three levels, the property immediately appears as a haven of peace where serenity and epicureanism are combined.

The contemporary architecture emphasizes the exclusivity of the place and the continuity of the spaces, such as the superb 16-meter long swimming pool.
The exotic wood deck naturally offers an unobstructed view of the sea and distributes the 2 pools.
Listen carefully as the pools subtly flow along the living room to form a waterfall in the outdoor pool.
Adjacent to the large terrace is the sublime living room, as luxurious as it is comfortable and equipped with an ultra-modern open kitchen, offering a beautiful work space for those who want to cook the most delicate dishes.

In the center is what makes this villa unique and exceptional, an incredible wine cellar containing several hundred great vintages from the great vineyards of Bordeaux for the pleasure of the finest connoisseurs. Wine note!
To enjoy yourself, you can choose between the table bar for a relaxed and festive atmosphere or the large dining area that can accommodate 16 people.
On the menu, gastronomy and conviviality in an absolutely unique environment.
The elegant and stylish lounge lends itself to relaxation and offers a memorable view of the azure blue background.

Peace is everywhere and the feeling of well-being is immediate.
The dream continues in the bedrooms, 5 in total, including 3 masters. Each room has its own private bathroom and an outdoor space with a view of the sea or tropical garden.
Decorated with taste, between modernity and exoticism, each night is an escape.
Words are not enough to describe the incredible experience that this prestigious villa offers.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa Wine Note

The + : its incredible wine cellar

Description:
You will be awestruck when you are welcomed into this superb villa W View, presented by Sun Beach House located on the hill of St-Jean.
A 180° panorama of the whole bay allowing you to gaze at the lush vegetation and the ocean as far as the eye can see.
The design of the property gives you the opportunity to enjoy the view throughout the property.
Bright and sunny all day long, the villa is like an annex of paradise in which you become one with your environment.
Cleverly laid out, the house offers as much room for social gatherings as for privacy.
There is a delicate balance between the dominant contemporary style and some of the antique furniture.
The large living room includes a comfortable living room, a dining area and the open kitchen, all facing the sea. The terrace is made of exotic wood and calls you for a moment of pure relaxation.
You alternate between the deckchairs, the huge outdoor cushions and the pool on two levels, part of which is protected from the sun by the extension of the joupa.

A novel in one hand, a cocktail in the other, this is what heaven looks like.
The delight continues around a good meal with family or friends on the shaded terrace where the breeze refreshes you just right.
In order for everyone to have privacy, the 2 suites are completely separate from each other.
The first one is located in an independent bungalow and has an outdoor shower.
The second suite is located on the lower floor and the other two smaller rooms are in another annex of the house.
Decorated with great taste, the atmosphere is soft and peaceful. All have a view of the sea. A fitness room are also at your disposal to occupy your stay.
Ideally located, the villa gives you quick access to a mythical place of the island: the Eden Rock, where you can enjoy delicious cuisine with your feet in the sand.

A few minutes away, the streets of Gustavia offer a more lively atmosphere with its many restaurants and shops.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa W View

Description:
Near Gustavia, just above Shell Beach, is one of the most exceptional villas on the island, Vitti., represented by Sun Beach House.
The infinity pool seems an extension of the ocean when the entire villa is an extension of the sun.
On the side of a cliff, the house is perfectly integrated into its environment and the large infinity pool becomes one with the terrace and the ocean.

The living space is well balanced: on one side a living room and a dining area exposed to the sea, on the other a shaded outdoor Zen terrace.
In the middle, an indoor living and dining room.
Sit comfortably, press a button, and a large HDTV comes out of the floor, transforming the living room into a real cinema.
The outdoor bar is also a very pleasant place. What could be better than sipping a well-chilled beverage while watching the sunset?The villa is equipped with a gourmet high tech kitchen open or closed including luxury appliances.
There is even a device to cool a bottle of Champagne in only 10 minutes.

The style of the house is modern, a huge buddha greets the sun. Your stay seems to be under the sign of gratitude.
You are not here by chance. As for the rooms, five in number, they all offer a different style.
Two are on the main level with terraces and the possibility of being connected to each other and three are on the lower level.
All of them have an opening to the sea. To reach it, the height of luxury, a private access consisting of 100 steps leads you to the magnificent shell beach.
Don't forget your snorkel, the fish are waiting for you for the aquatic show.
On the way back up, you'll be happy to take advantage of an outdoor cooling system with water mist to cool you down.
As night falls, the scenery is no less impressive, the clouds mingle with the last glimmers of daylight and the yachts complete this extraordinary panorama.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Vitti.

The + : the infinity pool in the continuity of the ocean

Description:
Located in the Vitet district, on the highest hill of St-Barts, the villa Cho offers a breathtaking view.
Not 1 but 2 lagoons are immediately available to you, giving way to the immensity of the ocean, all in a sublime blue-green gradation. You are perched on the large terrace of a house with authentic Caribbean charm.
Renovated after Hurricane Irma, the architecture is of classical style and has separate bungalows all connected to each other.

The comfortable living room opens up to clear ocean views, and next to it is a simple but functional kitchen and dining area.
Beneath the outdoor pergola is a second dining area that welcomes the exquisite panorama, an inviting area for socializing with friends and family by the barbecue.
A few steps away is the pool area where you can sunbathe on one of the deckchairs.
A light breeze completes this moment of pure relaxation.
Three rooms with a Caribbean style will ensure a tranquil and restful sleep. Four-poster beds, antique wood furniture, wicker chairs and period tiles.
On the bedside table, books and other small furniture with local charm, a style as rustic as it is comfortable.

The bedrooms, accompanied by a private bathroom, open to the sea. They provide you the option of air conditioning for the ability to enjoy the airy breezes of the Caribbean.
The environment is calm and conducive to relaxation. At the end of the afternoon, let yourself be lulled by the soft song of the frogs while admiring the last glimmers of the sun. Each evening, a new reason to marvel at this beautiful spectacle.
For a little excitement, Gustavia is only a 20-minute drive away.
Between luxury boutiques and gourmet restaurants, the capital offers a chic and gourmet version of the Caribbean.
Walk around, enjoy...and don't miss a stroll along the harbor to admire the many majestically moored yachts.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Cho.

The + : the unobstructed view of the 2 lagoons

Description:
The luxurious villa Casa Tua is unique.
With its direct access to the beach of Lorient, the turquoise colors and the surrounding nature are raw and beautiful.
You can enjoy the beauty of this villa from the pool, a deckchair, or even better, sitting comfortably in one of the armchairs of the outdoor bar.
Sipping a cocktail, you hardly realize that this house is yours, "casa tua", for the duration of your stay.
Newly constructed, the property is the work of a talented local architect who knows how to bring the natural elements together to provide you with an unforgettable experience.
Thus, you can enjoy the mild climate while still benefiting from a light breeze coming from the sea.
To this end, the large terrace has a cozy outdoor living room where you will enjoy remaking the world with your friends.
At mealtime, the shaded terrace lets you enjoy the view while sharing a tasty moment of conviviality.

Inside, the style has been studied with great care and nothing is left to chance. Each room is a delight to the eye and designed to provide unparalleled comfort.
Refinement is everywhere.
Starting with the fully equipped kitchen. You accompany the cook at this imposing and magnificent marble table. Depending on the mood, you can continue the evening in the intimate and cozy interior dining room.
You might like to spend the evening in the lounge to relax or embrace the ideal place for a movie night.
In shades of beige, caramel and terracotta, the villa blends perfectly with the fine sand of Lorient beach. You will appreciate the attention to every detail that makes your stay even more exquisite.
Ideally located, the property is just a stone's throw from the shops. Every morning, you can walk to get your baguette and hot croissants.
The rooms, just as carefully decorated, overlook the sea or the terrace.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Casa Tua.

The + : the location, the feet in the water

Description:
Découvrez un luxe incomparable à la Villa Sand Club, située dans le prestigieux quartier des Flamands, à proximité de la réserve naturelle du Colombier, sur l'île paradisiaque de Saint-Barthélemy. Cette propriété d'exception, qui s'étend sur un domaine de plus de 2 500 mètres carrés, a été imaginée par des architectes et designers de renom .

The centerpiece is a colonial-style villa with a vast panoramic terrace. The master suite, located on the top floor, spans 100 square meters and offers spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea and surrounding islands, including Chevreau Island. It features five French windows opening onto the terrace, an outdoor bathroom, a built-in desk, two separate entrances, and a spacious dressing room with a large mirror. Two further bedrooms on this floor are perfectly suited to accommodate four children. A teak staircase leads up to a 150 m² open-plan living area, divided into three main zones, all enjoying views of the sea and an avenue of palm trees. The reception area incorporates a bar seating up to 12, adjoining a chef's kitchen with a teppanyaki table. The dining room, which seats 16, features designer tableware and impeccable service. The large living room, measuring at least 50 m², overlooks a 20-meter freshwater pool and teak terrace with summer kitchen, barbecue, dining area for 12 and deckchairs for 16, not to mention direct access to a private white-sand beach. The property is also equipped with a state-of-the-art audio-video system.

An advanced air-conditioning system ensures absolute comfort even on the hottest days.

Around the main villa, four luxurious bungalows offer spacious bedrooms with sophisticated dressing rooms and indoor and outdoor showers. Two separate cottages offer comfortable accommodation for guests or staff, with fully equipped kitchens and lounges. Private parking for up to six vehicles and a separate staff entrance complete the property's modern facilities.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Sand Club.

Description:
An authentic villaoverlooking the magnificent bay of St-Jean, you are in the perfect place to embrace all the beauty of the island with the incredible panoramic view!
The Caribbean style architecture delicately plunges you into another world where luxury meets authenticity.
Typically Creole, this house is built on one level and offers many shaded spaces and is completely open to the outside.
A well equipped kitchen opens into a dining room that can accommodate 6 guests. In the continuity, a comfortable living room with the latest equipment: large HDTV plasma with all American channels, Dish NetWork, French channels, Canal Sat, DVD player, I Pod station, Apple TV 4, home cinema, Bose audio stereo indoor / outdoor.
A small office area is also at your disposal with printer / fax, telephone and WIFI connection.
For your meals, eat outside where a soft breeze blows continuously.
A barbecue is at your disposal for your grills.
Before and/or after, the very large pool becomes your main residence. You are embraced by the blue of the ocean and the clarity of the swimming pool.

From here you don't miss a second of the incredible scenery.
Close your eyes, the trade winds caress your face while the sun warms your skin, the feeling of well-being is complete.
The property is ideal to welcome a large family in search of joyful and convivial moments. You make unforgettable memories in an unforgettable setting.
Three bedrooms complete the villa, all equipped with a private bathroom. Everywhere the decoration is inspired by the Creolestyle. The rustic charm of the villa promises a total change of scenery. Its location is absolutely ideal. A few minutes away is the Villa Creole offering restaurants and small local shops.
A short drive away is Gustavia, its harbor, shopping, and eating are in abundance as well as the beautiful beaches that surround the island.

Enjoy your stay at the Villa les Acajous

The + : the incredible panorama and the location of the villa

Description:
This superb villa is situated atop a hill overlooking St-Jean, accessed via underground parking and elevator. The Lollipop property blends in perfectly with its surroundings. Each building or bungalow houses a room opening onto the deck and facing the incredible panorama of the bay of St-Jean.

The atmosphere is particularly captivating. A feeling certainly inspired by the soft, warm interior design. Decoration, furnishings, and materials have been chosen with great care and showcase a natural sense of design. The overall layout is conducive to relaxation: A subtle blend of luxury and nature...everything is extremely simple and functional at the same time. In the midst of its tropical surroundings, the pool looks like a cool oasis.

Crystal-clear and turquoise, it's sure to be one of your favorite spots. Between swimming and contemplating the landscape, you'll love relaxing in the outdoor lounge. Protected from sun and rain, it also lends itself to a moment dear to local culture: the aperitif. Celebrate with friends or family the art of living in St. Barts, before heading off to one of Gustavia's gourmet restaurants to extend the pleasure into the night. Back at the villa, you'll love curling up in one of the three bedrooms. Each has its own private bathroom, ample storage space and absolute comfort. Once again, everything has been thought of to ensure your well-being and peace of mind. When you wake up, the azure-blue panorama reminds you that this was not a dream, but the location of your Caribbean vacation. Before diving into the pool, you can head down one floor to the fitness room. The day unfolds like a new gift of life.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Lollipop.

The + : the ground-level layout and the superb view over St-Jean.

Description:
Offering exceptional panoramic views of the ocean and Marigot Bay, the property blends perfectly into its surroundings, combining Caribbean architecture and Balinese style for a delightfully peaceful atmosphere.
Luxury pervails.
Spaces are very generous, starting with the spacious terrace hosting various relaxation areas, including a sumptuous infinity pool overlooking the turquoise ocean bordered by lush green hills.
Adjacent to the pool, the jacuzzi offers the same intoxicating view.
An outdoor lounge, in the shade of the terrace, invites you to relax or socialize as you wish, as does the dining area, which can accommodate up to 16 guests on a sublime wooden table.
Once in the living room, the journey continues...the Asian charm immediately takes hold, invading you with a deep sense of serenity.
At the service of your private chef, the professional kitchen also promises many gourmet meals.

The eight bedrooms are also all part of the journey. True works of art, each offers a unique experience, but all boast breathtaking views and luxurious amenities.
Three of the rooms are located in the main pavilion, while the other five enjoy separate bungalows, offering all the tranquility and privacy hoped for in such a haven of peace.
The ultimate in wellness, a cottage houses a spa and fitness room to pamper you during your stay.
A fully-equipped gym and massage table bring the services of a sports coach or masseuse right into your villa! And to relax in front of a good movie, head for the superb cinema!

Enjoy your stay at Villa Jade.

The +:the attention to detail and the extraordinary level of service.
For full villa rental for a min of 7 nights, the private chef * and the butler service are included The private chef is included for 1 meal per day Lunch or dinner excluding the food cost.
The eighth room is the staff room.

Description:
Perched on the heights of Pointe Milou, Villa Elle emerges as an oasis of luxury in the heart of St. Barts.
With its four elegant bedrooms and breathtaking ocean panorama, this home is an invitation to experience exceptional moments in a stunning setting.
From the entrance, Villa Elle enwraps its visitors in a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The open architecture of the villa allows natural light to bathe each room, revealing tasteful and refined decorated living spaces. Noble materials, such as wood and stone, harmonize perfectly with the soft hues of the interiors, creating an elegant haven of peace.

The four bedrooms of Villa Elle are sanctuaries of tranquility, each offering absolute privacy and stunning views of the blue expanse. Designed for ultimate comfort, they come with en-suite bathrooms, equipped with high-end finishes, ensuring a luxurious and restful experience for all guests.
At the heart of the villa, the infinity pool stretches towards the horizon, inviting refreshing swims with an unparalleled view of the sea. The spacious and elegantly furnished terrace is the ideal place for outdoor evenings, starlit dinners, or simply relishing the tranquility of Pointe Milou.

The kitchen of Villa Elle, modern and fully equipped, is a paradise for culinary enthusiasts, offering an ideal space to prepare exquisite meals. Whether for a friendly brunch or a gourmet dinner, guests can enjoy moments of sharing and indulgence in the comfort of their villa.
Located in Pointe Milou, renowned for its spectacular sunsets and exclusive atmosphere, Villa Elle not only offers a sumptuous living environment but also easy access to the island's attractions. The fine sandy beaches, renowned restaurants, and chic boutiques of St. Barts are just a few minutes' drive away, promising days rich in discoveries and evenings full of magic.

Choosing Villa Elle for your getaway to St. Barts means embracing a lifestyle where luxury, beauty, and calm meet, creating an unforgettable stay under the Caribbean sun. Each day is a new opportunity to be charmed by the island and its wonders.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Elle.

Description:
Villa Epicure, located in the enchanting bay of Marigot in St. Barts. With its seven spacious bedrooms, this exceptional residence is designed to provide an unparalleled luxury experience for its guests. Imbued with refinement and meticulous attention to detail, Villa Epicure promises an enchanting stay in one of the island's most beautiful settings.
Upon entry, guests are welcomed by an open and airy living space, where natural light floods every corner, highlighting the elegant furniture and carefully selected artwork. Large windows offer breathtaking views of the turquoise sea, creating a harmonious connection with the seascape.

Each bedroom in Villa Epicure is an invitation to relaxation and serenity, featuring comfortable beds, luxurious en-suite bathrooms, and panoramic views of the ocean or tropical garden. The villa's layout ensures total privacy for each guest, making every room a personal sanctuary.
The centerpiece of the property is undoubtedly its magnificent infinity pool, surrounded by spacious terraces and chic relaxation areas. It's the perfect place to cool off, relax in the sun, or simply enjoy a cocktail while watching the sunset over the bay.

For culinary enthusiasts, the kitchen of Villa Epicure is a true masterpiece. Fully equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, it offers an ideal space to experiment with local flavors or prepare sumptuous meals with a private chef. The elegant and welcoming indoor dining room, along with the outdoor dining area, are perfect for memorable evenings in good company.
Marigot is known for its peaceful ambiance and protected beach, making Villa Epicure a preferred choice for those looking to relax in an exclusive setting. Moreover, its proximity to the island's attractions, such as Gustavia and St. Jean, allows guests to easily explore St. Barts in all its splendor.

Choosing Villa Epicure for your stay means opting for an escape where luxury blends with natural beauty, offering an unforgettable experience. An exceptional adventure, where comfort, elegance, and moments of joy meet in a paradisiacal setting.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Epicure

Description:
The luxury rental villa Mythique is a true gem on the island of Saint Barth. Situated on the heights of Marigot, it offers breathtaking panoramic views of the bay and the surrounding hills. Recently built, this exceptional six-bedroom home is ideal for large groups seeking high-end amenities in an intimate and exclusive setting.

Villa Mythique combines luxury and elegance with its warm-toned tropical wood decor. The spacious open living area is sumptuously furnished with sofas and benches under a stunning honey-colored mansard ceiling adorned with pendant lights. The professional, spacious kitchen, equipped with a black lava stone central island, has all the necessary appliances for preparing your meals and snacks, including a wine cellar and a cold room. The sense of well-being and luxury is total in this immense living space, ventilated by the trade winds or air-conditioned according to your preference. Under the covered terrace, a large dining table for fourteen people offers an unparalleled view of Marigot Bay.

The villa's expansive terrace is impressive, with its immense heated infinity pool stretching the entire width of the villa, blending seamlessly with the ocean horizon. Sun loungers and a comfortable outdoor lounge with sofas and cushions create a serene and tranquil setting under the sun, facing an infinite horizon.

Villa Mythique welcomes you in its six magnificent air-conditioned bedrooms, all featuring king-size beds and en-suite bathrooms. Four bedrooms are located on the main level, opening onto the terrace with panoramic views, while the other two suites, located on the lower level, are accessible by a staircase or a private elevator. The decor is refined and elegant, in a chic and bright style.

To enhance your stay, Villa Mythique offers a hammam for moments of relaxation, as well as a fully equipped fitness room. The cinema room, with its comfortable armchairs and large screen, promises wonderful movie nights for film enthusiasts.

Every evening, enjoy the gentle air of Saint Barth facing the spectacular view of Marigot Bay, in the absolute luxury of Villa Mythique.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Mythique.

Description:
Villa Milonga, nestled in the heart of Marigot in Saint-Barthélemy, is a luxurious residence offering an idyllic setting for an unforgettable vacation. This sumptuous villa features four elegantly decorated bedrooms and four en-suite bathrooms, ensuring comfort and privacy for all its guests.

Upon arrival, you will be charmed by the refined architecture and high-quality finishes of Villa Milonga. Each tastefully decorated bedroom provides a serene resting space, furnished with comfortable beds, elegant furniture, and large windows that flood the rooms with natural light. The modern, spacious bathrooms are equipped with walk-in showers and all necessary amenities for your comfort.

The living room, with its warm ambiance and large windows overlooking the sea, is the perfect place to relax with family or friends. The fully equipped kitchen is a dream for any cooking enthusiast, offering everything needed to prepare delicious meals that can be enjoyed in the indoor dining room or on the outdoor terrace.

Outside, Villa Milonga offers a spectacular outdoor living space. The private pool, surrounded by comfortable lounge chairs, invites you to swim and relax under the Caribbean sun. The terrace, with its stunning sea view, is ideal for al fresco dining or simply admiring the unforgettable sunsets of Saint-Barthélemy.

Located in Marigot, Villa Milonga enjoys a privileged location, close to the island's most beautiful beaches and local attractions. Whether you seek nautical adventures, relaxation on the white sands, or cultural exploration, everything is within reach.

Villa Milonga is more than just a vacation rental, it is an experience of luxury and tranquility in one of the world's most exclusive destinations. Discover this hidden gem of Saint-Barthélemy and let yourself be enchanted by its charm and elegance.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Milonga

Description:
Ideal for vacations with family or friends, the sublime Villa Coeur de Pirate is located in Anse des Cayes, above the hotel Le Manapany. Perched on the hillside, the view extends from the bay of Anse des Cayes to Eden Rock. The house is perfectly designed so that you can enjoy this exceptional setting at any time of the day. The grand yet comfortable living room overlooks the sea and welcomes intimate gatherings or larger ones with friends and family. The large, open kitchen is well-equipped for all your cooking needs.

The vast outdoor terrace offers a beautiful dining area with a breathtaking view of the sea, where all your senses will be awakened. Stone and natural wood materials throughout the house complement the simple and elegant decorations. Original furniture pieces offer uniqueness to the home while comfort and well-being are not overlooked! Relax wherever you wish in the many areas throughout the property. The outdoor deck will undeniably be your favorite place. Deck chairs, an outdoor lounge, a pool, and the sound of the waves crashing.

A long private staircase leads to the beach and the 5-star hotel Le Manapany below the villa. Surfers will be happy to know that this is one of the best surfing spots on the island. Nature surrounds you from the coconut tree-lined beach just below to the lush tropical vegetation. For your gatherings, the back patio includes a gazebo and a barbecue. There are 6 air-conditioned rooms equipped with private bathrooms. All of them have a view of the ocean, and two of them have outdoor showers. The inspired decoration of the Antilles fits the general atmosphere of the place: serene and relaxing. If you want to get away from this little paradise, you are only 6 minutes away from the shops and Gustavia, with its many restaurants and luxury boutiques.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Coeur de Pirate.

The plus: the huge deck and the deck overlooking the ocean.

Description:
Nestled in the tranquil hills of Vitet, Villa Abby offers a luxurious escape for those looking to immerse themselves in the tranquility of St.Barts. This exquisite villa boasts three spacious bedrooms, each designed to offer guests unparalleled comfort and privacy. The masterful architecture harmonizes with the magnificent natural surroundings, offering breathtaking views of the crystal-clear waters and lush landscapes that define the island.

Villa Abby is a haven of peace, meticulously equipped with all the modern conveniences necessary for a stay imbued with relaxation and ease. The open-plan living area fuses interior luxury with exterior beauty, inviting the gentle Caribbean breeze into every corner of the home. The fully equipped kitchen and spacious dining area are perfect for hosting intimate dinners or casual gatherings, ensuring that every meal is a memorable experience.
Outside, the private infinity pool serves as the centerpiece of your retreat, surrounded by a sun-drenched terrace equipped with comfortable lounge chairs. It's the perfect place to relax with a book, sip a sunset cocktail, or simply soak up the sun. The lush gardens that envelop the villa add an extra layer of privacy and serenity, making it feel like your own secluded paradise.

Villa Abby caters to the needs of groups and families alike, offering ample space and a variety of leisure options to ensure guests of all ages enjoy an unforgettable stay. Whether lounging by the pool, exploring the vibrant life of Saint-Barth, or enjoying the plethora of prestigious services at your fingertips, Villa Abby is the epitome of luxury and comfort.

Discover the dream travel experience that awaits you at Villa Abby, where every detail is carefully chosen to offer you a corner of paradise in the heart of Vitet.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Abby.

Description:
This beautiful villa, just renovated, enjoys rare calm and a magnificent setting in the Grand Cul de Sac district.
The main house has a walk-through living room overlooking the lagoon on one side and the pool on the other. Bright and airy, you can enjoy the gentle trade winds at any time of day.
Having preserved the charm of the Creole house style and redesigned it to suit today's tastes, the villa is the ideal setting for an unforgettable vacation.
Natural materials and modern furnishings with a focus on comfort and plenty of space for rest and relaxation create a particularly relaxing atmosphere.

The deck terrace overlooks a sublime tropical garden and hosts a swimming pool protected from prying eyes.
Submerged benches allow you to bask in the sunshine with a good book or cocktail of your choice.
Right next door, the dining area, delightfully shaded, where you can share tasty meals in complete conviviality.
Just a few minutes' walk from the lagoon and the island's kite spot, you can also enjoy canoeing, paddling, and snorkeling. The crystal-clear water and peaceful setting make this a truly unique place.
The first bedroom is in the main building overlooking the pool, and the second is in a separate bungalow.
Both rooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Close to the lagoon, with restaurants for lunch with your feet in the sand, and a twenty-minute drive away, you'll reach Gustavia, the "capital". A stroll along the harbor to admire the yachts, a shopping spree or a gourmet dinner, you'll enjoy the bustle of a unique district blending French luxury and Caribbean art de vivre.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Borderline.

The plus: an airy, calm living space bordered by a beautiful swimming pool.

Description:
Villa Rock is a magnificent property located in Lorient, on the paradisiacal island of Saint-Barthélemy. This charming villa, perfectly integrated into the lush environment of the island, offers its occupants an ideal setting to relax and enjoy the natural beauty of the Caribbean.

The villa features three spacious bedrooms, each tastefully decorated and equipped with comfortable beds, ample storage, and elegant decor that combines modernity with local touches. The large windows allow natural light to flood the rooms, creating a bright and soothing atmosphere. Each bedroom also has its own private bathroom, ensuring privacy and comfort for all guests. The bathrooms are all equipped with walk-in showers, modern basins, and plenty of storage space.

The living area of Villa Rock is a true haven of peace. The spacious, open-plan living room opens onto a wooden terrace overlooking a perfectly maintained tropical garden. The armchairs and sofas invite relaxation, while the fully equipped kitchen allows for the preparation of delicious meals to be enjoyed with family or friends.

The outdoor terrace is equipped with sun loungers and parasols, perfect for enjoying the tropical sun, while the private pool offers a refreshing alternative to the nearby sandy beaches.

Villa Rock is ideally located in Lorient, a peaceful and picturesque neighborhood of Saint-Barthélemy, known for its beautiful beaches and relaxed atmosphere. Local shops, restaurants, and cultural attractions are easily accessible, allowing visitors to explore the island's charms with ease.

In summary, Villa Rock is the perfect place for an unforgettable stay in Saint-Barthélemy, combining comfort, elegance, and proximity to nature, while offering an ideal base for exploring the treasures of this Caribbean island.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Rock

Description:
Villa Bastide, located in the prestigious neighborhood of Lurin, is an exclusive offer from Sun Beach House that promises an immersion into the luxury and elegance of St. Barts. With its three spacious bedrooms, this residence is the perfect refuge for those seeking to escape into a setting that is both refined and intimate.

Upon your arrival at Villa Bastide, you will be greeted by an atmosphere of serenity. The interior design, dominated by noble materials and clean lines, creates a perfect harmony with the surrounding tropical landscape. Each bedroom, conceived as a cocoon of tranquility, comes with its own private bathroom, offering unmatched privacy and comfort to all guests.

The central living space opens onto a spacious outdoor terrace, where the infinity pool seems to merge with the azure sky. This is the ideal place for sunny relaxation moments or gentle evenings under the stars, with the sea breeze as your only company. The modern, fully equipped kitchen allows for the preparation of gourmet meals or light snacks to be enjoyed while admiring the spectacular sea view.

Lurin, with its proximity to both the lively center of Gustavia and tranquil beaches, is the dream location for those wishing to explore the many facets of St. Barts. Villa Bastide thus offers easy access to a variety of activities, from luxury shopping sessions to lazy days on sandy beaches.

By choosing Villa Bastide for your stay in St. Barts, you opt for an experience where luxury, calm, and voluptuousness blend to perfection. Sun Beach House is committed to making your visit an unforgettable moment, where every detail has been thought of for your well-being. Villa Bastide is not just a place to stay, it's a promise of magical moments and everlasting memories.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Bastide

Description:
Villa Black Pearl lives up to its name. Like a Caribbean pearl, the sublime house offers an exceptional and unique setting for your stay in St. Barts.
The breathtaking view offers a foreground of the turquoise lagoon and a background of the azure sea.
In fact, the villa's layout was designed with this incredible panorama in mind.
The many sheltered outdoor spaces give you the opportunity to enjoy the mild climate, whether sitting in the lounge area sipping a drink, enjoying a good meal or relaxing in an armchair reading a novel.
The crystal-clear waters of the pool are an immediate invitation to take a dip, and relaxation is absolute.

You'll love the meticulous attention to detail in the interior design, with everything perfectly arranged and in harmony. Every item of furniture and every object seems to have been tailor-made for the villa. Nothing is too much, and comfort is indisputable.
The living room, with its open-plan kitchen, also faces outwards. Once the bay windows are open, you benefit from an immense living space.
The design is resolutely contemporary, and cohabits perfectly with the charm of the exposed roofs typical of Creole houses.
Here and there, paintings and other objets d'art underline the personality of the space.
At nightfall, the subtle lighting of the house creates a totally enchanting atmosphere...

The 4 large bedrooms offer equivalent comfort, overlooking either the main deck or the tropical garden. All have en-suite bathrooms and ample storage space.
Ideal for a get-together with friends or family, Villa Black Pearl is a magical place to share unforgettable moments.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Black Pearl.

The +: the breathtaking view and prestigious style of the villa

Description:
La Petite Sereine villa, located in Pointe Milou on Saint Barthélemy, is a true haven of peace and luxury. This sumptuous five-bedroom residence offers a breathtaking panoramic view of the ocean, capturing the island's natural beauty in all its splendor.

The interior of the villa is elegant and contemporary, with open and bright living spaces. Large bay windows let in natural light and allow for appreciation of the landscape at every moment. The spacious living room is tastefully decorated, combining comfort and modernity. The fully equipped kitchen is an ideal space for preparing gourmet meals while enjoying the view.

Each of the five bedrooms is a private sanctuary, offering complete privacy and unparalleled comfort. The rooms are decorated with particular attention to detail, blending modern design elements with tropical touches.

The exterior of La Petite Sereine is equally impressive, with a large terrace, a pool, and arranged relaxation areas. The pool provides an ideal setting to cool off while admiring the magnificent sunsets. The tropical gardens surrounding the villa add a touch of greenery and exoticism, creating a serene and soothing atmosphere.

La Petite Sereine villa in Pointe Milou is a dream destination for those seeking elegance, comfort, and tranquility in a paradisiacal setting. It is the perfect place to experience an unforgettable stay in Saint Barthélemy.

Enjoy your stay at La Petite Sereine villa.

Description:
Santa Alicia is a modern villa overlooking the beautiful bay of Flamands. The route to get there is just the beginning of the beauty! From the top, you can enjoy the scenery of colorful roofs, tropical vegetation, the turquoise ocean and the neighboring islands. You are free to enjoy the scenery in the open air or in the air conditioning since the whole house opens and closes according to your wishes.

Resolutely contemporary, the villa distinguishes itself from the local architecture and the style is a bit "art deco." Settled in the outdoor living room or stretched out on one of the deckchairs, you sip a cocktail or a good glass of French wine with contemplation. You are in the moment and nothing disturbs your serenity. Two minutes away by car, the sublime white sand beach of Flamands can be reached on foot. Don't forget that once you've gone down, you'll have to go back up... The opportunity however to appreciate every detail and to admire the nature that the rock offers us. Once you arrive on the beach, you will understand why some people say it is one of the most beautiful beaches in Saint-Barth.

At the end of the beach on the right, the hotel Le Cheval Blanc welcomes you for lunch or dinner in an idyllic setting. The small lounge on the beach is ideal for aperitif time. Back at your villa, you will appreciate the coolness of the place and the many shaded areas. From the deck and the heated pool, you reach the living room and one of the bedrooms. The master opens off of the living room and offers a beautiful bathroom with a serene outdoor shower. Finally, the third and last bedroom is located on the lower level for maximum privacy. From Flamands, you are only a few minutes away from Gustavia. Take the time to stroll the streets with the unique charm of an island both French and Creole. When authenticity meets luxury, the experience is unique, as is your stay. Here, luxury boutiques and vibrant bars rub shoulders just a few meters from the world's largest yachts.

Enjoy your stay in your villa Santa Alicia.

The + : the air-conditioned spaces and the sublime view.

Description:
The luxurious Villa Roxane in Gustavia is quite simply the villa of your dreams for a stay with family or friends in St. Barts. Everything you could wish for in a Caribbean holiday is on offer in this spacious residence, designed to accommodate 12 guests in the utmost comfort. Designed above all to make the most of the outdoors, the house offers several areas for relaxation and conviviality overlooking the extraordinary turquoise-blue panorama.

Two large shaded terraces house a charming outdoor living room, a round table ideal for breakfast, a spacious dining area, and an outdoor kitchen with a bar, equipped with a barbecue for your "grill party". A few steps further down, the large infinity pool is an immediate invitation to relax. Large enough for swimming, it also boasts a platform where you can cool off while reading a good novel or simply gaze out over the ocean.

As you enter the naturally ventilated living room, you'll appreciate the modernity and overall comfort of the spacious, welcoming space. The open-plan kitchen conceals a second, fully-equipped professional kitchen where you can welcome the services of a private chef and enjoy refined French or more exotic cuisine.

The six rooms are mainly located at the rear of the main building, on two floors. Two of them are interconnected and perfectly suited to a family, with a king-size bed and two single beds. All very comfortable and well-equipped, each room has its own private bathroom, elegantly decorated with its own unique charm, including an outdoor shower, private patio, sea view, or balcony. Sports enthusiasts can work out at home in the fully-equipped, air-conditioned gym.

Ideally located, you won't even need to take your car to reach the island's many restaurants and shops! Between shopping afternoons and gourmet dinners, you'll enjoy the island's "French Touch" mingled with St. Barth's distinctive art de vivre.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Roxane.

The plus: the absolute tranquility of the villa, right next to all the entertainment.

Description:
Located in Gouverneur, the luxurious rental villa Palm Springs is an outstanding property with a stunning view over the ocean,the Caribbean horizon and the glorious sunsets. Perfectly mixing the tropical ambiance with a most sophisticated design, this five-bedroom villa is the perfect place for an unforgettable stay in St Barts.
Vacation home Palm Springs was built around a central patio in a revamped "hut" style in a typical Caribbean architecture. Holiday rental Palm Springs was designed to offer the most refined luxury. The living room widely opens onto the terrace, and is furnished with sofas, armchairs and cushions in the mild breeze of the trade winds, as well as a HDTV for delightful movie nights. The dining room adjoins the living space with a beautiful rectangular table which can accommodate up to ten guests. In a fabulous combination of indoor and outdoor spaces facing a strikingly beautiful ocean view, vacation villa Palm Springs creates a peaceful and serene atmosphere for a perfect Caribbean stay.
On the sunny terrace that connects the open living room to the pavilions, there are sun loungers set up for delightful moments under the St.Barts sun, for whatever you wish: either reading, talking or simply relaxing in the dream ambiance. A sumptuous heated infinity swimming pool stretches over the width of the terrace, close to palm trees and local shrubs that create a very romantic atmosphere. And every evening, you'll marvel at the incredible beauty of the glowing sunsets when the night starts to fall.
The vacation villa in St Barts Palm Srings is composed of five air-conditioned bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. All have king size beds, except one bedroom which is furnished with twin beds. There are upscale amenities and noble materials for a most refined and luxurious stay: Brazilian Wenge wooden furniture, glossy concrete floors, underwater pool views from one of the rooms and office areas. On the lower level, sports lovers will enjoy the air-conditioned fitness room and the outdoor space perfect for yoga practice or for a massage.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Palm Springs

Description:
Discover Villa Stellae, ideally located in Lorient, a luxury gem nestled in a lush tropical garden. This property offers breathtaking ocean views, perfect for those seeking a heavenly vacation experience in St.Barts.
With its six spacious bedrooms and contemporary style, Villa Stellae combines modern comfort with elegant charm.

On the main level, the living room is furnished with pristine white sofas and armchairs, facing wide openings onto a covered terrace. This space opens onto a fully-equipped kitchen with a round table for six, ideal for convivial meals, and a bar that opens onto an outdoor area featuring a magnificent red grand piano facing the deep-blue horizon. Down below, the sparkling heated swimming pool is lined with deckchairs and parasols, with a pool table nearby for guaranteed relaxing moments.
Each room, spread over three levels, is a haven of peace with king-size beds and en-suite bathrooms, offering privacy and breathtaking views of the ocean or tropical garden. For wellness enthusiasts, a full gym is available, as well as a discreetly landscaped outdoor massage area, and a pool surrounded by authentic stonework.

Modern and cozy, Villa Stellae is the perfect choice for a stay of up to twelve people, promising luxury, comfort and privacy. Book your stay with Sun Beach House and get ready for an exceptional vacation in the splendor of the Caribbean.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Stellae

Description:
Discover the sumptuous Villa Golden Palm, nestled in the enchanting setting of Saint-Jean in Saint-Barthélemy. This prestigious residence, both modern and elegant, is designed to offer exceptional comfort and moments of absolute relaxation.

The villa features five luxuriously appointed bedrooms, each offering a peaceful atmosphere and spectacular views. The bedrooms are equipped with king-size beds, Egyptian cotton linens, and spacious wardrobes. Each of the five en-suite bathrooms is a haven of well-being, featuring walk-in showers, designer bathtubs, double sinks, and high-quality toiletries.
For fitness enthusiasts, the villa offers a private gym fully equipped with weight machines, treadmills, and elliptical trainers, allowing you to maintain your fitness routine without leaving the comfort of the villa.

The centerpiece of Villa Golden Palm is its heated infinity pool, surrounded by a sun-drenched terrace furnished with comfortable lounge chairs and parasols. This outdoor space is perfect for relaxing while enjoying panoramic ocean views.
The villa’s indoor and outdoor living spaces are designed for comfort and entertainment. The main living room, with large bay windows, opens onto the terrace, creating a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living. The modern kitchen, equipped with the latest appliances, is a paradise for culinary enthusiasts. A private chef can be arranged to prepare bespoke meals according to your desires.

To ensure a worry-free stay, Villa Golden Palm offers concierge and daily housekeeping services. Every detail is considered so that you can relax and fully enjoy your stay.

Villa Golden Palm is the ideal retreat for those seeking a luxurious and peaceful getaway in Saint-Barthélemy. With its top-of-the-line amenities and idyllic location, this villa promises unforgettable holidays and precious memories.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Golden Palm

Description:
Villa Alta Rocca: A Luxury Haven in Saint-Jean, St. Barts

Imagine a sanctuary where luxury and elegance seamlessly blend with the charm of the Caribbean. Welcome to Villa Alta Rocca, an exceptional residence promising unforgettable vacations.

Nestled in the lush surroundings of Saint-Jean, this 3-bedroom villa offers panoramic views of the endless azure sea, as if time has stopped to allow you to savor every moment. Each bedroom is a true haven of comfort, featuring its own en-suite bathroom to ensure privacy and tranquility for all guests.

Villa Alta Rocca is equipped to cater to your every desire: a sparkling pool invites you to moments of absolute relaxation, while a fully equipped gym allows you to maintain your fitness routine even while on vacation. For movie enthusiasts, a dedicated cinema room lets you escape into the world of film in utmost comfort.

Saint-Jean, with its high-end boutiques and gourmet restaurants, is just a short walk away. Enjoy the best of both worlds—seclusion and convenience—at Villa Alta Rocca.

Enjoy your stay at villa Alta Rocca
