Description:
Nestled on the heights of Colombier, Villa Always is an invitation to experience luxury at the pace of St. Barts. With a breathtaking view of the ocean, where the blue of the sky blends harmoniously with that of the sea, this residence embodies the very essence of a tropical escape. Equipped with three elegantly appointed bedrooms, each offering a haven of peace and privacy, Villa Always is the dream location for a family vacation or a getaway with friends. The three adjoining bathrooms, designed with attention to detail and comfort in mind, promise moments of absolute relaxation.

The spacious and welcoming living room opens onto an outdoor terrace where time seems to stand still. Here, a mirror pool invites you to refreshing dips while contemplating the endless horizon. The functional and perfectly equipped kitchen is the ideal playground for those wishing to explore local flavors in a sumptuous setting. Colombier, known for its peaceful character and stunning views, offers visitors of Villa Always a rare tranquility, while remaining close to the iconic attractions of St. Barts. From white sandy beaches to gourmet restaurants, and designer boutiques, everything is a short distance away, promising days filled with adventure and evenings steeped in serenity.

Choosing Villa Always means opting for an experience where luxury, comfort, and nature meet to create indelible memories. Always, more than just a villa, it's a pledge of unforgettable moments, an open door to the paradise of St. Barts.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Always.

Description:
Villa Jnana in Saint-Jean, Saint-Barthélemy, is a sumptuous residence offering a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and style. Nestled in an idyllic setting with breathtaking views of the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea, this villa is the ideal place to relax and enjoy the island's natural beauty.

Villa Jnana features four elegantly decorated bedrooms, each designed to offer maximum comfort and privacy. The rooms are equipped with king-size beds and high-quality linens, ensuring a peaceful night's sleep. The large windows allow you to fully enjoy the ocean views and surrounding tropical gardens. Each of the four bedrooms has its own en-suite bathroom, providing complete privacy. The bathrooms are equipped with walk-in showers, luxurious bathtubs, and double sinks.
The spacious living room of Villa Jnana is tastefully decorated, combining modern elements with local touches. The comfortable sofas and elegant decor create a welcoming atmosphere. The adjacent dining room is perfect for family meals or gatherings with friends, with a large table that can accommodate all guests. The villa's fully equipped kitchen is a dream for cooking enthusiasts. With high-quality appliances, marble countertops, and everything you need to prepare gourmet meals, you'll have everything at your fingertips to satisfy your culinary desires.

The large wooden terrace of the villa is the perfect place to relax, sunbathe, or enjoy a cocktail at sunset. The infinity pool offers panoramic views of the sea, creating an illusion of infinity between the pool water and the ocean. Comfortable lounge chairs invite you to fully enjoy the tropical climate. The tropical gardens surrounding Villa Jnana are beautifully maintained, with lush vegetation and colorful flowers. They offer a peaceful and private setting, perfect for quiet walks or moments of reflection.
Villa Jnana in Saint-Jean, Saint-Barthélemy, is a true oasis of luxury. With its four bedrooms and four bathrooms, it offers generous space and top-notch amenities for an unforgettable stay. Whether you seek tranquility or wish to explore the island's wonders, this villa is the ideal choice for a dream vacation in the Caribbean.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Jnana.

Description:
Villa Sam Lion, located in Anse des Cayes, St. Barthélemy, is a true haven of peace and discreet luxury. With its three spacious bedrooms and three elegantly appointed bathrooms, this villa is the ideal choice for unforgettable holidays with family or friends. Each bedroom is designed to offer comfort and privacy, featuring large windows that allow natural light to flood in and provide breathtaking views of the surrounding landscapes. The king-size beds, adorned with high-quality linens, promise restful nights. The en-suite bathrooms are equipped with modern amenities and luxury toiletries, combining contemporary design and functionality with walk-in showers and spacious vanity units. Cleanliness and attention to detail ensure a relaxing and refreshing experience.

Villa Sam Lion stands out for its open and bright living spaces. The living room, furnished with comfortable sofas and refined decorations, opens onto a sunny terrace where you can enjoy the tropical climate. The modern, fully equipped kitchen allows you to prepare gourmet meals that can be savored in the indoor dining area or al fresco. The terrace is the jewel of Villa Sam Lion. It offers a panoramic view of Anse des Cayes, with a lounge area for relaxation and a dining table for outdoor meals. The private infinity pool is perfect for cooling off while admiring the island's beauty.

Villa Sam Lion in St. Barthélemy is a luxury retreat that offers everything you need for an unforgettable stay. Without a gym, hammam, or home cinema, it focuses on the essentials: comfort, tranquility, and natural beauty. Come and discover this little corner of paradise and let yourself be charmed by the serenity of Anse des Cayes.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Sam Lion

Description:
Villa Sheherazade, nestled in the peaceful Corossol neighborhood of Saint-Barthélemy, is an enchanting retreat with an oriental spirit and breathtaking ocean views. This small one-bedroom villa is designed for those seeking to reconnect with themselves in a setting that is both simple and inspiring.

The villa's interior is decorated with an oriental sensibility, harmoniously blending traditional and modern elements. Arabesque fabrics, embroidered cushions and carved wooden furniture evoke a sense of tranquility and exoticism.
The bedroom, though modest, is a sanctuary of peace where soft hues and light textiles invite rest and relaxation.
The real jewel of Villa Sheherazade is undoubtedly its outdoor terrace, which offers an exceptional panorama of the turquoisesea. Surrounded by tropical vegetation and accented by touches of oriental design, the terrace is the perfect place to admire the dazzling sunsets that set the sky and sea ablaze. This natural spectacle, combined with the sea breeze, creates an idyllic setting for moments of meditation or romantic evenings under the stars.

Just a stone's throw away, Corossol beach enhances the experience, with its clear waters and small fishing boats gently rocking to the rhythm of the waves. Villa Sheherazade offers a beautiful escape where the charm of the Orient meets the breathtaking beauty of Saint-Barthélemy, making every stay an unforgettable experience.

Enjoy your stay atVilla Sheherazade

Description:
Perched on the heights of Saint-Jean, Villa Unik offers a breathtaking natural spectacle. This exclusive property combines bold architecture with high-quality materials. Featuring ten elegant bedrooms, it stands as a premier destination in Saint-Barth for luxurious holidays with an unparalleled ocean view.

This residence is divided into two modern structures. The interior, designed by Philippe Starck, creates a refined atmosphere enveloped by a magnificent setting. The spacious rooms include an air-conditioned living room adorned with brightly colored sofas and cushions. Nearby, the dining area adjoins a modern kitchen styled in a black and white checkerboard pattern, complete with a breakfast bar. The terrace offers a spectacular view of the ocean and a lush tropical garden. On the opposite side, large windows open onto a refreshing rear space, favored by the trade winds. A professional kitchen is also available for event planning with a private chef.

With its ten bedrooms, each featuring a private bathroom and views of the sea or garden, the villa ensures exceptional comfort. Seven suites are located in the main building and three in a separate cottage, equipped with a second infinity pool. The amenities are completed by a cinema room and a fitness room, making Villa Unik an incomparable place to enjoy the splendor of Saint-Barth.

The front terrace is a true paradise, offering a majestic view of the ocean and wooded hills. It is equipped for luxurious relaxation: a heated infinity pool, sun loungers, outdoor lounges, and a cocktail bar. A jacuzzi adorned with mosaics and surrounded by tropical palms invites ultimate relaxation.

We wish you a pleasant stay at Villa Unik.

Description:
The Wings Villa, with its ultra-modern design, blends seamlessly into the hillside of St-Jean, a highly sought-after neighborhood that is ideally situated on the island. The design is the product of a close collaboration between the architectural firm Olivier Dain Perspectives and its owners, who are avid art enthusiasts, offered for rent by Sun Beach House.

Remarkable and graceful, it boasts two large steel wings... hence its name, as if to soar directly into paradise. Beneath the first wing lies a living space that is open, airy, and dedicated to relaxation, from which you can already admire the turquoise waters of St-Jean Bay. A magnificent view can also be appreciated from the infinity pool, acting as a bridge between the two parts of the villa. The second living room is perfectly suited for your movie nights, with the option of open air or climate controlled.

Every space is designed for maximum enjoyment and to take advantage of the exceptional surroundings. Like the fully equipped kitchen, close to the terrace and living areas, and the indoor dining room that offers a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The architecture truly serves your well-being, such as the kitchen's central island extending outdoors to become a dining area that can accommodate eight people. Here, nothing is left to chance, especially not your comfort. Love and beauty are everywhere your gaze lands. Each object is in its place, as if born here, as part of a whole. You are not just at the heart of a villa, you are at the heart of a unique and unforgettable travel experience.

The dream continues in the bedrooms. The first, designed like a loft, overlooks the sea and the villa's two wings. The second bedroom, also on the upper level, offers a view of the sea, while the third overlooks a magnificent tropical garden. The last, below the living spaces, benefits from a semi-private terrace and a view of the Atlantic's blue. They all have a private bathroom. Finally, if you have the courage to leave the magic of this unique place for a moment, a fully equipped gym awaits you on the lower level of the villa.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Wings, renowned for its architecture and unique design.

Description:
Villa Varuna (named after the god of the ocean in Hindu culture) lives up to its name and seems divinely inspired. Luxury meets minimalism with obvious elegance. The immense living room is a haven of peace between the ocean and the vegetation. Seamlessly transition from the large terrace with its infinity pool to the open kitchen and then to the tropical garden. Everything inspires calm and serenity. The furniture is simple and contemporary, excluding any superfluous objects. The materials, mainly organic, are noble and of high quality.

Each element is thoughtfully considered and contributes to the unity and coherence of the whole. You become part of this whole during your stay. There are places that are hard to describe, where words fail to capture the atmosphere that is all about feeling and emotion. The place is like a “sacred” space. At any time of the day, the sun invites itself into the house to gently illuminate the different living areas. Ideally located, the villa is just a few steps from the famous Eden Rock and the beautiful St-Jean beach.

Very central, you will only have a few kilometers to travel to go from one place to another on our beautiful island of St-Barth. Perfect for a family stay or with friends, you will enjoy sitting at the bar to chat with the chef or taking advantage of the large belvedere and its summer kitchen to savor your barbecue-cooked lunch. Time stands still, and you feel literally blessed by the heavens. To guarantee everyone's privacy, the 4 bedrooms are well-separated and offer equivalent comfort: a private bathroom, a large television at the foot of the bed, and a view of the ocean or the tropical garden.

To prolong the divine experience, one of them has an outdoor shower.

Have a great stay at Villa Varuna.

The +: the minimalist style and its divine character

Description:
Discover the splendor of Villa Ela, a rare gem nestled in the heart of St. Barts. With its 8 luxurious bedrooms and 8 refined bathrooms, this residence epitomizes the pinnacle of luxury and comfort for those seeking an unparalleled getaway. Each bedroom, a true haven of elegance, offers unmatched privacy and breathtaking views of the endless azure ocean or the lush tropical garden surrounding the villa.

At Villa Ela, you will find a suite of premium amenities designed for your pleasure and relaxation. A majestic infinity pool invites you to moments of absolute tranquility under the caressing sun of St. Barts, while the fully equipped fitness room and home cinema promise entertainment and well-being at every moment of your stay.
The villa stands proudly a stone's throw away from Flamands Beach, one of the island's most beautiful spots, offering privileged access to crystal-clear waters and unforgettable moments of leisure on the soft sand. Imagine days lulled by the gentle murmur of the waves, starry nights where the sky blends seamlessly with the ocean, and al fresco dinners under the island's gentle breeze.

We ensure a worry-free experience with personalized concierge services that cater to all your desires: reservations at starred restaurants, tailor-made activities to explore St. Barts without the adrenaline but with full exoticism, and logistical assistance for a serene stay.
Villa Ela is not merely a vacation rental, it is an invitation to live St. Barts in its most enchanting and exclusive form. Allow yourself to be transported to a world where luxury, serenity, and the natural beauty of St.Barts converge for an unforgettable experience.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Ela.

Description:
Discover the timeless charm of Villa Felicita, a gem in St.Barts where luxury meets comfort amidst natural beauty. With 7 sumptuous bedrooms and bathrooms, this home is the perfect retreat for those seeking a pure escape to luxury. Each room offers an oasis of tranquility, adorned with magnificent views of lush gardens or the infinite blue horizon, promising unforgettable sunrises and sunsets.

At the heart of St.Barts, Villa Felicita offers an unparalleled stay. Dive into the elegance of its infinity pool, where water blends with the sky in perfect harmony. Wellness enthusiasts will be delighted by the fully equipped fitness room, while home cinema evenings add a touch of conviviality to the experience.
Located near white sandy beaches, the villa provides privileged access to one of the island's natural wonders, inviting moments of relaxation under the sun or romantic walks at sunset. The villa's spacious terrace is the dream setting for al fresco dining under the starry sky of St.Barts, where every meal becomes a memorable experience.
Sun Beach House ensures your perfect stay with a range of tailor-made concierge services: reservations at the island's most renowned restaurants, personalized excursions to discover the hidden treasures of St.Barts without a hint of adrenaline, all in absolute comfort.

Villa Felicita is not just an accommodation option, it is an open door to exclusivity and refinement, a promise of a vacation where luxury, relaxation, and beauty merge into an unprecedented experience.An adventure where every detail is designed for your well-being, and let St.Barts envelop you in its unique charm.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Felicita.

Description:
Welcome to Villa Sea Bird, a rental treasure located in the Mont Jean estate, offered by Sun Beach House. This 3-bedroom home is perfect for those looking to escape to an exceptional setting. Each room, a haven of peace, is equipped with a private bathroom, offering privacy and comfort to each guest. The architecture of the villa opens up to breathtaking panoramic views, where the ocean seems to merge with the endless blue sky.

The living room, the true heart of the villa, is bathed in natural light. It extends into a magnificent terrace, overlooking an infinity pool that invites absolute relaxation. Here, every moment is an ode to well-being, whether it’s during a restorative sunbath or a dinner under the stars. In terms of equipment, Villa Sea Bird leaves nothing to chance to ensure an unforgettable experience: a fully equipped kitchen and refined decoration that combines comfort and aesthetics.

Nestled in a green setting, just minutes from white sand beaches and the chic shops of Gustavia, Villa Sea Bird is the ideal starting point to discover Saint-Barth in all its facets. Between nautical escapades and gastronomic evenings, your stay promises to be as enchanting as it is diverse.

Make Villa Sea Bird, with Sun Beach House, your next destination for a memorable getaway in Saint-Barth, where beauty and tranquility meet in perfect balance.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Sea Bird.

Description:
Villa Belharra in Grand Cul de Sac epitomizes luxury and authenticity. Constructed from organic materials such as stone, wood, and marble, this villa offers a serene retreat with a comfortable outdoor lounge perfect for admiring the lagoon's scenic views. Its design seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living, allowing guests to move freely from the pool to various parts of the house, enhancing the overall fluidity and openness of the space.

The villa's decor features large palm trees and typical Creole huts, adding an authentic touch to its aesthetic. The tropical garden complements this with vibrant colored flowers and nightly serenades by a chorus of frogs, creating a truly enchanting environment.

Designed with guest comfort in mind, the villa includes an open kitchen with a large table suitable for 8 guests, and an outdoor dining area shaded from the sun, perfect for leisurely meals. The proximity to the sea means you’re just a step away from grilling fresh mahi-mahi or lobsters on the barbecue.

Situated near the luxurious Hotel le Barthélemy, guests have the option to enjoy a meal with their feet in the sand or sip cocktails in style. The lagoon, a haven for kite surfers and paddle boarders, is within walking distance and offers snorkeling opportunities to explore vibrant underwater life, including numerous sea turtles.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Belharra

The villa comprises 4 bedrooms, each equipped with an ensuite bath, ensuring privacy and convenience for all guests

Description:
Villa 3H, located in the sought-after district of Lurin, is an exceptional residence that combines luxury and serenity in a charming setting. This majestic property offers nine spacious bedrooms and eight elegant bathrooms, each fitted with high-quality materials and a thoughtful design to ensure comfort and privacy. The heart of the villa is a vast open living space that includes a sumptuous lounge, a dining room capable of accommodating many guests, and a fully equipped modern kitchen. The large bay windows provide exceptional brightness and open onto an outdoor terrace where the sea view is breathtaking.

Outdoors, residents can enjoy an infinity pool that seems to blend into the horizon, surrounded by sun loungers and shaded areas for relaxation. The lush gardens around the villa add a touch of greenery and freshness, creating a true oasis of peace.

For entertainment and fitness enthusiasts, Villa 3H proudly features not only a modern home cinema, offering a high-level cinematic experience with state-of-the-art audio and video equipment, perfect for movie nights or large-scale sports events, but also a well-equipped gym to keep up with your exercise routine.

Villa 3H is also equipped with modern amenities such as a state-of-the-art security system, high-speed internet connection, and a complete entertainment system, thus ensuring an experience that is both secure and entertaining.

With its luxurious finishes, idyllic location, and superior entertainment facilities, Villa 3H represents the pinnacle of elegance and comfort in one of Lurin's most beautiful settings. Whether it's for a family vacation, a special event, or just to enjoy the tranquility of the island, this property promises an unforgettable experience.

Enjoy your stay at Villa 3H.

Description:
Welcome to Villa Tortue, a sumptuous luxury retreat nestled in the picturesque setting of Marigot, Saint-Barthélemy. This exceptional villa offers the perfect blend of modern amenities and tropical charm, designed to provide an unforgettable experience for you and your loved ones.
Villa Tortue has four beautifully appointed bedrooms, each designed with comfort and elegance in mind. The spacious rooms feature luxury bedding, en-suite bathrooms, and large windows that invite you to enjoy the island's natural beauty, guaranteeing a relaxing and serene ambience.

The villa's open-plan living space is an epitome of sophistication and relaxation. The living room opens onto a large terrace, perfect for relaxing or dining al fresco while taking in the breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. For those who love to cook, the fully equipped gourmet kitchen is a dream come true. It features state-of-the-art appliances and generous space, allowing you to prepare meals with ease.
Whether you're cooking a casual breakfast or a gourmet dinner, you'll find everything you need at your fingertips. Fitness enthusiasts will appreciate the villa's private gym, equipped with modern exercise machines and dumbbells. Whether you prefer a morning workout or an evening stretching session, you can maintain your fitness routine in the comfort and privacy of your own villa.

Step outside to discover your private oasis. The villa boasts a stunning infinity pool that seems to merge perfectly with the ocean beyond. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, the pool area is perfect for relaxing, sunbathing, or enjoying a refreshing dip.
There's also a shaded outdoor lounge and barbecue, ideal for entertaining or simply relaxing after a day exploring the island. Located in the prestigious Marigot district, Villa Tortue offers easy access to some of Saint-Barthélemy's finest beaches, restaurants, and shopping destinations. Whether you want to explore the vibrant local culture or indulge in a quiet day by the sea, everything you need is just a short drive away.

Experience the ultimate in luxury and relaxation at Villa Tortue. Book your stay today and create unforgettable memories in one of the Caribbean's most beautiful destinations.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Tortue.

Description:
Nestled in the idyllic setting of Dévé, Saint-Barthélemy, Villa Scarlett is a luxurious residence offering an unforgettable experience in the heart of the Caribbean. This magnificent villa stands out with its panoramic views of the Grand Cul de Sac lagoon and the ocean at Toiny, which you can admire from its stunning heated infinity pool.

Villa Scarlett offers elegant accommodations with four bedrooms, each featuring its own ensuite bathroom with a shower and toilet. Three of the bedrooms are located on the main level of the villa, providing direct access to the living spaces and the outdoor terrace. These rooms are bright and carefully designed, with large windows allowing you to fully enjoy the breathtaking views of the lagoon and ocean.

The fourth bedroom is situated on the lower level of the villa, offering additional privacy. Maintaining the same level of comfort and refinement, this bedroom also has its own ensuite bathroom and direct access to a private outdoor space.

The heated infinity pool, the true centerpiece of Villa Scarlett, invites you to relax while taking in the panoramic views of the turquoise waters of the lagoon and the waves at Toiny. Perfect for moments of relaxation under the Caribbean sun, it is surrounded by lounge chairs and shaded areas where you can unwind in complete tranquility.

Villa Scarlett embodies luxury and comfort in an exceptional natural setting, making every stay a memorable experience. Ideal for families, groups of friends, or couples seeking romance, this villa is the perfect place to discover the beauty of Saint-Barthélemy.

Enjoy your stay at villa Scarlett.

Description:
A prestigious villa overlooking Gustavia and its bay, the house is located in the heights of Lurin.
The entrance to the property is through a lovely driveway lined with tropical vegetation.
When you enter the house, you are greeted by both the charm and perfection within.
A subtle balance between indoor and outdoor spaces makes you feel in the perfect place to spend unforgettable moments with friends or family.

In fact, you can already see yourself sipping a cocktail directly from the pool bar while enjoying the breathtaking view.
The large wooden deck offers several relaxation areas to enjoy the Caribbean sun and the gentle spray from the ocean.
For your meals, you may prefer the shade of the terrace always facing the sea.
In the evening, the fully equipped open kitchen welcomes the services of a private chef, unless you prefer to dine in one of Gustavia's many restaurants, located just 5 minutes away by car.
From gourmet French cuisine to Creole, Italian and Japanese, the capital will satisfy every taste.

As for the atmosphere, many festive places allow you to prolong the evening with music.
Back at the villa, you will appreciate the comfort of the living room for a last drink or to offer your friends a delicious piano tune. The ultimate in luxury, this magnificent grand piano is just waiting for you.
Exhausted by so many emotions, you go to one of the four rooms. Three of them have a private terrace with sea views and an outdoor shower.
Two of the rooms are connected to each other.

The style of the house is full of Caribbean charm, the woodwork, the vaulted roof and the many openings with shelves.
For the rest, you will enjoy all the amenities expected of a luxury villa. As for the choice of materials, noble and organic, contributing to the soft atmosphere of the place.

Enjoy your stay at the Blue Swan villa.

The + : the harmony of the place and the incredible view

Description:
The JSA villa is a sublime luxury property located in the Lurin district. The architecture is inspired by Creole houses and consists of several bungalows, each serving a different function, all oriented towards the heart of the house: the large deck terrace and its perfectly integrated infinity pool. No effort is required to enjoy a swim.

Close by, comfortable sun loungers await you to perfect this delightful moment. The view is simply incredible. You overlook the hill while the sea stretches as far as the eye can see. You can barely distinguish the pool water from the color of the horizon.
In a prime spot, the shaded and ventilated dining area can accommodate 6 guests.

Just like the kitchen table, extending from the central island for truly convivial moments. A wine cellar allows you to store your best vintages. In front of you, a painting with tropical colors... but wait a minute, no, it’s not a painting but a glass opening onto an authentic green wall.
All of this is real. The style is decidedly contemporary and high-end. No detail has escaped the decorator’s attention to ensure you as much comfort as aesthetics. Only two “vintage” objects decorate the property, a pinball machine and a foosball table.
For some, they evoke another era, for others happy memories, but for all, good times of entertainment and laughter.

The bedrooms also offer all the comfort and equipment you could hope for. Just a few minutes from your villa, you are in Gustavia. You appreciate the lively atmosphere blending the charm of the Antilles and French luxury.
Yachts are part of the scenery and the extravagance of such a small island. Unique, the experience continues in one of the many restaurants for a culinary escape or a wild night out. Back at the villa, you stretch out on the terrace or enjoy a moonlight swim to spot a shooting star. Make a wish... it is already granted.

Enjoy your stay at the JSA villa.

The +: the villa’s luxury.

Description:
Villa Maud is a prestigious property nestled in the sought-after neighborhood of St Jean, on the beautiful island of St Barthélemy. This peaceful haven offers five luxurious bedrooms, each with its own private en-suite bathroom, ensuring unparalleled comfort and privacy for its guests. The villa is designed to provide spacious and elegant living areas, making it perfect for family vacations or getaways with friends.

The bedrooms are carefully decorated with high-quality materials, and their layout guarantees each guest a comfortable and serene personal space. The modern bathrooms, all en-suite, are tastefully designed with high-end amenities and refined finishes.

Villa Maud also stands out for its outdoor relaxation areas. At the rear of the villa, you'll find a stunning private pool surrounded by a spacious terrace, ideal for enjoying moments of relaxation under the Caribbean sun. While the pool doesn't offer a direct view of St Jean Bay, it is set in a peaceful and intimate environment, surrounded by tropical vegetation, creating a soothing and discreet atmosphere.

For those who enjoy staying active, the villa is equipped with a modern gym, fully equipped with everything you need to maintain your fitness routine during your stay. Whether you want to start your day with a workout or simply relax by the pool, Villa Maud caters to all your needs.

Located just minutes from the famous St Jean beaches and the island's chic boutiques, Villa Maud combines a prime location with top-tier amenities. It offers guests a luxurious experience in the heart of St Barth, while being close to the island’s must-see attractions. Whether for a relaxing escape or an active holiday, Villa Maud is the perfect place to enjoy the charm and beauty of the island in an exceptional setting.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Maud.

Description:
Perched in a preserved natural setting, Villa Vue de Rêve is a haven of peace offering breathtaking panoramic views of the ocean. From the moment you arrive, you are enveloped in an atmosphere of tranquility where every element is carefully considered to maximize your comfort. This villa features five spacious bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom, ensuring absolute privacy for every guest. The heated pool, surrounded by greenery, is perfect for relaxation in any season, while the private gym allows you to maintain your wellness routine in a luxurious setting. The outdoor spaces, including a vast terrace, are perfect for unwinding while admiring the endless beauty of the horizon. Whether you’re looking to reconnect with nature or simply enjoy a moment of pure relaxation, Villa Vue de Rêve is the ideal place.

Situated on the heights of St-Jean, Villa Vue de Rêve lives up to its name. With stunning views of the turquoise sea, this villa is the perfect setting for a luxurious getaway. The contemporary architecture seamlessly blends with Caribbean design touches, creating a living space that is both chic and comfortable. The large bay windows let in natural light, creating a soothing ambiance and offering spectacular panoramas from every room. The highlight of this villa is undoubtedly its terrace, equipped with an infinity pool, where you can relax while watching the sunset over the ocean. Here, every moment is an invitation to daydream.

Embark on an unparalleled adventure in one of our exceptional villas in the Caribbean, where every day is a new opportunity to savor life in all its splendor.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Vue de rêve

Description:
Welcome to Villa Étoile Brillante, a true gem nestled in the sought-after area of Lurin on the enchanting island of Saint Barthélemy. This magnificent villa, with 5 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms, seamlessly combines luxury, comfort, and elegance, promising an unforgettable stay in the heart of the Caribbean. Each spacious bedroom is tastefully decorated, offering refined spaces and sumptuous beds for complete relaxation. The ensuite bathrooms are equipped with top-of-the-line amenities, perfect for unwinding after a day in the tropical sun.

Step outside into a vast outdoor living area designed for relaxation and entertainment. This beautiful space includes a large HDTV, perfect for enjoying movies or sports events while being soothed by the gentle Caribbean breeze. The crown jewel of Villa Étoile Brillante is undoubtedly the heated infinity pool. Perched on the edge of the horizon, it offers breathtaking panoramic views of the lush hills and the sparkling waters of the island. Whether you bask in the sun or relax under the stars, every moment spent here will feel like an escape into paradise.

Villa Étoile Brillante is more than just a place to stay—it is an experience where serenity and refinement meet to offer you an exceptional vacation. Come and create unforgettable memories at this luxurious and tranquil oasis on Saint Barthélemy.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Etoile Brillante

Description:
Villa Legends B is a magnificent 5-bedroom, 5-bathroom retreat nestled in the prestigious Lurin area of St. Barthélemy. Offering a perfect balance of luxury, comfort, and modernity, this villa is designed to provide the ultimate island escape. Each of the five spacious bedrooms is elegantly furnished and features its own en-suite bathroom, ensuring privacy and comfort for every guest.

The property boasts stunning panoramic views of the island, and its outdoor spaces are equally impressive. The heated swimming pool invites you to relax and soak in the breathtaking surroundings, while comfortable lounge areas offer the perfect spots for sunbathing or enjoying an evening under the stars.

For those who enjoy staying active, Villa Legends B includes a fully equipped gym, making it easy to maintain your fitness routine while on vacation. The villa’s open living spaces, modern amenities, and beautiful design create an atmosphere of tranquility and sophistication, making it an ideal destination for families or groups of friends looking to experience the best of St. Barthélemy.

Whether you're savoring a quiet morning by the pool, enjoying a workout in the gym, or exploring the vibrant culture of the island, Villa Legends B offers an unparalleled combination of relaxation and adventure in one of the most exclusive areas of St. Barthélemy.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Legends B

Description:
Perched on the heights of Saint-Jean, Villa L'Oiseau Bleu offers breathtaking views over the bay of St Jean, with the iconic Eden Rock hotel in the background. This exceptional villa promises an unforgettable stay, blending luxury and tranquility in one of the Caribbean’s most beautiful destinations.

Featuring three spacious and tastefully decorated bedrooms, each with its own private en-suite bathroom, the villa is designed for your comfort and privacy. The expansive living areas open onto sun-drenched terraces and an infinity pool, where you can admire the spectacular views of the turquoise sea and the elegant Eden Rock perched on its promontory.

Just minutes away from the white sand beaches of Saint-Jean, yet tucked away from the hustle and bustle, Villa L'Oiseau Bleu is the ideal retreat for those seeking to unwind in a magical setting. Whether you’re relaxing by the pool or soaking in the stunning panoramas, this villa epitomizes Caribbean luxury.

Make Villa L'Oiseau Bleu your peaceful haven, and let yourself be captivated by the beauty of Saint-Barthélemy.

Description:
Nestled in the idyllic setting of St. Jean, St. Barthélemy, Villa Belle Créole invites you to experience a unique blend of comfort, elegance, and serenity. This property offers 7 spacious bedrooms, each equipped with its own private bathroom, ensuring privacy and convenience for all guests.

Among these rooms, the seventh is slightly smaller and is located in an independent bungalow by the pool, offering additional tranquility for its occupants.

Villa Belle Créole charms with its traditional Creole architecture and modern, refined interiors. The living spaces are generous and bright, designed to offer a sense of absolute well-being. The fully equipped kitchen and large living room open onto a welcoming wooden terrace, perfect for sharing moments with family or friends.

The exterior is a true haven of peace. Enjoy the heated pool surrounded by lush tropical gardens, where you can relax throughout the day. The terrace offers a breathtaking panoramic view of the hills of St. Barthélemy and the turquoise sea, ideal for magical evenings under the stars.

Located just minutes away from the famous St. Jean beach and the island's best restaurants, shops, and activities, Villa Belle Créole is the perfect place to spend an unforgettable vacation in one of the Caribbean's most sought-after destinations.

Whether you're looking for relaxation, adventure, or special moments, Villa Belle Créole will meet all your expectations for an exceptional stay in St. Barthélemy.

Description:
Located in the charming neighborhood of St. Jean on the island of St. Barthélemy, Villa Anolis is a true haven of comfort. This refined villa features four elegantly appointed bedrooms. Three of these bedrooms are situated on the main level, each with its own en-suite bathroom, providing privacy and convenience for all guests.

The fourth bedroom is located on the lower level and has been designed as a studio. This self-contained space includes a cozy living area, a fully equipped kitchenette, a bedroom, and a bathroom, allowing guests to enjoy an independent stay while remaining close to the rest of the villa.

The villa enjoys a prime location with stunning views of St. Jean Bay and the famous Eden Rock. Whether from the poolside or the sunlit terraces, the spectacular panoramas create a perfect backdrop for a serene and memorable getaway. Villa Terre Indigo is the ideal choice for those seeking a refined and tranquil experience in St. Barthélemy.

Enjoy your stay at Villa Anolis

Description:
Discover this stunning villa located in Lorient, on the prestigious island of Saint-Barthélemy, where luxury and nature come together in an exceptional setting. Nestled by the ocean with direct access to Lorient Beach, this property offers you an unforgettable experience of tranquility and refinement in the heart of the Caribbean.

The main villa features four spacious bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom. These bright rooms, open to panoramic views, welcome you into a chic and soothing ambiance where every detail has been carefully thought out to provide absolute comfort. Large bay windows invite natural light to flood the spaces, creating a harmonious connection with the outdoors.

At the rear of the villa, an independent bungalow houses a fifth bedroom with its own en-suite bathroom. Set apart from the main villa, this bungalow is perfect for guests or family members seeking a bit more privacy while still being close to the communal areas.

The highlight of this villa is its breathtaking outdoor space. A magnificent infinity pool takes center stage on the terrace and seems to blend seamlessly into the ocean. This perfect illusion, where the pool water merges with the sea, creates a captivating and unique atmosphere. Swimming in this pool offers a magical feeling of floating between the sky and the sea, with an endless horizon as a backdrop.

Right next to the pool, an elegant jacuzzi is integrated into this paradise-like setting. Here, you can switch between a refreshing dip in the pool and a relaxing soak in the bubbling jacuzzi while admiring the stunning ocean views. This arrangement allows you to enjoy a true sanctuary of relaxation, where the transition between the calm of the pool and the soothing warmth of the jacuzzi is seamless.

The terrace, equipped with comfortable lounging and relaxation areas, is perfect for outdoor gatherings, whether for a sunset meal or simply to enjoy the ocean breeze throughout the day. Every corner of this outdoor space is designed to offer breathtaking views, making every moment spent here truly special.

This villa embodies the essence of island luxury. With its five bedrooms, direct beach access, infinity pool blending into the ocean, and jacuzzi integrated into the terrace, it is the perfect retreat for a dream vacation in Saint-Barthélemy. Here, you will find everything you need to escape and fully enjoy the natural beauty and ultimate comfort of this exceptional island.

Description:
Villa Carmen, located in the peaceful neighborhood of Vitet on Saint-Barthélemy, is the perfect getaway for a family vacation. Surrounded by lush greenery, this charming villa offers a private and relaxing setting, ideal for those looking to unwind in a tranquil environment while remaining close to the island's attractions.

The villa features three comfortable bedrooms, perfectly suited for families with children. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, providing ample privacy for the parents. The two additional bedrooms, designed for children or other family members, share a common bathroom, making it a practical and family-friendly layout.

The living spaces at Villa Carmen are open and bright, with a spacious terrace perfect for outdoor dining. The villa also includes a private pool where both children and adults can relax and enjoy the tropical climate of Saint-Barthélemy. With its warm and family-oriented ambiance, Villa Carmen is the ideal place for a peaceful and memorable family vacation.

Enjoy your stay at villa Carmen

Description:
Welcome to Villas Cosmos, a peaceful retreat nestled within a vast private estate in the prestigious Mont Jean area of St. Barthélemy. This luxurious villa, located on an exclusive property with several other villas, offers breathtaking views of the ocean and the surrounding landscape, making it the perfect setting for an unforgettable vacation.

A secure gate at the entrance of the estate ensures your peace and privacy, highlighting the exclusive nature of this exceptional location. The spacious living room, complete with a ceiling fan, provides a cool and serene atmosphere, ideal for relaxing after a day of exploration.

Villas Cosmos features four elegantly decorated bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom for maximum comfort. One of the bedrooms is equipped with two single beds that can be converted into a king-size bed, catering to your specific needs.

Outside, the heated swimming pool invites you to unwind, surrounded by the natural beauty of this tropical paradise. Whether you are seeking a tranquil escape or unforgettable moments with family, Villas Cosmos at Mont Jean is the perfect choice for your stay in St. Barthélemy.

Description:
Perched on the exclusive heights of Mont Jean, Villa Céladon embodies elegance and tropical serenity. With its five sumptuous bedrooms, each featuring luxurious en-suite bathrooms, this residence offers a refined setting, perfect for those seeking privacy and absolute comfort. Each bedroom, thoughtfully designed with a blend of modernity and Caribbean influences, provides moments of tranquility with breathtaking panoramic views.

The villa's interior is fully air-conditioned to ensure optimal comfort at all times. The air-conditioned living room, spacious and bathed in natural light, opens onto the outside, offering a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces. The air-conditioned kitchen, equipped with modern appliances, is a paradise for culinary enthusiasts, perfect for preparing unforgettable meals to be enjoyed with stunning ocean views.

Outside, the covered terrace invites relaxation, featuring a shaded outdoor lounge, where you can unwind in comfort while admiring the stunning vistas. The heated swimming pool, surrounded by a spacious deck, provides an ideal setting for leisurely lounging, allowing you to fully embrace the natural beauty of the surroundings.

Nestled within a secure and private estate, Villa Céladon is a true haven of peace where luxury and nature blend harmoniously. Whether for a family getaway, a retreat with friends, or an exclusive event, this prestigious villa in Saint-Barthélemy promises unforgettable memories in an exceptional setting. Every detail has been thoughtfully designed to offer a unique experience of well-being and sophistication.

Description:
Perched atop the hills of Colombier, Villa Voyage invites you to an unforgettable escape on the enchanting island of Saint Barthélemy. This exceptional villa combines charm, comfort, and serenity, offering the perfect setting for a memorable vacation with family, friends, or even as a couple.

The villa features 5 beautifully appointed bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom, ensuring complete privacy and optimal comfort. Every room has been carefully decorated, blending local inspirations with modern touches, and offers breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea, creating a tranquil ambiance where time seems to stand still.

The outdoor space is equally impressive. The heated infinity pool invites you to enjoy long moments of relaxation while gazing at the sparkling sea stretching out to the horizon. For additional indulgence, the jacuzzi provides the perfect spot to unwind after a day of exploring the island's treasures. The expansive terraces, bordered by lush vegetation, offer both shaded and sunlit areas, depending on your mood, with sun loungers and an outdoor dining area where you can enjoy convivial moments together.

Nature lovers and those seeking peace will be enchanted by the serene environment of Colombier, while remaining just a few minutes away from the island’s white sandy beaches and charming villages. Whether you want to spend your days exploring marine life, strolling along the beaches, or simply lounging by the pool, Villa Voyage is the ideal base from which to discover the magic of Saint Barthélemy.

Additionally, the villa offers everything you need to make your stay comfortable and worry-free. You’ll enjoy modern and convenient amenities, along with attentive service, allowing you to focus on what matters most: relaxing and creating unforgettable memories with your loved ones.

Whether for a short stay or an extended vacation, Villa Voyage in Colombier promises a stay filled with beauty, tranquility, and precious moments to share.

Description:
Luxury and Serenity with a Panoramic Lagoon View

Nestled in the heart of Grand Cul de Sac, Villa Quartz invites you to an exceptional stay in a breathtaking setting. This charming villa, composed of 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, combines comfort and elegance in an unparalleled natural environment.

The centerpiece of the villa is a spacious outdoor gazebo, perfect for relaxing in the shade, with a wine cellar and a fully equipped outdoor kitchen for alfresco dining. The 16-meter heated pool blends seamlessly into the surroundings, offering an invitation to relax all year round.

With its bright and refined decor, the villa captivates with its design touches, such as tapestries with exotic and contemporary patterns, as well as elegant moucharabiehs that add a subtle touch of sophistication. The fluid architecture erases the boundaries between indoor and outdoor spaces, allowing you to fully enjoy the private garden areas, or relax around a fire pit in the lounge area.

The panoramic view of the bay is the villa’s true gem, offering a permanent spectacle over the crystal-clear waters of the lagoon and the azure horizon.

Additionally, the estate offers a unique opportunity for those seeking more space, as it is home to four exclusive villas, all available for rent. Whether for a large group or a private event, the possibility to rent multiple villas provides the ultimate flexibility for an unforgettable experience.

Description:
Villa Lazuli, located in Grand Cul de Sac, is a stunning luxury property offering breathtaking views of the sea and lagoon. Featuring four spacious bedrooms and four bathrooms, this villa is the perfect setting for a family vacation or a getaway with friends, combining comfort and privacy.

The villa's interior is distinguished by its contemporary design with natural elegance. The living spaces are open and bright, highlighting the panoramic views. The modern kitchen, equipped with high-end appliances, opens onto a refined living room and a large dining area. Each bedroom has its own ensuite bathroom, ensuring a private retreat for every guest. The rooms are thoughtfully decorated and have direct access to the outdoor terrace, allowing guests to fully enjoy the serene surroundings.

Outside, the villa is surrounded by lush tropical vegetation and boasts a large heated pool, perfect for relaxing at any time of day. The terrace is furnished with sun loungers and a lounge area to enjoy the sun and the gentle Saint Barth evenings.

The facilities also include a shared fitness center accessible to all villas on the estate. Larimar is accessible via the pathway, while the other villas have direct access from within the domain. Housekeeping service is provided 7 days a week, and a turndown service can be arranged upon request, ensuring a hassle-free stay. For the convenience of its guests, water and soft drinks are included.

With its enchanting setting, modern amenities, and personalized service, Villa Lazuli is the perfect embodiment of elegance and well-being in Saint Barthélemy.

Description:
Villa Larimar is located in Grand Cul de Sac, St Barthélemy, offering a unique setting with exceptional panoramic sea views. This luxury villa stands out with its 4 spacious bedrooms and 4 elegantly designed bathrooms, creating the perfect space to accommodate up to 8 guests.

The interior of Villa Larimar is characterized by its sophisticated and modern decor, combining tropical design elements with high-end materials. Each bedroom is equipped with a king-size bed, custom storage, and en-suite bathrooms featuring walk-in showers. The living areas are designed to maximize natural light and create a harmonious flow between indoor and outdoor spaces.

The main highlight of this property is its heated infinity pool, located on the main terrace and offering a stunning view of the Grand Cul de Sac lagoon. The outdoor terrace is perfect for relaxation, featuring comfortable loungers, shaded lounge areas, and a dining space to enjoy al fresco meals.

The fitness area, shared by all villas, is accessible from Villa Larimar via the sidewalk, while other villas access it through the estate. A housekeeping service is provided 7 days a week, with turndown service available upon request. Additionally, water and soft drinks are included to ensure optimal comfort.

In summary, Villa Larimar is the perfect place for a stay in St Barth, combining luxury, comfort, and a prime location facing the sea.

Description:
From the heights of Vitet, enjoy the view as soon as you arrive in this property overlooking the lagoon.
The breathtaking panorama is unobstructed, mixing hilly vegetation and shades of blue.
The large sunny terrace invites you to moments of pure relaxation between swimming in the heated pool and sunbathing on the deckchairs.
But also to delicious moments of conviviality with its dining area and its outdoor lounge facing the sea.

The sea spray brings you just the right amount of freshness to extend the evening with friends.Fortunately, the show starts again each morning with the first light of the day which you can attend if you get up early enough.Air-conditioned and equipped with a Bose stereo system and US satellite channels, the living room is both minimalist and very welcoming with imposing and reassuring wooden furniture that dominates the decoration.
Very airy, it opens onto the large terrace and the open kitchen equipped with a large bar for those who would like to enjoy a good glass of wine or a cocktail.
Magnificent photographs adorn the walls of the villa and certain decorative pieces recall the marine world.
Three rooms can accommodate 3 couples and 2 children.All three bedrooms offer a sea view, a private bathroom, air conditioning and a safe.
One of them has a bunk bed at the entrance for two children.

To reach one of the magnificent beaches of St. Barth, you will have to leave this little corner of paradise and drive a few minutes.The lively town of Gustavia is about 20 minutes away. Its luxury boutiques, gourmet restaurants and yachts offer a unique French Caribbean experience.After a memorable evening, you will have the pleasure of returning to your villa and enjoying the calm and serenity of the place again.

Enjoy your stay at the villa La Vue.

The + : La Vue

Description:
Nestled in the enchanting setting of Grand Cul de Sac, Villa Tourmaline invites you to experience an unforgettable stay, blending discreet luxury and absolute serenity. This charming property, featuring 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, is designed to provide a refined and comfortable experience, perfectly harmonized with its natural surroundings.

At the heart of the villa lies a spacious living area where the heated pool extends along the wooden terrace, creating a constant invitation to relaxation and leisure. Whether for a refreshing dip or a midnight swim under the stars, the pool becomes the perfect place to enjoy the sunny days of Saint-Barthélemy.

The interior decor, understated and elegant, showcases noble materials and contemporary touches, creating a soft and calming atmosphere. Each bedroom, carefully arranged, has its own unique ambiance and direct access to the outdoors, allowing you to savor the beauty of the surrounding landscape at any moment.

Wellness enthusiasts will also appreciate access to a shared fitness room within the estate, fully equipped to meet all your needs. The fitness center, accessible via a pedestrian path for Villa Larimar and through the estate for other residences, is a true asset for staying active in an inspiring setting.

Villa Tourmaline also offers a daily housekeeping service, 7 days a week, and a turn-down service upon request, ensuring that every moment spent in the villa is synonymous with absolute relaxation. Water and non-alcoholic beverages are generously included, allowing you to fully enjoy every moment in serenity.

With its fluid architecture and spaces that open onto nature, Villa Tourmaline perfectly embodies the timeless elegance and charm of Saint-Barthélemy, offering an exceptional retreat where comfort and art de vivre blend in perfect harmony.

Description:
Nichée sur les hauteurs de Colombier, la Villa Ti Voyage est un havre de paix idéal pour ceux qui recherchent intimité et sérénité. Offrant une vue panoramique sur la mer et les collines verdoyantes, cette villa contemporaine dispose de deux chambres confortables et de deux salles de bains élégantes, chacune dotée d'équipements modernes pour un confort optimal.

L'intérieur de la villa, au design minimaliste, baigne de lumière naturelle grâce à de grandes baies vitrées ouvrant sur une spacieuse terrasse. La cuisine ouverte, entièrement équipée, s'intègre harmonieusement à l'espace de vie, créant une atmosphère chaleureuse propice aux moments conviviaux. Le salon et la salle à manger s'ouvrent harmonieusement sur une terrasse ensoleillée, idéale pour dîner en plein air tout en profitant de la brise marine.

À l'extérieur, la piscine chauffée vous invite à la détente tout en admirant la vue imprenable sur l'île et la mer des Caraïbes. La terrasse est équipée de confortables chaises longues, idéales pour bronzer ou lire un livre à l'ombre d'un parasol.

La Villa Ti Voyage est idéale pour les couples ou les petites familles souhaitant découvrir le charme de Saint-Barthélemy dans un cadre paisible et raffiné. Ses équipements modernes et son ambiance apaisante en font un refuge idéal pour échapper à l'agitation du quotidien, tout en séjournant à quelques minutes des célèbres plages et restaurants de l'île.

Description:
The Villa Lagon Jaune Estate is the result of the merger between Villa Lagon Jaune and Villa Petit Lagon, combining the charm and authenticity of both properties to offer an unparalleled experience in the exclusive Domaine du Levant. This new estate now consists of six bedrooms, each with a private bathroom, several of which boast stunning panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea.

Designed in the spirit of Creole cottages, the villa is open to the outdoors to fully enjoy the unique surroundings, blending turquoise waters and lush nature. The main room, with its exposed beams, features a mezzanine lounge area, a well-equipped open kitchen, a bar, and a large sofa. The carefully curated decor emphasizes wood and natural materials, creating a simple yet elegant ambiance.

Outdoor living is central to the experience, with a dining table under the patio and a barbecue area, ideal for enjoying convivial moments with family or friends. Outside, a central pool invites relaxation, surrounded by sun loungers for unwinding while taking in the surrounding tropical vegetation.

With multiple terraces, guests can shift from one viewpoint to another to follow the sun throughout the day. Just 300 meters away, the Domaine's private beach is directly accessible from the villa, equipped with sunbeds, kayaks, and paddleboards for a complete immersion in the lagoon's clear waters. For sports enthusiasts, the estate also offers a tennis court and, in high season, access to the gym in Lurin.

Although the villa is a peaceful haven, the lively nightlife, restaurants, and luxury boutiques of Gustavia are only a 15-20 minute drive away, allowing visitors to fully enjoy the French art of living.

Villa Lagon Jaune Estate promises a unique stay, combining comfort, Creole charm, and an exceptional natural setting with direct access to the lagoon and a tropical atmosphere that guarantees a total escape.

Description:
The Secret Garden Gouverneur villa is one of the few single-level villas in Saint-Barthélemy. Every room in this villa exudes exceptional charm and offers breathtaking views over Gouverneur Bay.

Renovated in 2023, Secret Garden villa provides all the comfort you could dream of, embodying the latest trends in architecture, design, and decor. The finest materials have been meticulously selected to enhance Secret Garden and make it an exceptional villa: IPN wood and Egyptian stone terraces, a Java stone pool, Indonesian onyx basins, and a custom ceramic sculpture. Each room is unique, showcasing a curated selection of furniture, delicate decoration, rich woods, exquisite marbles, and refined accessories.

The villa’s four master suites are decorated with elegance and sophistication. Each suite features luxurious bedding, a private bathroom, a walk-in closet, toilets, and access to the terrace. All the bedrooms are on the same level and offer an unobstructed view of Gouverneur Bay. The master suite is the most spacious, with over 50 square meters of interior space, including a lounge area, a large Italian-style shower, and a natural stone bathtub. Outdoor features include an additional shower, a jacuzzi, and private terraces. There are several dining areas available inside, fully air-conditioned, with a large modern wooden table or a bar area for casual snacking. An additional outdoor dining area, seating eight, is sheltered for comfort. All outdoor areas are oriented towards the sea, allowing you to relax comfortably in cozy loungers while enjoying the mesmerizing shades of blue stretching from the pool to the sea and sky.

For fitness enthusiasts, the villa includes a large pool of over 10 meters and a fully equipped fitness room

Description:
Villa Passage is a peaceful haven nestled in the picturesque area of Corossol in Saint-Barthélemy, combining elegance and tranquility for an unforgettable experience. This charming retreat features two spacious bedrooms, each thoughtfully designed and equipped with a private bathroom. High-quality finishes and decorative touches create a warm and refined atmosphere, perfect for relaxation and making yourself at home.

The main living area, bathed in natural light, opens onto a terrace with a small heated pool. This is where the villa’s true charm lies: a breathtaking view of Corossol Bay, where shades of blue and green blend with the surrounding hills and the crystal-clear waters of the ocean. Whether at sunrise or sunset, every moment spent on the terrace feels like a real-life postcard.

Villa Passage is ideal for couples seeking intimacy and romance, whether for a romantic getaway or to celebrate an unforgettable honeymoon. Indulge in moments of relaxation, sipping cocktails by the pool or letting the gentle trade winds soothe you as you admire the panoramic view.

Just a few minutes away from the beaches and delightful restaurants of Saint-Barth, Villa Passage offers the best of both worlds: an intimate and peaceful setting for recharging, with easy access to the island’s attractions. Whether you’re a fan of relaxation or exploration, this villa promises to fulfill all your expectations for a bespoke stay in the enchanting surroundings of one of the Caribbean’s most beautiful islands.

Description:
Nestled in the elegant Mont Jean neighborhood, Villa Nocean is a colonial-style gem offering an atmosphere of serenity and comfort. With its two spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms, this villa is ideal for couples or small families seeking a refined getaway.

Villa Nocean features a heated pool, perfect for unwinding while taking in breathtaking views of Saint Barthélemy's lush landscapes. Each room is bathed in natural light, with carefully chosen decor that combines colonial charm with contemporary comfort.

The villa’s outdoor spaces are designed to maximize the enjoyment of the tropical setting, with shaded lounge areas and an ideal layout for relaxing moments in the open air.

Choosing Villa Nocean means opting for a stay filled with charm, elegance, and tranquility in one of the island’s most coveted areas.

Description:
Villa Angélique in St. Jean, Saint-Barthélemy, is a masterpiece of modern design, blending elegance and functionality in an idyllic setting. Each of the four spacious bedrooms features a private bathroom, creating a cocoon of comfort and privacy. The carefully selected furnishings combine comfort and aesthetics, with natural materials and soft tones for a serene atmosphere.

The heart of the villa is its open living area, flooded with natural light. Sliding glass doors open entirely to the wooden terrace, where a heated infinity pool offers relaxation with stunning views of St. Jean Bay and the surrounding hills.

Outside, a covered pavilion is arranged for alfresco dining, perfect for enjoying meals in a convivial setting. A fully equipped kitchen and bar area enhance the experience, allowing guests to dine and relax while savoring the view. There’s also a fitness area, allowing for an active routine in a dream setting.

In the evening, the villa transforms with soft lighting, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere for unwinding under the stars.

Description:
Imagine yourself in an exceptional villa in Saint-Jean, on the enchanting island of Saint-Barthélemy. Nestled in lush surroundings, this residence offers far more than just a vacation stay—it’s a true sanctuary of emotions and well-being, designed to awaken the senses and bring a profound sense of peace.

The villa spans four spacious bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom, combining luxury with privacy. Each bathroom features both indoor and outdoor showers, allowing you to enjoy the tropical air while maintaining complete comfort. Two of the bedrooms are equipped with twin beds that can be converted into king-size beds, providing flexibility and comfort for all guests. The interiors, with elegant lines and natural wood accents, are bathed in light thanks to large windows that open onto the horizon.

The terrace opens onto a heated infinity pool, with breathtaking views over Saint-Jean Bay. Sipping a fruity cocktail, you’re soothed by the sound of waves gently lapping the shore and the ever-changing colors of the sunset, from soft pinks to vibrant oranges. Every detail in this space is crafted to create a harmonious blend with the surrounding nature, inviting complete relaxation.

By night, under a starlit sky and the gentle sound of crickets, the villa becomes a haven of serenity. In this magical place, the worries of daily life seem to fade, leaving a deep sense of fulfillment. The villa in Saint-Jean is much more than a vacation home, it is a retreat for the soul, where luxury and nature meet to offer an unforgettable experience.

Description:
Located in the tranquil hills of Dévé, this villa features five bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, and offers magnificent sea views. Four of the bedrooms are situated on the upper level, with each providing a serene atmosphere and air-conditioned comfort. The fifth bedroom, found on a lower level, affords extra privacy.

The living room, also air-conditioned, combines comfort with elegance and opens up to stunning vistas. A unique feature of the villa is its swimming pool, equipped with aquabikes, perfect for both relaxation and aquatic workouts.

This villa is ideal for families or groups seeking a blend of luxury and privacy in a picturesque setting. Its design and amenities cater to a comfortable and memorable stay.

Description:
Villa La Bulle, located in the idyllic neighborhood of Corossol in Saint-Barthélemy, is a true haven of peace designed to offer luxury and serenity. Featuring four elegant bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom, the villa provides the perfect setup for family vacations or gatherings with friends.

The two lower-level bedrooms open onto private terraces, ideal for peaceful moments with soothing views of the surroundings. The two upper-level bedrooms, including the connected third and fourth rooms, offer flexibility and conviviality while maintaining privacy for their occupants.

The interior living area, designed as a spacious and seamless space, opens entirely to the outdoors without the use of glass panels, providing a direct and immersive connection to the breathtaking view of Corossol Bay. However, the villa’s standout feature is its luxurious heated infinity pool, blending seamlessly with the horizon and the lush natural surroundings. To enhance relaxation, a built-in TV near the pool is perfect for convivial evenings or catching events like the Super Bowl in an extraordinary setting.

With its refined architecture, modern comforts, and paradisiacal setting, Villa La Bulle offers an unforgettable experience in Saint-Barthélemy.

Description:
Perched majestically above the bay of Marigot, Le Manoir Voltaire is an exceptional villa where luxury and contemporary architecture blend in perfect harmony. Designed with noble materials such as exotic wood and raw concrete, it offers a warm and sophisticated atmosphere, enhanced by clean lines and a seamless connection to the outdoors.

From the moment you enter, your gaze is drawn to the vast living space, bathed in natural light and designed in a loft-style concept. The fully equipped open kitchen integrates seamlessly with the dining area and main living room, creating an ideal setting for shared moments and conviviality. A second kitchen, specially designed for a private chef, allows for the preparation of gourmet meals in complete discretion. For added privacy, a separate TV lounge provides a dedicated entertainment space, away from the main reception areas.

The villa features four elegant bedrooms, each with its own private bathroom, spacious dressing room, safe, Smart TV, and Sonos audio system. All rooms offer breathtaking views of the bay, immersing these private spaces in natural light and a serene ambiance where minimalist design meets absolute comfort.

Outside, a true haven of tranquility unfolds: a heated infinity pool, the largest on the island of Saint-Barthélemy, overlooks a spectacular panorama. A water feature with a waterfall and a koi pond adds a touch of serenity to this exclusive retreat. A private elevator connects the different levels, ensuring optimal comfort for residents.

Additionally, Le Manoir Voltaire offers the possibility of accommodating two additional bedrooms (available at an additional cost), located between two villas:

  • A children’s room, designed for families, featuring six bunk beds and a private bathroom.
  • A staff room, ideal for accompanying personnel, equipped with two bunk beds and sharing a bathroom.

Finally, a large private parking area provides ample space for multiple vehicles. Every detail of Le Manoir Voltaire has been carefully crafted to offer a unique experience of elegance, modernity, and well-being, in one of the most enchanting locations in Saint-Barthélemy.

Description:
Perched above the heights of Saint-Jean, Villa Bonnie embodies tropical elegance and charm in an idyllic setting. With panoramic views of the bay and its crystal-clear waters, this stunning property blends modern comfort, natural materials, and a serene atmosphere for a truly unique and exclusive experience in St. Barth.

The villa offers three beautiful bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom, a walk-in closet, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, a smart TV, and a safe, all with breathtaking views over St. Jean Bay.
The master suite features an additional private lounge area and boasts a double outdoor shower as well as an indoor shower, offering a luxurious open-air bathing experience.
Bedroom 2 is equipped with both indoor and outdoor showers, while Bedroom 3 features a covered outdoor shower, perfect for refreshing moments in complete privacy.

The spacious living room, with its TV area and contemporary decor inspired by Caribbean design, invites you to relax in a refined setting. It opens onto a fully equipped kitchen, ideal for culinary enthusiasts, featuring a gas stove and oven, two wine fridges, and a thoughtful layout that lets you cook while enjoying the exceptional view.

Outdoors, the villa reveals its full charm with a heated saltwater infinity pool, surrounded by a large wooden deck, perfect for sunbathing or simply soaking in the spectacular scenery. A covered dining area seats up to 12 guests, and a barbecue with plancha sets the scene for unforgettable evenings under the stars.

For convenience, the property includes two private parking spaces, an electric vehicle charging station, a secure gated entrance, and a separate entrance for staff, ensuring privacy and comfort.

For larger groups or added flexibility, guests may also rent the adjacent Villa Clyde, the twin sister of Villa Bonnie, featuring identical architecture and amenities—forming an exclusive private estate in one of the island’s most desirable neighborhoods.

Villa Bonnie is a true haven of peace where luxury, privacy, and the laid-back spirit of the Caribbean come together effortlessly. An invitation to fully embrace the St. Barth lifestyle.

Description:
Located just below Manoir Voltaire, Villa Ti Manoir embodies the same spirit of elegance and refinement in an idyllic setting overlooking the bay of Marigot. Designed with noble materials such as exotic wood and raw concrete, it offers a warm and contemporary atmosphere, where every detail has been carefully thought out to ensure comfort and serenity.

The villa features three bedrooms, each with its own private bathroom, dressing room, safe, Smart TV, and Sonos audio system. Staying true to the essence of Manoir Voltaire, each bedroom boasts a breathtaking view of the bay, enhancing the overall experience for its guests.

The open-plan living space includes a fully equipped kitchen, a welcoming covered outdoor lounge, and a covered outdoor dining area, perfect for enjoying meals in the fresh air while admiring the stunning panorama. The heated infinity pool blends seamlessly with the horizon, creating a mesmerizing visual experience and a true sanctuary of relaxation.

Additionally, two extra bedrooms are available to accommodate guests' specific needs:

  • A staff room, perfect for accompanying personnel, equipped with two bunk beds and a shared bathroom.

Offering the same refinement and high standards as Manoir Voltaire, Villa Ti Manoir is a prestigious retreat where luxury and nature coexist in perfect harmony, promising an unforgettable experience in Saint-Barthélemy.

Description:
Overlooking the breathtaking bay of Marigot, Domaine Manoir Voltaire brings together two exceptional villas, where contemporary design and timeless elegance merge in perfect harmony. Designed to offer a unique experience of luxury, nature, and serenity, this estate seamlessly blends spacious living areas, refined architecture, and top-tier amenities.

The Manoir Voltaire, grand and sophisticated, unveils an extraordinary ambiance where every detail has been meticulously crafted for comfort and awe. With four spacious bedrooms, each featuring its own private bathroom, a vast loft-style living area bathed in natural light, a fully equipped kitchen, and a second kitchen designed for a private chef, it embodies modern elegance and an unparalleled art of living. A separate TV lounge provides a more intimate relaxation space, while its heated Olympic-size infinity pool, the largest on the island of Saint-Barthélemy, appears to blend seamlessly into the horizon, offering a spectacular view. A serene water feature with a cascading waterfall and koi pond adds a final touch of tranquility to this luxurious retreat.

Nestled just below, Ti Manoir offers a more intimate reinterpretation of Manoir Voltaire, maintaining the same architectural identity and attention to detail. With three beautifully appointed bedrooms, each with a private bathroom, this villa exudes warmth and refinement. Its fully equipped kitchen, welcoming lounge, and covered outdoor dining area create a perfect setting for relaxed gatherings. A heated infinity pool with an uninterrupted view of the bay enhances the sense of serenity and exclusivity.

For added flexibility, the estate also offers two additional rooms, available upon request: a children’s room, ideal for families, featuring six bunk beds and a private bathroom, and a staff room, perfect for accompanying personnel, equipped with two bunk beds and a shared bathroom.

Perfectly balancing privacy and conviviality, spacious interiors, and seamless integration with nature, Domaine Manoir Voltaire is more than just a luxurious retreat—it is an exclusive experience where comfort, elegance, and serenity come together to create an unforgettable stay in the heart of Saint-Barthélemy.

Description:
Ideally located in Saint-Jean, just steps from the airport and offering direct access to the beach, Villa Le Moulin is a rare and iconic property full of charm and character. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, it combines history, comfort, and an exceptional beachfront lifestyle.

The property is composed of three separate structures, offering privacy and space for everyone. The main house includes two air-conditioned bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, a bright and breezy living room (air-conditioned and equipped with Dish and Canal Sat TV), and a ventilated kitchen fitted with an oven, microwave, refrigerator, stovetop, hood, and dishwasher. While there is no indoor dining room, the villa boasts a large covered terrace with a table for up to 12 guests—perfect for outdoor meals by the sea.

Each bedroom in the main house features two twin beds that can be joined into a king, air conditioning, ceiling fans, portable speakers, TVs, and safes. One of the bathrooms has a separate toilet, while the other is open-plan.

To the left of the main house, the annex hosts a beautiful master suite with a king-size bed, sea and pool views, air conditioning, fan, TV, speaker, safe, and a spacious bathroom with double vanity, shower, and separate toilet.

Finally, the historic mill tower—a signature element of the property—offers a charming, independent bedroom with a queen-size bed, air conditioning, fan, TV, speaker, safe, and an ensuite bathroom with a shower and non-separated toilet.

Outside, the villa invites you to relax with a private (unheated) swimming pool, a cozy outdoor lounge, a gas barbecue, and direct access to the beach—just a few steps from your terrace.

Villa Le Moulin offers an authentic and refined St. Barth experience, ideal for families or friends looking for privacy, comfort, and a touch of island history in one of the island’s most sought-after locations.

Description:
Perched on the hills of Lurin, Villa Pasha offers a spectacular view over the bay of Saint-Jean and the turquoise waters of the Caribbean. This elegant colonial-style property blends timeless charm with modern comfort in a serene and refined setting.

The villa is composed of a main house and several annexes, offering a total of six bedrooms—including a beautiful master suite in the main house and five additional bedrooms in separate guest cottages. Ideal for families or groups of friends, each bedroom is equipped with air conditioning, ceiling fans, secure storage, and most have en-suite bathrooms for added privacy and comfort.

The master bedroom, located in the main house, features a queen-size bed, desk, walk-in closet, TV, portable speaker, and a safe. The adjoining bathroom includes a shower, double vanity, and separate toilet. Between the living room and kitchen, you'll also find a guest WC and a storage room with a safe.

The living room is ventilated and comfortably furnished, with a TV, Apple TV, and speaker system. It opens onto a fully equipped kitchen, including an oven, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher, stovetop, hood, and toaster—ideal for preparing meals to enjoy with family or friends.

The outdoor spaces are perfect for relaxing and entertaining, with a large terrace hosting a table for eight, a gas barbecue, and a stunning heated pool with a lap lane, overlooking the sea.

The annexes house five additional bedrooms:

  • A children’s room with bunk beds, a mezzanine sleeping area, and a small library.

  • A queen-size bedroom with TV, safe, en-suite bathroom (shower, double vanity, non-separated WC), connected to another room.

  • A king-size bedroom with TV, dressing room, safe, and en-suite bathroom with shower, double vanity, and non-separated WC.

  • A twin bedroom with two single beds, desk, and safe.

  • And a queen-size bedroom with TV, safe, and an en-suite bathroom (shower, double vanity, non-separated WC).

Villa Pasha is a true haven of peace, just minutes from Gustavia and the island’s most beautiful beaches. Its colonial soul, noble materials, and warm atmosphere create a unique setting where Caribbean elegance meets contemporary luxury.
