Description:
Perched on the heights of Saint-Jean, Villas Bonnie and Clyde embody tropical charm and sophistication in an idyllic setting. Offering breathtaking panoramic views over the bay’s crystalline waters, these two sumptuous neighboring properties, sharing identical architecture, seamlessly blend modern comfort, fine materials, and a serene atmosphere for a unique and exclusive experience in Saint Barthélemy.

Together, they offer six magnificent bedrooms, each featuring an ensuite bathroom, dressing room, air conditioning, ceiling fan, smart TV, and a safe, not to mention stunning views over Saint-Jean Bay. The master bedroom stands out with its private lounge area and double outdoor shower in addition to an indoor shower, offering a truly unique open-air wellness experience. Bedroom 2 also offers both an indoor and outdoor shower, while bedroom 3 boasts a covered outdoor shower, perfect for refreshing in total privacy.

The spacious living room, with its TV corner and contemporary touches inspired by Caribbean style, invites relaxation in a refined setting. It opens onto a fully equipped kitchen designed for culinary enthusiasts, featuring a gas stove and oven, two wine cellars, and a functional layout allowing you to cook while admiring the scenery.

Outside, the villas showcase the art of island living with saltwater, heated infinity pools bordered by expansive wooden decks—ideal for sunbathing or quiet contemplation. A covered dining table comfortably seats up to 12 guests, while a barbecue area with a plancha extends convivial evenings under the stars.

For practical convenience, each property offers two parking spaces, an electric vehicle charging station, a secure gate, and a separate entrance for staff, ensuring both privacy and comfort.

Perfect for family getaways or vacations with friends, Villas Bonnie and Clyde can be rented together, forming an exceptional private estate with six bedrooms where luxury, privacy, and the sweetness of Caribbean living come together in one of the island’s most sought-after neighborhoods. An invitation to fully embrace the art of Caribbean living.

Description:
Nestled in the heart of the iconic Saint-Jean Bay, Villa Ti Castelle is a true haven of peace, perfect for a romantic getaway. With its intimate and welcoming atmosphere, this one-bedroom, one-bathroom villa combines comfort and authenticity in a unique setting.

The elegant and bright bedroom features a spacious walk-in closet as well as a dedicated office space, offering both practicality and comfort. After a day exploring the island, it becomes a true cocoon for relaxation.

The villa also offers a Joupa, an authentic Caribbean living space, with a covered outdoor dining area. Its removable panels allow you to close it off to protect against wind or rain, while still enjoying the charm of the outdoors. The kitchen opens onto the living room, providing great flexibility: you can open everything to let in the light and sea breeze, or close it off for more intimacy and comfort.

Every room of the villa opens onto the ocean, with breathtaking views over the bay of Saint-Jean. From the terrace, the turquoise shades of the sea blend seamlessly with the horizon, offering a soothing and unforgettable spectacle.

Perfectly located, just a short walk from sandy beaches, lively restaurants, and local boutiques, Villa Ti Castelle combines Caribbean charm with convenience. It is the ideal place to enjoy the gentle lifestyle of St. Barthélemy, between tranquil moments and unforgettable discoveries.
During the festive season, the two houses are only rented together and offer a total of 4 bedrooms.
Domaine Castelle

Description:
Nestled in the heart of the iconic Saint-Jean Bay, Villa Ti Castelle is a true haven of peace, perfect for a family stay or a getaway with friends. With its intimate and welcoming atmosphere, this three-bedroom, three-bathroom villa combines comfort and authenticity in a unique setting.

Each bedroom, elegant and bright, features a spacious walk-in closet as well as a dedicated office space, offering both comfort and practicality. After a day exploring the island, they become true cocoons of relaxation and privacy.

The villa also offers a Joupa, an authentic Caribbean living space with a covered outdoor dining area. Its removable panels allow you to close it off to protect against wind or rain, while still enjoying the charm of the outdoors. The kitchen opens onto the living room, providing great flexibility: you can open everything to let in the light and sea breeze, or close it off for more intimacy and comfort.

Every room of the villa opens onto the ocean, with breathtaking views over the bay of Saint-Jean. From the terrace, the turquoise shades of the sea blend seamlessly with the horizon, offering a soothing and unforgettable spectacle.

Perfectly located, just a short walk from sandy beaches, lively restaurants, and local boutiques, Villa Ti Castelle combines Caribbean charm with convenience. It is the ideal place to enjoy the gentle lifestyle of St. Barthélemy, between moments of conviviality, tranquility, and unforgettable discoveries.
During the festive season, the two houses are only rented together and offer a total of 4 bedrooms.
Domaine Castelle

Description:
Located in the heart of the iconic Saint-Jean Bay, the Domaine Castelle brings together two villas with distinct charm: Ti Castelle, intimate and cozy with one bedroom, and Castelle, elegant and spacious with three bedrooms. Together, they form an exclusive estate with four bedrooms and four bathrooms, ideal for hosting family and friends in absolute comfort.

Each bedroom features a walk-in closet and a dedicated office space, combining practicality with refinement. The living areas, designed for gathering, open onto the sea and invite you to share unforgettable moments. The Joupas, authentic Caribbean outdoor living spaces with covered dining areas, allow you to enjoy the tropical lifestyle while being sheltered from wind or rain. The kitchens open onto the living rooms, offering great flexibility: open everything to let in the light and sea breeze, or close it off for more intimacy and comfort.

From every room of the estate, the view over Saint-Jean Bay is breathtaking—a unique spectacle where turquoise waters merge with the horizon.

Perfectly located just steps away from beaches, restaurants, and boutiques, the Domaine Castelle combines Caribbean charm, elegance, and authenticity. A truly exceptional place to experience the gentle lifestyle of St. Barthélemy, balancing tranquility with conviviality.

Description:
Located in Colombier, one of the most sought-after areas of Saint Barthélemy, Villa Ahava overlooks one of the island’s most spectacular panoramas. Its contemporary architecture, generous volumes, and refined finishes create a unique atmosphere where comfort, elegance, and nature blend seamlessly.

The villa features 4 spacious bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom and individual air-conditioning, ensuring privacy and absolute comfort for every guest.

The main living area includes a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, modern and open to a bright, airy living room with sweeping ocean views.

Expansive outdoor spaces elevate the experience even further:

a covered outdoor lounge and a sheltered dining area invite you to enjoy the island’s gentle climate, while the 300 m² deck surrounds a stunning infinity pool offering a mesmerizing view of the sea and surrounding islets.

Wellness & Premium Amenities

Designed for ultimate comfort, Villa Ahava offers:

A state-of-the-art fitness room, fully equipped with Technogym machines

A dedicated massage area with professional table, ideal for relaxation and wellness treatments

A high-end American BBQ, perfect for convivial evenings facing the sunset

A private enclosed garage, providing convenience and security

The entire property is enhanced by an exceptional lush tropical garden, creating a serene and intimate atmosphere.

Prime Location

Ideally situated in Colombier, Villa Ahava is just minutes from the island’s most beautiful beaches, including Colombier, Flamands, Shell Beach, and Saint-Jean.

The vibrant center of Gustavia—with its restaurants, boutiques, and activities—is only 5 minutes away.
